695bdefa-a259-4bf1-a92d-17571e782277.name: Sh
695bdefa-a259-4bf1-a92d-17571e782277.one liner: sh, aka Bourne Shell, is the Unix Shell, the standard shell since v7 Unix.  POSIX has standardized the shell, and portable shell scripts should conform to /bin/sh syntax.

8a3cba68-fb6a-4fd8-8f5f-62a976d8889d.name: Structure
8a3cba68-fb6a-4fd8-8f5f-62a976d8889d.one liner: Structure is a fundamental, tangible or intangible notion referring to the recognition, observation, nature, and permanence of patterns and relationships of entities.

f9fef1e3-aa79-4111-9b11-059ac746aba9.name: Skin
f9fef1e3-aa79-4111-9b11-059ac746aba9.one liner: skin is set of properties (skin parameters) used to change the appearance of an application through setting the colors and decoration of controls and components

e6a64ef3-3aa7-482d-8d8d-70c227705887.name: Machine Learning
e6a64ef3-3aa7-482d-8d8d-70c227705887.one liner: Machine learning revolves around developing self learning computer algorithms that function by virtue of discovering patterns in data and making intelligent decisions based on such patterns.

55d3fdd9-e80a-4f50-8ed2-fd636d1be22e.name: Lambda
55d3fdd9-e80a-4f50-8ed2-fd636d1be22e.one liner: Anonymous functions or closures in programming languages such as Lisp, C#, C++, Lua, Python, Ruby or Java. (Also, lambda expression.)

aacc821e-d342-4057-b95c-b99cd58cb319.name: Software Design
aacc821e-d342-4057-b95c-b99cd58cb319.one liner: Software design is the activity of deciding what properties, elements, responsibilities, interfaces, relationships and interactions are required in order to create an effective piece of software.

a74ff105-475b-4ad2-8dc3-3ab4c4000b03.name: Approximation
a74ff105-475b-4ad2-8dc3-3ab4c4000b03.one liner: Approximation algorithms are algorithms used to find approximate solutions to optimization problems.

06b09a3d-1999-4196-b00c-6bb926776a52.name: Linear Algebra
06b09a3d-1999-4196-b00c-6bb926776a52.one liner: Linear Algebra is a core body of mathematics that has extensive applications in computer graphics, economics, engineering, and control systems.  Key topics: matrix, vector, simultaneous system of linear equations, diagonal form, eigenvalues, eigenvectors, projections, points, lines, planes, hyperplanes, rotations, reflections.  Popular packages for solving linear algebra problems are [tag:Matlab], [tag:Octave], [tag:Maxima], and [tag:Mathematica].

9c28d6e9-d293-4339-8d69-202d2169e502.name: Local Storage
9c28d6e9-d293-4339-8d69-202d2169e502.one liner: Local storage is a way to store persistent data using JavaScript (see also: Session storage).

97c849c9-0c33-482b-9fb9-68cf8b4abd85.name: Caching
97c849c9-0c33-482b-9fb9-68cf8b4abd85.one liner: A cache is a mechanism for temporarily storing (caching) data locally in order to reduce access time to data stored far away. For CPU/disk/web browsing please use relevant tags (cpu-cache, diskcache,...)

6dc753fd-aeb5-4136-8f80-4108ad336985.name: Point
6dc753fd-aeb5-4136-8f80-4108ad336985.one liner: A point is a fundamental geometry entity.

0c9badc3-68e3-4201-ac8c-e165358eaed4.name: OpenCV for Secret Agents
0c9badc3-68e3-4201-ac8c-e165358eaed4.title: OpenCV for Secret Agents
0c9badc3-68e3-4201-ac8c-e165358eaed4.one liner: Use OpenCV in six secret projects to augment your home, car, phone, eyesight, and any photo or drawing

6ec8f41e-f1c8-460f-b130-7d836c2d2fbb.name: Rc
6ec8f41e-f1c8-460f-b130-7d836c2d2fbb.one liner: An "rc" file is a file read at startup of a program. It is also the name of the Plan 9 Shell.

e622ae98-e64a-4c11-8631-605f4f5ed949.name: Vision
e622ae98-e64a-4c11-8631-605f4f5ed949.one liner: Methods to acquire, analyze and understand images using mathematical approaches.

ebc3eb89-ec0d-47e7-bdfe-e74dbb91a867.name: Memory
ebc3eb89-ec0d-47e7-bdfe-e74dbb91a867.one liner: Use this tag for memory management or issues in programming. For questions about memory hardware issues or errors in general software, go to http://superuser.com, or http://serverfault.com if this is related to enterprise-level hardware or software.

c1526fa2-0b34-4063-a0fd-bf9658b12309.name: BeagleBone Black Cookbook
c1526fa2-0b34-4063-a0fd-bf9658b12309.title: BeagleBone Black Cookbook
c1526fa2-0b34-4063-a0fd-bf9658b12309.one liner: Over 80 recipes and solutions for inventors, makers, and budding engineers to create projects using BeagleBone Black

769e1a00-ac5a-44b8-8cfc-de3bc1d003c1.name: Synthesis
769e1a00-ac5a-44b8-8cfc-de3bc1d003c1.one liner: Synthesis turns a high level circuit description into an implementation in logic gates.

15cf3841-177f-4835-a036-14ab68676df0.name: Fluent
15cf3841-177f-4835-a036-14ab68676df0.one liner: Fluent interface is an API which allows method chaining to make code more readable.

0a31e088-7e82-4914-9b6c-9ccca28cb274.name: Window
0a31e088-7e82-4914-9b6c-9ccca28cb274.one liner:
In computer science a window is a graphical interface to let a user interact with a program.
Questions regarding Microsoft Windows should use the "Windows" tag.

cb35760f-2473-40e6-b9ec-1bd270f96658.name: Amazon Web Services
cb35760f-2473-40e6-b9ec-1bd270f96658.one liner: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of commercial services centered around virtualized, commodity and clustered computing, networking, database and storage, as well as supporting tools that are offered through infrastructure as a service.

fc61532e-dd1b-495b-afea-7ad44f90930f.name: Financial
fc61532e-dd1b-495b-afea-7ad44f90930f.one liner: Anything related to financial calculations and processing of financial data. For example, this tag can be used for questions about interest rates calculations, stock exchange data processing, market data analysis, etc.

d32da12b-5766-4a7c-9ca3-fb61862b55bd.name: Themes
d32da12b-5766-4a7c-9ca3-fb61862b55bd.one liner: Themes and theming can be used to give another look and feel to existing UI and has a close relation to templating.

5d853494-6018-4608-9a9d-c3b1144b1ec7.name: Master Detail
5d853494-6018-4608-9a9d-c3b1144b1ec7.one liner: A master–detail interface displays a master list and the details for the currently selected item.

51521995-b3ae-41cc-9ad7-f87e3b5a46f8.name: wxPython 2.8 Application Development Cookbook
51521995-b3ae-41cc-9ad7-f87e3b5a46f8.title: wxPython 2.8 Application Development Cookbook
51521995-b3ae-41cc-9ad7-f87e3b5a46f8.one liner: Over 80 practical recipes for developing feature-rich applications using wxPython

38174213-6d07-4269-9968-29524e014e9c.name: Staging
38174213-6d07-4269-9968-29524e014e9c.one liner: Staging is the process of deploying to an intermediate, usually internal, repository so that deployed artifacts can be tested and later promoted to higher levels so that they can finally be release to public repositories

fa46f086-ab51-4c6e-bc90-fd2204cbf55c.name: Layout
fa46f086-ab51-4c6e-bc90-fd2204cbf55c.one liner: The layout tag is for questions about the placement, alignment and justification of objects with respect to a containing element. For questions pertaining to CSS, use the 'css' tag instead.

f2ec5a8b-eccf-459a-8960-a2a45d00708a.name: Methods
f2ec5a8b-eccf-459a-8960-a2a45d00708a.one liner: A method (often called function, routine or procedure) is code that performs a task and is associated with a class or an object.

b7b4833d-ca0c-467a-bcac-da3d8c87cefb.name: Learning Python Design Patterns
b7b4833d-ca0c-467a-bcac-da3d8c87cefb.title: Learning Python Design Patterns
b7b4833d-ca0c-467a-bcac-da3d8c87cefb.one liner: Written for intermediate Python programmers, this excellent tutorial will help streamline your work through the use of Design Patterns. Youll learn through example and clear explanations to expand your know-how and speed up your output.

da65ea41-78af-411d-89a9-e97d6606e645.name: Recipe
da65ea41-78af-411d-89a9-e97d6606e645.one liner: In general terms, a recipe is a set of instructions that describe how to prepare or make something, with respect to computing it's typically used to describe a set of rules used to manage building code.

e1c24fd6-8894-4d34-9bcc-f53ade2cbeb4.name: Collada
e1c24fd6-8894-4d34-9bcc-f53ade2cbeb4.one liner: COLLADA is a royalty-free XML schema that enables digital asset exchange within the interactive 3D industry.

00ca4c02-e6f7-4d5a-be62-31ad46190ff5.name: Fix
00ca4c02-e6f7-4d5a-be62-31ad46190ff5.one liner: The Financial Information eXchange ("FIX") Protocol is a series of messaging specifications for the electronic communication of trade-related messages.

a0dedb2a-b401-4286-9755-b9cca2ebb84e.name: Can
a0dedb2a-b401-4286-9755-b9cca2ebb84e.one liner:
Controller–area network (CAN or CAN-bus) is a vehicle bus standard designed to allow microcontrollers and devices to communicate with each other within a vehicle without a host computer.
CAN is a message based protocol, designed specifically for automotive applications but now also used in other areas such as industrial automation and medical equipment.

39580d68-d8f6-4d53-b0b0-6fd45443746f.name: Nagios
39580d68-d8f6-4d53-b0b0-6fd45443746f.one liner: Nagios is a powerful monitoring system that enables organizations to identify and resolve IT infrastructure problems before they affect critical business processes.

49f85f4b-eb57-4cff-bed6-3ad3f58c887c.name: Bioinformatics
49f85f4b-eb57-4cff-bed6-3ad3f58c887c.one liner: Bioinformatics is an interdisciplinary field that develops methods and software tools for understanding biological data.

b26bbb3e-d996-4ffc-9a93-a6b79246ccdb.name: Jar
b26bbb3e-d996-4ffc-9a93-a6b79246ccdb.one liner: JAR file (or Java ARchive) aggregates many files into one. JAR files build on the ZIP file format.

42777e5d-d9c9-4b5c-9231-4bbbb26ec439.name: Partitioning
42777e5d-d9c9-4b5c-9231-4bbbb26ec439.one liner: Partitioning is a performance strategy whereby you divide possibly very large groups of data into some number of smaller groups of data.

cc969bbe-6db7-4cc2-98fa-36e16d79ca6c.name: Drupal
cc969bbe-6db7-4cc2-98fa-36e16d79ca6c.one liner:
Drupal is an open source CMS framework written in PHP.

Rather than using this tag, consider posting your question directly on http://drupal.stackexchange.com/.

99c3cdd6-eb01-4a5d-80cd-7559d07fb5fd.name: Openframeworks
99c3cdd6-eb01-4a5d-80cd-7559d07fb5fd.one liner: openFrameworks is an open source C++ framework wrapping graphics, audio, image, networking and video libraries in an API designed to be minimal and easy to use.

41320100-82a2-4628-9293-db1312ef18a7.name: Save
41320100-82a2-4628-9293-db1312ef18a7.one liner: To store (data) in a computer or on a storage device.

6cd4a610-fee7-4c82-90fe-c7aa4816bae2.name: Fluentd
6cd4a610-fee7-4c82-90fe-c7aa4816bae2.one liner: Fluentd is open-source and distributed data collector, which receives logs in JSON format, buffers them, and sends them to other systems like Amazon S3, MongoDB, Hadoop, or other Fluentds.

df182900-8b61-482d-9c86-29043a37a0c6.name: Com
df182900-8b61-482d-9c86-29043a37a0c6.one liner:
Component Object Model (COM) is a component technology from Microsoft, featuring remoting, language independence and interface-based programming.
For questions about the COM serial port, you should use the [serial-port] tag instead.

7f5d7135-5ef5-44d5-aed2-9358ab795b2b.name: Mastering Ext JS - Second Edition
7f5d7135-5ef5-44d5-aed2-9358ab795b2b.title: Mastering Ext JS - Second Edition
7f5d7135-5ef5-44d5-aed2-9358ab795b2b.one liner: Learn how to develop advanced and efficient Internet applications with Ext JS

ca71c25d-d0e8-45a6-b62f-ebfab30c8f07.name: Ruby On Rails
ca71c25d-d0e8-45a6-b62f-ebfab30c8f07.one liner: Ruby on Rails is an open source full-stack web application framework written in Ruby. It follows the popular MVC framework model and is known for its "convention over configuration" approach to application development.

971e8c61-b3fb-4faa-9b73-e1f24fdbeda4.name: Yo're not a web developer if you don't know JavaScript
971e8c61-b3fb-4faa-9b73-e1f24fdbeda4.title: You're not a web developer if you don't know JavaScript
971e8c61-b3fb-4faa-9b73-e1f24fdbeda4.one liner: The blog will provide importance of Javascript and its ecosystem.

e6632706-fd54-433a-9cca-254e345428df.name: Learning Dart
e6632706-fd54-433a-9cca-254e345428df.title: Learning Dart
e6632706-fd54-433a-9cca-254e345428df.one liner: Dart is the programming language developed by Google that offers a new level of simple versatility. Learn all the essentials of Dart web development in this brilliant tutorial that takes you from beginner to pro.

858c91bb-29b1-49c1-a5ee-9b819e322bf6.name: Blender
858c91bb-29b1-49c1-a5ee-9b819e322bf6.title: Blender
858c91bb-29b1-49c1-a5ee-9b819e322bf6.one liner: An open source tool used for the creation of high quality intricate 3D content

3f2aa163-1e43-460d-8eaf-16fd1dc7a19d.name: Php
3f2aa163-1e43-460d-8eaf-16fd1dc7a19d.one liner: PHP is a general-purpose programming language that is especially suited for web development.

3d522624-789b-4d3e-94d2-a64e0fb2e7b3.name: Python Data Stack
3d522624-789b-4d3e-94d2-a64e0fb2e7b3.title: Python Data Stack
3d522624-789b-4d3e-94d2-a64e0fb2e7b3.one liner: There's many areas Python programming excels at. If you're looking to learn Python in the world of big data, there are six libraries you need to know.

2eb19e76-951e-4a38-aade-649ed65d397f.name: RESTful Java Web Services - Second Edition
2eb19e76-951e-4a38-aade-649ed65d397f.title: RESTful Java Web Services - Second Edition
2eb19e76-951e-4a38-aade-649ed65d397f.cover image: sites/default/files/9092OS_4017_RESTful Java Web Services, Second Edition.jpg
2eb19e76-951e-4a38-aade-649ed65d397f.one liner: Design scalable and robust RESTful web services with JAX-RS and Jersey extension APIs

466b4110-4634-4a40-ac18-fd6e354d8f64.name: Vote
466b4110-4634-4a40-ac18-fd6e354d8f64.one liner: Voting is a method for a group such as a meeting or an electorate to make a decision or express an opinion—often following discussions, debates, or election campaigns. Democracies elect holders of high office by voting.

d27aec22-b5e8-4e63-9971-4d1c824dd686.name: Area
d27aec22-b5e8-4e63-9971-4d1c824dd686.one liner: Area is a quantity that expresses the extent of a two-dimensional surface or shape, or planar lamina, in the plane.

b095d226-49c5-42d8-9a53-6d4b19cb5f28.name: Learning scikit-learn: Machine Learning in Python
b095d226-49c5-42d8-9a53-6d4b19cb5f28.title: Learning scikit-learn: Machine Learning in Python
b095d226-49c5-42d8-9a53-6d4b19cb5f28.one liner: Incorporating machine learning in your applications is becoming essential. As a programmer this book is the ideal introduction to scikit-learn for your Python environment, taking your skills to a whole new level.

fc9885d8-49c3-4087-81cf-a5deea540139.name: Jersey
fc9885d8-49c3-4087-81cf-a5deea540139.one liner: Jersey is the open source, production quality, JAX-RS (JSR 311, JSR 339) Reference Implementation for building RESTful Web services.

5f16128b-11ce-4141-8571-96d0197cdcf9.name: Programming the BeagleBone
5f16128b-11ce-4141-8571-96d0197cdcf9.title: Programming the BeagleBone
5f16128b-11ce-4141-8571-96d0197cdcf9.one liner: Be the chief of BeagleBone programming by doing simple electronics and Internet of Things projects

ce654b82-1ac7-4bed-b52e-5106127976e5.name: Penetration Testing
ce654b82-1ac7-4bed-b52e-5106127976e5.one liner: This tag is for questions that involve black box security testing of applications and/or networks. Questions that involve vulnerability scanning, offensive security, exploit development, etc., might fall under this tag.

ab8d2399-1835-4f74-a594-88f034be665c.name: Ttl
ab8d2399-1835-4f74-a594-88f034be665c.one liner: Time to live (TTL) is a mechanism that limits the lifespan or lifetime of data in a computer or network

048e8472-affa-4543-af7c-d97dfdde7edc.name: Compilation
048e8472-affa-4543-af7c-d97dfdde7edc.one liner: Compilation is the process of producing information, typically a program to be executed by a computer, from a source (or sources) typically being text in a computer programming language. Compilation can be "converting" between programming languages or assembling executable code from one such language, and is usually a part of the process of building and publishing computer software.

c9b27d96-e24c-4d16-9a9f-943a1601dce3.name: Static
c9b27d96-e24c-4d16-9a9f-943a1601dce3.one liner: Static is a term used in some programming languages to define a function or data storage area (field) that is not bound to any specific object instance.

cbb1c99a-f8e8-4299-9b11-ac325f31cd09.name: Openssh
cbb1c99a-f8e8-4299-9b11-ac325f31cd09.one liner: OpenSSH is the most widespread and de-facto standard implementation of SSH protocol. Both server and client tools are included.

04cb2be5-e14e-468e-ae95-d828443ab447.name: Fast Data Processing with Spark
04cb2be5-e14e-468e-ae95-d828443ab447.title: Fast Data Processing with Spark
04cb2be5-e14e-468e-ae95-d828443ab447.one liner: Spark offers a streamlined way to write distributed programs and this tutorial gives you the know-how as a software developer to make the most of Sparks many great features, providing an extra string to your bow.

0e433b0a-2c0b-440f-a421-d40b2db2ab77.name: Http
0e433b0a-2c0b-440f-a421-d40b2db2ab77.one liner: Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) is an application level network protocol that is used for the transfer of content on the World Wide Web.

f0ae2657-54d2-4588-95cb-8147b14a05f0.name: Printing
f0ae2657-54d2-4588-95cb-8147b14a05f0.one liner: Printing is a process for reproducing text and images, typically with ink or toner, on paper using a printer.

419b64f0-6558-478b-9fe4-54b490c93cb9.name: Value
419b64f0-6558-478b-9fe4-54b490c93cb9.one liner: A numerical quantity assigned to a variable or a field.

f6e846da-d35b-474c-a108-92953a5d14ba.name: External
f6e846da-d35b-474c-a108-92953a5d14ba.one liner: This tag refers to something that is outside of a particular system.  In other words, it is something that is not a part of the main system and therefore can be considered "extra".

cfb66d16-e23d-4b5f-861d-9ecdbe249e00.name: Printer Control Language
cfb66d16-e23d-4b5f-861d-9ecdbe249e00.one liner:
This tag relates to questions pertaining to PCL. PCL or Printer Control Language has been developed by Hewlett Packard and is now the de-facto standard for printer languages (laser and ink).

Note: For questions about the Portable Class Library, use the tag [portable-class-library] instead.

c30c9912-051c-4983-8046-a16dd19b9686.name: Admin
c30c9912-051c-4983-8046-a16dd19b9686.one liner: admin may refer to both physical persons or software accounts that are dedicated and privileged to change the system they operate.

1b22fd58-4e2f-4979-9bf7-284973e2e63f.name: Face Recognition
1b22fd58-4e2f-4979-9bf7-284973e2e63f.one liner: Face recognition is the process of matching faces to determine if the person shown in one image is the same as the person shown in another image. This is distinct from face detection which only determines where in an image exists a face. Face recognition has broad use in security technology, social networking, cameras, etc.

066a2b9a-7e2d-4aa2-a716-2ee2b4f190b0.name: Smartphone
066a2b9a-7e2d-4aa2-a716-2ee2b4f190b0.one liner: Smartphone is a combination of mobile phone and PDA (Personal Digital Assistant).

f7e913d6-20a9-4fad-b85f-3f3846403708.name: Integral
f7e913d6-20a9-4fad-b85f-3f3846403708.one liner: This tag should be used for questions related to coding solutions for integrals.

4b84e19d-cbd9-4874-b61f-1a4bbb6d8771.name: Any
4b84e19d-cbd9-4874-b61f-1a4bbb6d8771.one liner: "Any" means "at least one".  Use this tag for questions that deal with testing elements in a collection to see if at least one of them passes a condition.

f88055c8-7b12-44dd-9a42-d511aa366b49.name: Control
f88055c8-7b12-44dd-9a42-d511aa366b49.one liner: In general controls are interactive elements of the user interface.

e9bd02a5-241b-4fd1-a46b-8f86ed91aeeb.name: Preprocessor
e9bd02a5-241b-4fd1-a46b-8f86ed91aeeb.one liner: a program that processes input data to produce output that is used as input to another program.

edfe345a-9409-4ec1-aeba-1bb6ea5762fd.name: Group
edfe345a-9409-4ec1-aeba-1bb6ea5762fd.one liner: This tag is proposed for burnination, please do not use it. If your question is about sql, either use generic tag, or if you really must use [group-by].

e12a6645-374a-4012-aa8d-0176c2db0fb9.name: Formula for Success from a Bootcamp Graduate
e12a6645-374a-4012-aa8d-0176c2db0fb9.title: Formula for Success from a Bootcamp Graduate
e12a6645-374a-4012-aa8d-0176c2db0fb9.one liner: Mark-Anthony Torrocha from coding school Coding Campus explains how online learning can be the best option if you are looking for flexibility, although you need to have commitment to make it work well.

2077cd61-a997-45d1-9698-d24380b29a68.name: Programming ArcGIS with Python Cookbook - Second Edition
2077cd61-a997-45d1-9698-d24380b29a68.title: Programming ArcGIS with Python Cookbook - Second Edition
2077cd61-a997-45d1-9698-d24380b29a68.one liner: Over 85 hands-on recipes to teach you how to automate your ArcGIS for Desktop geoprocessing tasks using Python

d6382d49-6a5a-4819-8a73-692a90b72c14.name: Seaborn
d6382d49-6a5a-4819-8a73-692a90b72c14.one liner: Seaborn is a Python visualization library based on matplotlib. Its primary goal is to provide a concise, high-level interface for drawing statistical graphics that are both informative and attractive.

220621a8-d502-4b25-8b86-bde5c866e4fd.name: Bootstrap
220621a8-d502-4b25-8b86-bde5c866e4fd.title: Bootstrap
220621a8-d502-4b25-8b86-bde5c866e4fd.one liner: A frontend framework that aids in speedy web development

725905d7-2b6c-4da8-bbfb-206293018a31.name: Stream
725905d7-2b6c-4da8-bbfb-206293018a31.one liner: A stream is a series of data elements (characters, bytes or complex packets) which can be accessed or made accessible in a serial fashion. Random access is not possible. For Java 8 stream, use the java-stream tag instead.

41c05df5-d4a1-4c9c-bcb6-ca32177554fc.name: Host
41c05df5-d4a1-4c9c-bcb6-ca32177554fc.one liner: A general-purpose computer system interconnected to some communications network, or communications networks for the purpose of achieving resource sharing amongst the participating systems is called Host.

bbfec10f-ef5c-476b-9ba9-e9cf774dfc9a.name: Probability
bbfec10f-ef5c-476b-9ba9-e9cf774dfc9a.one liner: Consider if your question would be better at the statistics stackexchange. Probability touches upon uncertainty, random phenomena, random numbers, random variables, probability distributions, sampling, combinatorics.

A rectangular array of pixels.
A Raster defines values for pixels occupying a particular rectangular area of the plane, not necessarily including (0, 0).

98899ac8-7cb8-4d3a-a1ed-a05cb40fbedd.one liner: Input is usually related to user input, i.e., to the data that user supplies to a running application. In many systems this input is considered to be potentially dangerous and needs to be sanitized to ensure that the user has not injected runnable code into the application.

402c8ea6-5022-453b-ad46-8d9b4a8d1584.one liner: A production environment is one in that is exposed to its intended audience in a real-world situation.

bc0c92a7-89b5-4429-8046-02e88b3981a3.one liner:
Puppet is a ruby-based Configuration Management system incorporating a model-driven DSL.
Its purpose is to provide configuration file enforcement, service state monitoring, package installation and other server-side management.

9f8e9fc4-2d9e-45be-8c4c-0c21327a534b.name: BeagleBone for Secret Agents
9f8e9fc4-2d9e-45be-8c4c-0c21327a534b.title: BeagleBone for Secret Agents
9f8e9fc4-2d9e-45be-8c4c-0c21327a534b.one liner: Browse anonymously, communicate secretly, and create custom security solutions with open source software, the BeagleBone Black, and cryptographic hardware

833a76b5-abf4-4e11-8115-83ad92d7b4d3.name: Developer Tools
833a76b5-abf4-4e11-8115-83ad92d7b4d3.one liner: A developer tool is an application used to write, edit, or debug another application, or web site. There are varying kinds of developer tools, from fully blown IDEs, to single purpose tools.

e280e767-4f15-41f3-a932-ef55860ba91f.name: User Controls
e280e767-4f15-41f3-a932-ef55860ba91f.one liner: A UserControl is a separate, reusable input control that allows a user to interact with an application. User controls can be buttons, checkboxes, input text boxes, mice, keyboards, etc.

396c21f5-dbed-4b2d-937c-9a2debcb118f.name: Ctrl
396c21f5-dbed-4b2d-937c-9a2debcb118f.one liner: Similar to the shift key, the control key is a modifier key that performs an advanced operation when pressed in conjunction with another key. An example would be Ctrl + Z which is a keyboard shortcut for Undo, a common shortcut in a Windows based environment.

f8524faa-4cc1-440e-a2f8-32bffe70eed5.name: Multicore
f8524faa-4cc1-440e-a2f8-32bffe70eed5.one liner: Multicore programming covers techniques for making programs run in parallel, by exploiting hardware with multiple processing cores.

27edd137-8cd9-4dbe-87d5-5bdacd59a225.name: R
27edd137-8cd9-4dbe-87d5-5bdacd59a225.one liner: R is a free, open-source programming language and software environment for statistical computing, bioinformatics, and graphics. Please supplement your question with a minimal reproducible example. For statistical questions please use http://stats.stackexchange.com.

cb06b2b2-fb1e-44a2-87d9-a9cda3771f42.name: Bluetooth
cb06b2b2-fb1e-44a2-87d9-a9cda3771f42.one liner: Bluetooth is a global open wireless technology standard for exchanging data over short distances (using short wavelength radio transmissions) from fixed and mobile devices, creating personal area networks (PANs) with high levels of security.

86d0d56b-9148-402e-a08a-94439a5ddbd7.name: Cowboy
86d0d56b-9148-402e-a08a-94439a5ddbd7.one liner: Cowboy is a small, fast and modular HTTP server written in Erlang. Cowboy is also a socket acceptor pool, able to accept connections for any kind of TCP protocol.

4dbc5110-d558-4962-a497-58e3d2caf5b2.name: Multiple Inheritance
4dbc5110-d558-4962-a497-58e3d2caf5b2.one liner: A feature of some object-oriented computer programming languages in which a class can inherit behaviors and features from more than one superclass or base class.

7fe23b32-54c2-480b-a84c-e221d4b4e958.name: Comparison
7fe23b32-54c2-480b-a84c-e221d4b4e958.one liner: Questions about data comparison and efficient ways to accomplish it. Please avoid using this tag for generic (meta) comparison of two issues or concepts.

44462a38-4eb1-41ea-b17f-6c8d0290fa8e.name: Realm
44462a38-4eb1-41ea-b17f-6c8d0290fa8e.one liner: Realm mobile database replacement for SQLite & Core Data. It can be used on both Android and iOS devices.

9038a5fd-bfb5-4ada-9a2e-48c8e810248d.name: Bounce
9038a5fd-bfb5-4ada-9a2e-48c8e810248d.one liner: The action of sending something back in the direction it originated.

89c46a5e-7f86-418d-add6-08e09ea00d37.name: Future
89c46a5e-7f86-418d-add6-08e09ea00d37.one liner:
A placeholder for the result of a calculation before the calculation has completed. Used in concurrent programming.

Questions about future events are off-topic on Stack Overflow.

5cf620bd-a1e6-4dd5-b1c7-764c6451e917.name: Case
5cf620bd-a1e6-4dd5-b1c7-764c6451e917.one liner: In SQL, the CASE expression executes a list of conditions, returning the result where the condition evaluates to true.

3a4fca26-b869-4c02-9a0e-d6b81d037249.name: Networking
3a4fca26-b869-4c02-9a0e-d6b81d037249.one liner: DO NOT USE. For programming questions use [network-programming] tag. Non-programming networking questions are off topic and should be asked on Network Engineering, Super User or Server Fault instead.

e8b17348-fb44-4b27-81d9-9693510a2949.name: Block
e8b17348-fb44-4b27-81d9-9693510a2949.one liner: This tag is being burninated, because it can refer to many different things depending on the use of other tags with it. Do not use.

deb1e498-680b-4e70-964a-5ee3106621c3.name: Friend
deb1e498-680b-4e70-964a-5ee3106621c3.one liner: In object-oriented programming, friend refers to a method or class that has access to some non-public aspects of a particular class.

de51ddd9-0a52-43f3-8d14-2bc477022fea.name: Practical Data Analysis
de51ddd9-0a52-43f3-8d14-2bc477022fea.title: Practical Data Analysis
de51ddd9-0a52-43f3-8d14-2bc477022fea.one liner: For small businesses, analyzing the information contained in their data using open source technology could be game-changing. All you need is some basic programming and mathematical skills to do just that.

68e08e04-41a9-4428-b74f-4501c3c10a2b.name: Operating System
68e08e04-41a9-4428-b74f-4501c3c10a2b.one liner: An operating System (OS) is a basic software whose role is to be an abstract layer between software requisitions for resources and the hardware available, manage input/output, memory allocation/deallocation, file systems, among other basic tasks a device (not necessarily a computer) should do.

796cc42a-3447-44b0-b3fd-25c68c9fb1da.name: Field
796cc42a-3447-44b0-b3fd-25c68c9fb1da.one liner: In computer science a field is a smaller piece of data from a larger collection.

1afb9ac1-ef5d-4ff4-b38b-92eca26a94ad.name: Constraints
1afb9ac1-ef5d-4ff4-b38b-92eca26a94ad.one liner: A constraint is a condition that has to be fulfilled in a given context. Constraints are typically used in databases and programming languages to detect errors, ensure data consistency, accuracy, and to enforce business requirements.

f9cb6005-0684-4573-85ae-b6a101a23df0.name: Virtualenv
f9cb6005-0684-4573-85ae-b6a101a23df0.one liner: virtualenv is a tool that creates sandboxed Python environments.

a7e8567a-aed2-4f7f-9863-c5a1a58c0504.name: Language Agnostic
a7e8567a-aed2-4f7f-9863-c5a1a58c0504.one liner: Use this tag for PROGRAMMING QUESTIONS that are independent of any particular programming language.

38fb3c25-76b3-47d0-851b-3a5b98b1ea15.name: Streaming
38fb3c25-76b3-47d0-851b-3a5b98b1ea15.one liner: Streaming is the process of delivering digital multimedia content from a provider to a consumer over a network. The provider may have the data stored or may be relaying it from a live source.

35f7bf93-3593-4e35-b8c6-552c13da53f3.name: Mysql
35f7bf93-3593-4e35-b8c6-552c13da53f3.one liner: MySQL is a freely available open source Relational Database Management System (RDBMS) that uses Structured Query Language (SQL). If your issue relates to MySQLi, use the MySQLi tag instead.

141d5a42-593b-4374-8d30-f15bbcb8f002.name: Boolean
141d5a42-593b-4374-8d30-f15bbcb8f002.one liner: The Boolean data type represents simple True or False values.

978102fb-fbc2-475c-b80c-c243f48afa91.name: Json
978102fb-fbc2-475c-b80c-c243f48afa91.one liner: JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a 100% textual data interchange format originally inspired by JavaScript objects. It is widely used in RESTful web services. Parsers for JSON exist in nearly all languages, and libraries also exist which can deserialize JSON to native objects or serialize native objects to JSON.

b820533a-7d3f-41c0-9722-60bc39f7d5a0.name: Parameters
b820533a-7d3f-41c0-9722-60bc39f7d5a0.one liner: Parameters are a type of variable used in a subroutine to refer to the data provided as input to the subroutine.

cc34296e-c8c5-4d03-976e-d30aac00f58e.name: Plugins
cc34296e-c8c5-4d03-976e-d30aac00f58e.one liner: A plug-in (or plugin) is a set of software components that adds specific abilities to a larger software application. If supported, plug-ins enable customizing the functionality of an application.

eb9dd0ee-d9e3-4993-9ee0-d419160b30f0.name: Business Intelligence
eb9dd0ee-d9e3-4993-9ee0-d419160b30f0.one liner: Business intelligence(BI) refers to the process of analyzing an organization's business data, by various (often computer-aided) means, to assist in the organization's decision making. BI technologies are capable of handling large amount of unstructured data to help indentify, develop and create strategic opportunities.

304483cc-b474-4287-a129-0c96ec7a8070.one liner: The toolbar tag is for issues relating to the configuration, design, and use of toolbars.

8980afa3-6b97-460d-9cf6-7ce6a66bdb41.one liner: This tag pertains to the organization of source files and other assets in directory structures, organization of actual source code itself, logical organization of application data, and (occasionally) to organizing development projects.

7a2c7695-6d15-434a-8c16-60a08f214813.one liner: IPython provides a rich architecture for interactive computing, and as a Python developer you can take advantage of this practical hands-on guide to make yourself an expert. Covers numerical computing, data analysis, and more.

Please use the [authentication] tag instead.

3049f2b5-8eca-453e-912e-8b4072768d6f.one liner: Distance is a numerical description of how far apart objects are.

1e0bf681-a76a-4e53-8176-6a41a82b80f4.one liner: Details on how data is being kept in memory/on disks, most frequently being applied to databases, media banks and backup-recovery solutions.

08e1cd60-e373-462a-bdc6-37f952927dab.one liner: If you feel its time you learned object-oriented programming techniques, this is the perfect book for you. Clearly written with practical exercises, its the painless way to learn how to harness the power of OOP in Python.

102c77d1-a4af-47c7-a9af-54e34e55952a.one liner: In computer science, concurrency is a property of systems in which multiple computations can be performed in overlapping time periods. The computations may be executing on multiple cores in the same chip, preemptively time-shared threads on the same processor, or executed on physically separated processors.

3740dc64-7dae-4d86-84dd-76caa751533b.one liner: Software metrics are quantitative data related to software.

5f04c5d0-dc0e-4022-bf87-e36abe47c9e2.one liner: make chosen words or phrases more visually prominent

f0a748a3-033a-4565-8329-452c091ded1a.one liner: Can refer to many different things depending on the use of other tags with it.

eda5f9e5-5218-4726-94eb-c1c336b4b49a.one liner: reStructuredText is a lightweight markup language intended to be highly readable in source format.

f5bf5d2d-c997-44c5-ae00-f258e9baa225.one liner: JPEG is a commonly used method of lossy compression for digital photography (image).

10bdb16c-171d-4dac-b38c-3dbfda8e619f.one liner: A generator is a generalisation of a subroutine, primarily used to simplify the writing of iterators. The yield statement in a generator does not specify a coroutine to jump to, but rather passes a value back to a parent routine.

6d99f54c-1874-4469-91bf-22d048ec0e4b.one liner: Questions related to physical robots in general should use this tag. For other topics, please use one of the more specific tags listed in the wiki of this tag, if appropriate. You may also consider asking your question on robotics stack exchange: http://robotics.stackexchange.com/.

cf7a261c-ad88-4934-bcfc-d1d043650ddd.one liner: Working with geo-spatial data isnt easy, but for many Python developers its essential with the growth of Geographic Information Systems. This superb book takes you from the basic concepts to advanced techniques in accessible steps.

ecec7102-bd77-4663-8d16-dcfd8f687524.name: Bioinformatics with Python Cookbook
ecec7102-bd77-4663-8d16-dcfd8f687524.title: Bioinformatics with Python Cookbook

e11b2cb6-e752-4189-bf33-73c2e22634c1.name: Bulk
e11b2cb6-e752-4189-bf33-73c2e22634c1.one liner: The meaning of bulk is the major portion or greater part of any size, mass, or volume.

223a398f-22e6-41ff-b823-35c35cab0046.name: Mastering Julia
223a398f-22e6-41ff-b823-35c35cab0046.title: Mastering Julia
223a398f-22e6-41ff-b823-35c35cab0046.one liner: Develop your analytical and programming skills further in Julia to solve complex data processing problems

e55a217b-e507-47f7-b23f-827f826c11c9.name: Zope
e55a217b-e507-47f7-b23f-827f826c11c9.one liner: Zope is an open source application server written in the Python programming language. It features a transactional object database (ZODB) which can store not only content and custom data, but also dynamic HTML templates, scripts, a search engine, and relational database (RDBMS) connections and code. It features a strong through-the-web development model, allowing you to update your web site from anywhere made possible by a tightly integrated security model.

bcc75957-4531-48e1-ae78-8c67d2490bf7.name: Software Defined Networking with OpenFlow
bcc75957-4531-48e1-ae78-8c67d2490bf7.title: Software Defined Networking with OpenFlow
bcc75957-4531-48e1-ae78-8c67d2490bf7.one liner: Get hands-on with the platforms and development tools used to build OpenFlow network applications

f45fa73d-6832-4a4f-90f6-f7dd4d22f496.name: Writer
f45fa73d-6832-4a4f-90f6-f7dd4d22f496.one liner: an abstract class, interface or naming convention which is used to state that the given object is used to write data to a file, stream, device or other destination

2d69eb24-a404-472a-884b-f856116ad4ba.one liner: Biopython is a set of freely available tools for biological computation written in Python.

b3fd0b31-626e-4c91-aa40-a5df1f6f58ef.one liner:
outline is a property in CSS, that is used to draw a line around the element.
Question that has the problem related to outline property of CSS.

5eec6b17-ce9a-4c4b-8e81-4ea444775d6b.one liner: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of HTML (Hyper Text Markup Language) and XML (Extensible Markup Language) documents including (but not limited to) colors, layout, and fonts.

9f9131ce-c640-4c73-9ebc-cca8f1887979.name: Ports
9f9131ce-c640-4c73-9ebc-cca8f1887979.one liner: Applications and services use unique ports to communicate with other devices over a network. Ports range from 1 to 65,535.

bb23391d-a584-475c-8a0f-8a3cbaf551c5.one liner: Email is a method of exchanging digital messages from a sender to one or more recipients. Posting to ask why the emails you send are marked as spam is off topic for StackOverflow.

83299fd1-4a82-4d52-acd8-ddbb833b743e.name: Gis
83299fd1-4a82-4d52-acd8-ddbb833b743e.one liner: A Geographic Information System (GIS) captures, stores, analyzes, manages, and presents data that are linked to location(s). The GIS Stack Exchange should be considered for questions with this tag.

c8e2b8a4-65a0-474a-bf63-ff203f7d69e3.one liner: This tag is for general money related issues, such as representation, format, processing, internationalization and localization.

699e33dd-27cd-4da9-9642-28b1a5783b0d.name: Uml
699e33dd-27cd-4da9-9642-28b1a5783b0d.one liner: Unified Modeling Language, an object modeling and specification language used in software engineering.

3ec6de5f-b712-4dff-b7b4-b71a066ac5cb.name: Numpy
3ec6de5f-b712-4dff-b7b4-b71a066ac5cb.one liner: NumPy is a scientific and numerical computing extension to the Python programming language.

733f67b3-129d-4875-a086-833f1720fc39.name: Django Essentials
733f67b3-129d-4875-a086-833f1720fc39.title: Django Essentials
733f67b3-129d-4875-a086-833f1720fc39.one liner: Develop simple web applications with the powerful Django framework.

8004081d-cecd-4a2a-822a-2bfc549895fb.one liner: Reusability is the likelihood and potential for a piece of source code to be reused in other projects

170adc48-71de-4964-a934-5d3c655d624d.name: Dynamic
170adc48-71de-4964-a934-5d3c655d624d.one liner: Dynamic is a widely used term that, in general, describes a decision made by the program at run-time rather than at compile time.

7c078ea1-3a42-4771-bccc-292856748c2a.name: Encode
7c078ea1-3a42-4771-bccc-292856748c2a.one liner: to convert some data (e.g. string, picture) to some representation (e.g. bytes, electrical signals)

4cfe3b68-f8d8-4ae0-b55a-7de4471e697b.name: Python 2.6 Graphics Cookbook
4cfe3b68-f8d8-4ae0-b55a-7de4471e697b.title: Python 2.6 Graphics Cookbook
4cfe3b68-f8d8-4ae0-b55a-7de4471e697b.one liner: Learn how to use Pythons built-in graphics capabilities to create static and animated graphics for a range of real-world purposes. Over 100 recipes take you from basic shape creation to developing interactive GUIs.

1168b00e-a451-4fe1-8cbc-f0d5619e6bbc.name: Alarm
1168b00e-a451-4fe1-8cbc-f0d5619e6bbc.one liner: Anything related to the design and implementation of alarms. An alarm is a form of man-machine interaction where the attention of the user of an application or a system is attracted using an audible, a visual or some other kind of signal (or a combination thereof) in order to make the user aware that some event has happened.

8cf1bb81-3ce5-4bf0-ae28-e940cef7e111.name: Emulator
8cf1bb81-3ce5-4bf0-ae28-e940cef7e111.one liner: An emulator is a system which is designed to perform the duties of a different system.

5b235786-fb08-4fc3-8c97-7bf46383e754.name: Subquery
5b235786-fb08-4fc3-8c97-7bf46383e754.one liner: "subquery" is vague SQL terminology, used to describe when there's either more than one `SELECT` statement in a query, or when used in Data Manipulation Language (DML) statements (IE: DELETE, UPDATE, INSERT, MERGE).  The subquery's SELECT statement is always found within brackets/parenthesis.

66368e71-cd1d-4a4d-ad09-31f0e7c9c10a.name: Key
66368e71-cd1d-4a4d-ad09-31f0e7c9c10a.one liner: A unique identifier used to retrieve a paired value.  Used in hashtables and databases.

5ccc6f59-316d-408c-a35b-48a30414630b.name: Basic
5ccc6f59-316d-408c-a35b-48a30414630b.one liner: BASIC (Beginner’s All-purpose Symbolic Instruction Code) is a family of high-level programming languages designed to be easy to use.

d74ef1a7-c071-486a-b5cb-7f92525c7477.name: Ansible
d74ef1a7-c071-486a-b5cb-7f92525c7477.title: Ansible
d74ef1a7-c071-486a-b5cb-7f92525c7477.one liner: An open source software platform for IT infrastructure administration, configuration management, and software deployment

3e65af7b-46ff-46da-a4ab-0580a0eadcf1.name: Protocols
3e65af7b-46ff-46da-a4ab-0580a0eadcf1.one liner: A common means for (un)related objects to communicate with each other.

a46ebcef-b1b0-4997-80e9-c44db87b6b14.name: Sage
a46ebcef-b1b0-4997-80e9-c44db87b6b14.one liner: Sage (or SageMath) is a suite of open-source applications for mathematics

a24825af-6742-45b3-959e-e732271d46de.name: Command Line
a24825af-6742-45b3-959e-e732271d46de.one liner: A command line is a string given to a command interpreter that tells it actions to take, such as running programs or copying files. The interpreter processes command lines with escapes and substitutions.

fc68eb7e-cac8-4e4b-8200-c94c4bf8e874.name: Let
fc68eb7e-cac8-4e4b-8200-c94c4bf8e874.one liner: LET introduces a list of local variables

9c72c85f-a19b-4383-89b4-76c40bc9c583.one liner:
This tag is used for topics relating to application security and attacks against software.
If your question is not about a specific programming problem, please consider instead asking it at Security.SE: http://security.stackexchange.com

f5df437e-ba06-4b3f-a196-1434b128e8c7.name: Sys
f5df437e-ba06-4b3f-a196-1434b128e8c7.one liner: For questions about the Python module named sys. This tag is also used for questions relating to the Sys namespace - the root namespace for the Microsoft AJAX Library, which contains all fundamental classes and base classes.

3ec7797d-8979-4b29-aa6c-6aefe3ae3e8d.one liner: PEM, (from Privacy Enhanced Mail standard) is a base64 container format for encoding keys and certificates.

3d6accdb-50bf-46e3-a27a-cf5252b8d72d.name: Ipython
3d6accdb-50bf-46e3-a27a-cf5252b8d72d.one liner: IPython is a feature-rich interactive shell for Python.

6e3c97d6-7447-4419-adc6-6b9b1bc6deae.name: Practical Plone 3: A Beginner's Guide to Building Powerful Websites
6e3c97d6-7447-4419-adc6-6b9b1bc6deae.title: Practical Plone 3: A Beginner's Guide to Building Powerful Websites
6e3c97d6-7447-4419-adc6-6b9b1bc6deae.one liner: A beginners practical guide to building Plone websites through graphical interface

50989e26-580d-47fe-b0bc-b70199aa282e.name: Watch
50989e26-580d-47fe-b0bc-b70199aa282e.one liner: Watch refers to observing the status of variables, files or directories for some or all possible actions such as additions, deletions or modifications.

7ebcec77-ae02-4fd0-ac48-e2691f0411f2.name: JavaScript and JSON Essentials
7ebcec77-ae02-4fd0-ac48-e2691f0411f2.title: JavaScript and JSON Essentials
7ebcec77-ae02-4fd0-ac48-e2691f0411f2.one liner: If you fancy a less verbose data format than CSV or XML, then JSON could be for you. This tutorial will teach you about using JSON with JavaScript for effective local storage or Internet transfers.

c6a7c294-354e-45dc-94e0-845922047b5b.name: Google Cloud Storage
c6a7c294-354e-45dc-94e0-845922047b5b.one liner: Google Cloud Storage is a RESTful service for storing and accessing your data on Google's infrastructure. The service combines the performance and scalability of Google's cloud with advanced security and sharing capabilities.

0b57b94b-049d-40fb-bf02-22594957eef3.name: Var
0b57b94b-049d-40fb-bf02-22594957eef3.one liner: var is a keyword in a number of programming languages.

236c4598-1095-4a17-82ed-00a628b0d266.name: Return
236c4598-1095-4a17-82ed-00a628b0d266.one liner: A return statement causes execution to leave the current subroutine and resume at the point in the code immediately after where the subroutine was called, known as its return address. The return address is saved, usually on the process's call stack, as part of the operation of making the subroutine call. Some programming languages allow a function to specify a return value to be passed back to the code that called the function.

82735ea1-b858-495b-9767-c672055b502f.name: Sqlite
82735ea1-b858-495b-9767-c672055b502f.one liner: SQLite is a software library that implements a self-contained, serverless, zero-configuration, transactional SQL database engine.

9fbfb5e9-1e01-4e45-b0f3-7801955c654c.name: Profile
9fbfb5e9-1e01-4e45-b0f3-7801955c654c.one liner: Profiles are part of .NET Framework. Profiles allows you simply manage your users.

238d461d-f483-4ed7-9acd-aeeab3023160.name: Npm
238d461d-f483-4ed7-9acd-aeeab3023160.one liner: NPM is the official package manager for Node.js, the non-blocking, asynchronous I/O framework that uses Google's V8 JavaScript engine. It can be used to install and publish CommonJS modules and JavaScript-based CLI programs.

ca7a05e1-2515-4e0f-b747-5f6cf9b0dabb.name: Strip
ca7a05e1-2515-4e0f-b747-5f6cf9b0dabb.one liner: "strip" refers to the process of removing (stripping) certain characters from a string.  A common example is removing trailing whitespace characters.

f5e6d652-6fc9-4f17-b8fd-cab875b201b4.name: Search
f5e6d652-6fc9-4f17-b8fd-cab875b201b4.one liner: Questions about search algorithm mechanics and implementation.  *NOT* for questions about using search tools within an API (e.g. Google, Bing, Facebook).

a79e64ae-a667-464f-9370-0cf936656602.one liner: Documentation is information on aspects of software or hardware, including its intended purpose, functionality, and maintenance. Documentation can exist in many different forms and formats, but its aim is always to educate.

62385acf-c41c-437a-8ffb-bdea9cbe0cfb.one liner: Sensors convert physical stimuli into signals, which can be sampled by other subsystems.  They let the rest of the system to collect information about the physical world.

8a92fdb9-9617-420e-92f9-e61f859ba054.one liner: An application that runs stand alone in a desktop or laptop computer. Contrast with "Web-based application," which requires the Web browser to run.

1337355f-0cb5-442c-9746-2ac7f02b4d3f.one liner: Catalyst is a Perl web application framework, similar to Ruby on Rails, Spring (Java), and Maypole.

f0d19bdb-f502-42d2-8d52-b6b48bf739f8.one liner: To append is to join or add on to the end of something.

dce1ee56-421b-4fe3-8a30-fb494b1a6766.one liner: In signal processing, sampling is the reduction of a continuous signal to a discrete signal.

5a916f59-ee54-4b06-8bfc-ddbbc34e4f0b.name: Queue
5a916f59-ee54-4b06-8bfc-ddbbc34e4f0b.one liner: A queue is an ordered, first-in-first-out data structure. Typical implementations of queues support pushing elements to the back and popping them off the front position.

d0d765ac-6832-43e6-9213-85bd47f864ce.name: Apache
d0d765ac-6832-43e6-9213-85bd47f864ce.one liner: The Apache HTTP Server, commonly referred to as Apache, is an open-source HTTP server for modern operating systems including UNIX, its variants and Windows. Apache is a secure, efficient and extensible server that provides HTTP services in sync with the current HTTP standards.

61658809-28ef-4c65-b76d-f84694e90e19.name: Development Environment
61658809-28ef-4c65-b76d-f84694e90e19.one liner: A development environment is an integrated set of programming tools, usually centered around a text editor.

1f5fd50c-8c66-4f89-a84d-57ef940b4a0e.name: Absolute
1f5fd50c-8c66-4f89-a84d-57ef940b4a0e.one liner: In CSS, the `absolute` property will cause an element to be positioned relative to its first non-static parent element.

4842477a-5349-4594-bfaf-c035f5272714.name: Asynchronous
4842477a-5349-4594-bfaf-c035f5272714.one liner:
Asynchronous programming is simply allowing some portions of code to be executed simultaneously. There is also a popular JavaScript library named async.

It makes your applications perform better, be more responsive, and use the resources of the system they are running on to the fullest extent.

f6da2d51-55a6-4eba-abf6-1e27bb57ce57.name: Svm
f6da2d51-55a6-4eba-abf6-1e27bb57ce57.one liner: Support vector machines (SVMs) are a set of related supervised learning methods that analyze data and recognize patterns, used for classification and regression analysis.

ce6a1fcb-3911-4eb7-9686-3dbc6c3b1aca.name: Memcached
ce6a1fcb-3911-4eb7-9686-3dbc6c3b1aca.one liner: Memcached is a simple distributed object cache that caches information in memory, and can be used to improve the performance of dynamic web applications by reducing access time and database load.

53b819d7-d835-4e5d-956f-06b6c40eb58c.name: Highlight
53b819d7-d835-4e5d-956f-06b6c40eb58c.one liner: is for questions involving the highlighting of text or other visual elements.

002fab24-32c8-4e59-8b73-c471927ab886.name: Publish
002fab24-32c8-4e59-8b73-c471927ab886.one liner: To publish is the process to make something publicly available. This might be the stuff that happens inside a CRM system after editing an article and finally publishing it, or publishing a project artifact.

8c2a04ba-0e01-42a8-9243-be42d4b5c263.name: Leveldb
8c2a04ba-0e01-42a8-9243-be42d4b5c263.one liner: LevelDB is a key-value storage library written by Google that provides an ordered mapping from string keys to string values.

13d57e80-26cb-44cd-950e-9ba807be48d7.name: Active Directory
13d57e80-26cb-44cd-950e-9ba807be48d7.one liner: Active Directory (AD) is a directory service created by Microsoft. It stores all information and settings for a deployment in a central database. AD allows administrators to assign policies, deploy and update software. AD networks can vary from a small installation with a few computers, users and printers to tens of thousands of users, many different network domains and large server farms spanning many geographical locations.

781a2e93-c0b3-4b92-853f-c71aba862a3d.name: Camera
781a2e93-c0b3-4b92-853f-c71aba862a3d.one liner: In the real world, a camera is a device that takes physical or digital photos. In the virtual world, it is used to aim at virtual objects and or move through a virtual scene.

ff346552-f33b-4c35-9f90-d467cb1921ea.name: Boilerplate
ff346552-f33b-4c35-9f90-d467cb1921ea.one liner: In computer programming, boilerplate is the term used to describe sections of code that have to be included in many places with little or no alteration.

ae669c34-684c-46d0-90de-392b65bce177.one liner: Hadoop is an Apache open-source project that provides software for reliable and scalable distributed computing. The project itself includes a variety of other complementary additions.

898a093c-74b2-4777-b04a-7ee2be733028.one liner: Portable code can be run with little to no modification in multiple environments.  Portable applications can be run from e.g. a USB drive without modifying a computer's environment.

b4ee2dd0-7afc-4a55-9e2d-7a0aa6d5cf79.one liner: Theming is the modification of the user interface of a software application without affecting its functionality

67a95f50-afce-44bb-af08-00d325b9f1fc.one liner: throw is a keyword in various languages used for signaling an exception.

6b3fbd23-2b13-4098-9eca-60ed12759ba0.name: Proof
6b3fbd23-2b13-4098-9eca-60ed12759ba0.one liner: A mathematical proof is any mathematical argument which demonstrates the truth of a mathematical statement. Informal proofs are typically rendered in natural language and are held true by consensus; formal proofs are typically rendered symbolically and can be checked mechanically. "Proofs" can be valid or invalid; only the former kind constitutes actual proof, whereas the latter kind usually refers to a flawed attempt at proof.

c0cd8e6d-6b40-400c-bcb8-dbf5b16733e7.name: Commercial
c0cd8e6d-6b40-400c-bcb8-dbf5b16733e7.one liner: Commercial software is software that is sold or intended for use by commercial entities.

4888b5f8-5955-4261-aa54-9f50f916ab96.name: Properties
4888b5f8-5955-4261-aa54-9f50f916ab96.one liner: A property, in some object-oriented programming languages, is a special sort of class member, intermediate between a field (or data member) and a method. Properties are read and written like fields, but property reads and writes are (usually) translated to get and set method calls.

23bf23b4-7c5c-4c72-abce-47ad9fb437b3.name: Drag
23bf23b4-7c5c-4c72-abce-47ad9fb437b3.one liner: In computer graphical user interfaces, drag is the first phase of a drag-and-drop operation.  This involves selecting a virtual object by "grabbing" it and dragging it with the mouse down to a different location or onto another virtual object.  An instance of some object relating to what was grabbed is usually brought with the drag operation.

f439a529-9534-4e14-afa4-bb3e6dacb4d7.name: Viewport
f439a529-9534-4e14-afa4-bb3e6dacb4d7.one liner: A viewport is a rectangular viewing region in computer graphics, or a term used for optical components. It has several definitions in different contexts.A viewport is a region of the screen used to display a portion of the total image to be shown. Also it can be a group of regions that together make  one layout.

b9914d77-badd-40f5-80df-81a02b06a93f.name: Payload
b9914d77-badd-40f5-80df-81a02b06a93f.one liner: The part of the packet, message or code that carries the data. In information security, the term payload generally refers to the part of malicious code that performs the destructive operation.

003b87a7-7b99-4f7e-85e4-5341a531b5aa.name: Permissions
003b87a7-7b99-4f7e-85e4-5341a531b5aa.one liner: Permissions define the operations that authenticated users are allowed to perform on file systems, databases and other computer systems.

a2989124-ccbe-4dba-a78a-1f2dbe45bbf5.name: Virtualization
a2989124-ccbe-4dba-a78a-1f2dbe45bbf5.one liner: Virtualization is the creation of a virtual (rather than actual) version of something, such as a hardware platform, operating system, a storage device or network resources

8d608a2f-c40c-442a-8180-6d15d908e6dd.name: Interactive
8d608a2f-c40c-442a-8180-6d15d908e6dd.one liner: Interactive software accepts and responds to input from humans, in contrast to noninteractive software, which operate without human contact.

f0ef158c-27a1-4d94-8560-dcbd11e79969.one liner: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) is a well-established protocol for conducting file operations (such as transferring files) over a TCP-based network such as the Internet.

964f8ea4-e91e-4ba9-af26-33b83ceb00f8.one liner: Open Source C++ Map Rendering toolkit

1a0f157a-1f7e-4005-b6df-1986cbd40896.one liner: An architectural approach to developing a single application as a suite of small services.

28ca3b8b-c2cb-4236-b2a4-b4569832db86.one liner: Cron is a time-based job scheduler running as a daemon process in Unix-like computer operating systems.

55e2cb8e-2534-4ef5-a9ff-a406c636a48a.one liner: Enterprise refers to software intended to facilitate the operation of one or more types of business entities, such as cooperatives, companies, universities, and government organizations.

7bf59c3b-d150-45c1-b681-f08d3252b167.one liner: Objective-C version for iOS & OS X of Cocos2d. Cocos2d is a framework for building 2D games and graphical applications.

5dcdb911-71af-4922-8090-a14384ef2094.name: Pointers
5dcdb911-71af-4922-8090-a14384ef2094.one liner: A pointer is a data type that "points to" another value stored in memory using its address.

0da0191d-b71d-4800-b4cd-994d67700220.name: Pebble Watch
0da0191d-b71d-4800-b4cd-994d67700220.one liner: Pebble Watch is a smartwatch with an e-paper display.

2e3228d4-cb7e-480f-83b5-69fc62ac13ea.name: Extjs
2e3228d4-cb7e-480f-83b5-69fc62ac13ea.one liner: Sencha ExtJS is a JavaScript framework for building Rich Internet Applications (RIAs).

df9c38be-f032-4dd1-a5f3-c3575744cdee.name: Pypy
df9c38be-f032-4dd1-a5f3-c3575744cdee.one liner: PyPy is a fast, very compliant, self-hosting implementation of the Python language.

1c1a4845-e884-41f5-a959-02d9943b909f.name: Regression
1c1a4845-e884-41f5-a959-02d9943b909f.one liner: Regression analysis is a collection of statistical techniques for modeling and predicting one or multiple variables based on other data.

c1959ac0-5844-474a-97fc-c45cb9057588.name: Geospatial
c1959ac0-5844-474a-97fc-c45cb9057588.one liner: pertaining to the geographic location and characteristics of natural or constructed features and boundaries on, above, or below the earth's surface; esp. referring to data that is geographic and spatial in nature.

26b7a3bc-d9b3-4c74-b38d-163b07563326.name: C++
26b7a3bc-d9b3-4c74-b38d-163b07563326.one liner: C++ is a general-purpose programming language based on C. Use this tag for questions about code compiled with a C++ compiler.

35155242-f194-437c-a587-4b0680894d8a.name: Wordnet
35155242-f194-437c-a587-4b0680894d8a.one liner: WordNet is a lexical database for the English language. It groups English words into sets of synonyms called synsets, provides short, general definitions, and records the various semantic relations between these synonym sets.

4d3b4b81-f6ba-4ecb-acc0-829aa6fd70ae.name: Cd
4d3b4b81-f6ba-4ecb-acc0-829aa6fd70ae.one liner: cd is the "change directory" command offered by most shells. For CD-ROMs, please use the [cd-rom] tag.

0e3119a2-40c8-4f33-85c4-af3a8d1e6efa.name: Algorithm
0e3119a2-40c8-4f33-85c4-af3a8d1e6efa.one liner: An algorithm is a sequence of well-defined steps that defines an abstract solution to a problem. Use this tag when your issue is related to algorithm design.

5ed3ca30-2203-4972-a829-0269d2b600a0.name: Newsletter
5ed3ca30-2203-4972-a829-0269d2b600a0.one liner: A email or document containing a one or more news stories that will be distributed to a group of subscribers.

8968aec3-d074-4ce1-a83a-6c52e0155277.name: Overriding
8968aec3-d074-4ce1-a83a-6c52e0155277.one liner: Method overriding, in object oriented programming, is a language feature that allows a subclass or child class to provide a specific implementation of a method that is already provided by one of its superclasses or parent classes.

bdffaa2a-52e6-4b2e-9c3c-15b24c8827ae.one liner: Gensim is a free Python framework designed to automatically extract semantic topics from documents, as efficiently (computer-wise) and painlessly (human-wise) as possible.

8107235e-518e-4854-be00-26a9dcbf9c9a.name: Ldap
8107235e-518e-4854-be00-26a9dcbf9c9a.one liner: Lightweight Directory Access Protocol, an application protocol for reading and editing directories over an IP network.

9648ae9d-1d11-4db3-85ac-986b059ad17b.one liner: Iterations are the successive repetitions in loops such as for, foreach or while. Questions with this tag are often concerned about how to best handle a collection of data.

affcca65-01ef-40c5-ada6-dc908e4e8e7e.title: Python for Data Scientists

408fad69-8f9c-453a-9dd4-352cec6d6d31.name: Multithreading
408fad69-8f9c-453a-9dd4-352cec6d6d31.one liner: Multi-threading is ability of computer or a program to perform work concurrently or asynchronously by utilizing multiple concurrent streams of execution (generally referred to as threads).

52ca4969-57b1-4d0f-b97d-321e33d392d2.one liner: A dependency exists between two elements if changes to the definition of one element may cause changes to the other.

ab9ac750-9329-4192-a9fa-5e7cac34075a.one liner: An application designed to run in the computer environment (machine language and OS) being referenced. The term is used to contrast a native application with an interpreted one such as a Java application that is not native to a single platform.

78cd3f15-dbd3-42e2-803a-455bf7480011.one liner: The Content-Type entity-header field indicates the media type of the entity-body sent to the recipient or, in the case of the HEAD method, the media type that would have been sent had the request been a GET.

196b63d2-6a62-4707-bdd3-d7cc98d8c69e.name: Firewall
196b63d2-6a62-4707-bdd3-d7cc98d8c69e.one liner: A firewall is a network security device or software.  Please specify the brand and model or version in your question.

37b9532b-d534-48c9-a007-e2383390a185.name: Exif
37b9532b-d534-48c9-a007-e2383390a185.one liner: Exchangeable image file format is a standard for storing metadata such as camera, lens, and geo information in JPEG and TIFF files

f565cfec-7f17-4f0f-b791-697811a31538.name: Move
f565cfec-7f17-4f0f-b791-697811a31538.one liner: Usually refers to C++ move-semantics; consider using that tag instead. Move semantics is the C++11 feature that allows a copy operation to be replaced by a more efficient "move" when the source object is an rvalue (typically a temporary).

c0297232-b642-4d81-b65a-c30a6d3110a6.name: Pipeline
c0297232-b642-4d81-b65a-c30a6d3110a6.one liner: A pipeline is a sequence of functions (or the equivalent thereof), composed so that the output of one is good input for the next, in order to create compound transformation. Famously, in shell syntax expressed as `command | command2 | command3`. The term is also used in computer architecture to define a sequence of serial stages that may execute in parallel over elements being fed into pipe, in order to increase the overall throughput.

b4fa43f4-7938-4cb1-8e11-379639ec8f7b.name: Replace
b4fa43f4-7938-4cb1-8e11-379639ec8f7b.one liner: Replacing is the action of searching a string for a sub-string and replacing it with a different string.

dfb1c38c-b5b1-4da8-9407-01dafb44d1f4.name: Wolfram Mathematica
dfb1c38c-b5b1-4da8-9407-01dafb44d1f4.one liner: Wolfram Mathematica is a computer algebra system and programming language from Wolfram Research. Mathematica has its own StackExchange site at http://mathematica.stackexchange.com/.

0be2f837-921b-4526-902e-403c0990c465.name: Gil
0be2f837-921b-4526-902e-403c0990c465.one liner: The Global Interpreter Lock (GIL) is a Python implementation detail that ensures thread safety by disallowing concurrent execution of Python code. Python versions such as CPython (the Python reference implementation), Stackless Python and PyPy have the GIL; versions such as Jython and IronPython do not.

bb506f1d-9cd6-4794-89f6-344aa56dca67.name: Time
bb506f1d-9cd6-4794-89f6-344aa56dca67.one liner: Measuring the time it takes to perform an operation. Also, questions related to obtaining the current time, calculating on times, formatting and parsing times, etc.

b13fff4a-8835-4500-903c-e34354f85573.name: Live
b13fff4a-8835-4500-903c-e34354f85573.one liner: .live() function in jQuery attaches an event handler for all elements which match the current selector, now and in the future. It was deprecated in jQuery 1.7 and removed in jQuery 1.9.

8b309095-4a08-42e1-88b4-fc8b3faace5a.name: Customization
8b309095-4a08-42e1-88b4-fc8b3faace5a.one liner: Modifying the default state of an application to suit a user's preferences or to address the unique requirements of a particular objective.

6cbeba85-7d6d-435c-be7f-5fa5ee6eaa8f.one liner: The attributes tag should be used for any issues relating to a property of an object, element, or file, etc.

513a4604-6c5c-4759-8b3f-6c696b350fb1.one liner: Immutability is the inability to modify data after it has been created. Modifications are instead made by copying the data. A property of immutable data is that it is *referentially transparent*.

79c1e918-795e-406d-aacb-ebe7c48078e6.one liner: Software testing is any activity aimed at evaluating an attribute or capability of a program or system and determining that it meets its required results.

139ed74e-ce6c-456e-83b6-bba93d864ff6.one liner: A combination is a selection of objects from a larger collection in no particular order.

3ba9e4b4-7b06-4be9-ae3e-7fc2f7c25d17.name: Pixels
3ba9e4b4-7b06-4be9-ae3e-7fc2f7c25d17.one liner: In digital imaging, a pixel, or pel (picture element), is a single point in a raster image, or the smallest addressable screen element in a display device; it is the smallest unit of picture that can be represented or controlled.

0e2882dc-c4f6-4f5a-a2b9-5f12b18f3878.one liner: In logic, quantification is the binding of a variable ranging over a domain. The variable thereby becomes bound by an operator called a quantifier.

6be4faea-dfd9-4869-86e8-ea5232dd82f2.one liner: Topic models describe the frequency of topics in documents and text. A "topic" is a group of words which tend to occur together.

e51d60b6-6a8a-4a21-8f29-2895e89b0bd3.one liner: Questions about programming software agents or programming in an agent-oriented environment.

e2e54ecc-1e2e-4761-9c65-80e361783f18.one liner: The internals tag denotes questions about how things work, as opposed to how to accomplish something specific. Of course, how something works underneath will have practical implications, but internals questions aren't about how to do something; rather, how to understand something.

6f6d48f4-037b-4a4b-912c-eaf7d49058d2.one liner: A Unix pipe connects file descriptors of two processes. A pipe is created with the POSIX pipe() function declared in <unistd.h>. Shells provide pipe creation between processes using "|".

664872e7-19ba-404f-8087-9e95659c9513.title: Building a Koa Web Application, Part 1
664872e7-19ba-404f-8087-9e95659c9513.one liner: This two part post series will briefly show you how to use Koa, a bleeding edge Node.js web application framework, to create a web application using MongoDB as its database. Koa has a low footprint and tries to be as unopinionated as possible.

5c539516-0c9e-44a4-8a80-0d5be66b0844.name: Stack
5c539516-0c9e-44a4-8a80-0d5be66b0844.one liner: A stack is a last in, first out (LIFO) abstract data type and data structure.  Perhaps the most common use of stacks is to store subroutine arguments and return addresses.

6f803f27-7a92-4719-83f1-7a22e1847fec.name: Icmp
6f803f27-7a92-4719-83f1-7a22e1847fec.one liner: Internet Control Message Protocol, designed for control and diagnostic messages. Used by common diagnostic tools like ping or traceroute.

8b306aa1-9a48-44d1-b129-4cf4528ab20c.name: Javascript
8b306aa1-9a48-44d1-b129-4cf4528ab20c.one liner: JavaScript (not to be confused with Java) is a dynamic, weakly-typed language typically used for client-side scripting. Use this tag for questions regarding ECMAScript and its various dialects/implementations (excluding ActionScript). Unless a tag for a framework/library is also included, a pure JavaScript answer is expected.

ac930e41-cac2-4854-960c-9c601809bd5a.name: Splash Screen
ac930e41-cac2-4854-960c-9c601809bd5a.one liner: The splash screen is a rectangular or full screen image which appears while a software product is loading (OS, CAD, game, etc). Often it contains a progress bar, indicating the loading phases.

ba200e5f-4982-4aca-a745-483072506c5f.name: Uart
ba200e5f-4982-4aca-a745-483072506c5f.one liner: A Universal Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter (UART) is used for serial communications over a computer or peripheral device serial port.

9e4f6728-b15e-4602-ae99-da9c2beb52c6.one liner: Natural language processing (NLP) is a subfield of artificial intelligence and machine learning that involves transforming or extracting useful information from natural language data.

3cd41779-14a4-4d92-b9b5-c6bc185987b1.name: Ironpython
3cd41779-14a4-4d92-b9b5-c6bc185987b1.one liner: IronPython is an open-source implementation of the Python programming language which is tightly integrated with the .NET Framework. IronPython can use the .NET Framework and Python libraries, and other .NET languages can use Python code just as easily.

2d30c1bc-aada-4b02-bc1a-e4da0d8b40ea.name: Vector
2d30c1bc-aada-4b02-bc1a-e4da0d8b40ea.one liner: The Vector class implements a grow-able array of objects. Like an array, it contains components that can be accessed using an integer index. However, the size of a Vector can grow or shrink as needed to accommodate adding and removing items after the Vector has been created. Use 'vector-graphics' for graphic display.

9390939e-cb1e-4456-b54d-3848ab2d3431.name: Malware
9390939e-cb1e-4456-b54d-3848ab2d3431.one liner: Malware is any malicious software, script, or code developed or used for the purpose of compromising or harming information assets without the owner’s informed consent. Examples include viruses, worms, spyware, keyloggers, backdoors, etc.

9b0c9fe2-3f2a-4100-85e8-41230b9f44a7.name: Arcmap
9b0c9fe2-3f2a-4100-85e8-41230b9f44a7.one liner: ArcMap is a piece of software within the ArcGIS suite.  It is utilized for cartographic production as well as geospatial analysis.

2563b964-542d-4fbe-a774-6b4eb0c520c6.one liner: GitHub is a web-based hosting service for software development projects that use Git for version control.

efb1921a-ecda-4804-b182-1a819ab95e9e.name: Size
efb1921a-ecda-4804-b182-1a819ab95e9e.one liner: Size in computing can refer to various dimensions: size in bits, in bytes, in pixels, in memory, in disk space, etc.  Please don't use this tag in your posts - it's too generic to usefully categorise your question.

ee7b5417-6455-499c-a3d9-8788bcee7642.name: Ide
ee7b5417-6455-499c-a3d9-8788bcee7642.one liner: IDEs (Integrated Development Environment) are computer programs that facilitate efficient software development by providing features beyond those of a simple text editor.

81ad65e3-e1de-4b2a-884d-02858b529d48.name: Ssh
81ad65e3-e1de-4b2a-884d-02858b529d48.one liner: Secure Shell - a network protocol for exchanging data throughout secure channel with most common uses of remote command execution (remote shell/console) and file transfer.

d2caea5a-3612-4121-a4c9-e2deb0c7676c.one liner: To "Embed" is to place a software module, object, or application into your own application, webpage, or hardware device.

c91398c7-b2cb-4169-b8e3-065953e4ed1e.name: Kivy: Interactive Applications in Python
c91398c7-b2cb-4169-b8e3-065953e4ed1e.title: Kivy: Interactive Applications in Python
c91398c7-b2cb-4169-b8e3-065953e4ed1e.one liner: For Python developers this is the clearest guide to the interactive world of Kivi, ideal for meeting modern expectations of tablets and smartphones. From building a UI to controlling complex multi-touch events, its all here.

c5a12d5f-a47c-4cd5-9081-606a5ab856e4.name: Linear
c5a12d5f-a47c-4cd5-9081-606a5ab856e4.one liner: Linear algebra is a field in mathematics dealing with arithmetic operations over vectors and matrices. Prominent existing libraries for performing such operations are BLAS and LAPACK. There are also dedicated software for vectorizing operations on vectors and matrices. Examples of such software are Matlab, Octave and Mathematica.

cda0fa18-d036-4b24-9362-ff68ca006a5f.name: Cherrypy
cda0fa18-d036-4b24-9362-ff68ca006a5f.one liner: CherryPy is a pythonic, object-oriented HTTP framework. See cherrypy.org for more information.

f6c908fe-4206-4f31-b7fc-eb799775dedc.name: Node.Js
f6c908fe-4206-4f31-b7fc-eb799775dedc.one liner: Node.js is an event-based, non-blocking, asynchronous I/O framework that uses Google's V8 JavaScript engine. It is used for developing applications that make heavy use of the ability to run JavaScript both on the client, as well as on server side and therefore benefit from the re-usability of code and the lack of context switching.

5a4f2c01-a375-4f6f-83b6-f32ae6aab361.name: Keyboard
5a4f2c01-a375-4f6f-83b6-f32ae6aab361.one liner: A text input device. Utilize this tag to ask programming questions regarding reading input from it or blinking the lights, etc.

2e4ad63d-6404-4d27-b751-eb4da3ab14b4.name: Ode
2e4ad63d-6404-4d27-b751-eb4da3ab14b4.one liner: ODE (ordinary differential equation) is a differential equation where the unknown function only has one independent variable and its derivatives.

73cde105-269e-4053-9664-1761a0538566.one liner: Pymc is a Python module for providing Bayesian statistical models and algorithms.

7568759b-7eec-41ee-bd29-3b2e59f7744f.one liner: A form of data processing in which multiple calculations are carried out simultaneously.

12f47c4b-e95d-495f-8889-fa345c491c75.name: Decorator
12f47c4b-e95d-495f-8889-fa345c491c75.one liner: Decorator is an object-oriented design pattern that allows adding behavior to existing classes in a dynamic fashion.

84473809-8550-4df5-bc98-58f6b98e10e7.name: Directory
84473809-8550-4df5-bc98-58f6b98e10e7.one liner: A directory or folder is a virtual container within a digital file system, in which groups of computer files and other directories can be kept and organized.

7f29e0b3-a788-49a4-86b6-341abbea2b2e.name: Web Crawler
7f29e0b3-a788-49a4-86b6-341abbea2b2e.one liner: A Web crawler (also known as Web spider) is a computer program that browses the World Wide Web in a methodical, automated manner or in an orderly fashion. Other terms for Web crawlers are ants, automatic indexers, bots, Web spiders, Web robots, or – especially in the FOAF community – Web scutters.

717d51a0-73cc-4fee-a5fb-20b5be19c689.name: Bit
717d51a0-73cc-4fee-a5fb-20b5be19c689.one liner: A bit is a single binary digit.

086af773-e1d3-4be4-936a-256910d0dfab.name: Scapy
086af773-e1d3-4be4-936a-256910d0dfab.one liner: Scapy is a powerful interactive packet manipulation tool, packet generator, network scanner, network discovery, packet sniffer, etc. It specializes in forging and decoding packets in almost any protocol. It uses the Python interpreter as a command board, which means you can use the Python language directly - assign variables, use loops, define functions, etc.

739e071b-c68e-4c0d-b346-b042e289ce8d.name: Base
739e071b-c68e-4c0d-b346-b042e289ce8d.one liner: A number whose powers are used to represent other numbers (e.g. base 10 = decimal representation)

2d55fcfe-5933-4b1a-89a8-f4da885c39a3.one liner: This is the perfect book for refining your Python skills through learning best practices and the latest development techniques. Packed with real-world examples and written by an expert, this is the authoritative tutorial.

3ac76d1a-1fba-4828-89cc-5cb48809e2bb.name: Instagram
3ac76d1a-1fba-4828-89cc-5cb48809e2bb.one liner: A free photo sharing program that allows users to take a photo, apply a digital filter to it and then share it on social networking services.

8339b98b-45c2-4966-870a-69dfa86c39f4.name: Led
8339b98b-45c2-4966-870a-69dfa86c39f4.one liner: A light-emitting diode (LED) is a semiconductor light source. LEDs are used as indicator lamps in many devices.

e189343d-ef62-4702-96dd-33e9ad0f0a17.name: Computer Science
e189343d-ef62-4702-96dd-33e9ad0f0a17.one liner: Computer science (CS) is the science behind programming. It is the study of the theoretical foundations of information and computation and of practical techniques for their implementation and application in computer systems.

7915156c-6b71-4fc0-8158-8b5e5636dce5.name: Leaflet.js Essentials
7915156c-6b71-4fc0-8158-8b5e5636dce5.title: Leaflet.js Essentials
7915156c-6b71-4fc0-8158-8b5e5636dce5.one liner: Create interactive, mobile-friendly mapping applications using the incredibly light yet powerful Leaflet.js platform.

18f26132-0702-414e-947d-f19cc30bb8d0.name: Signals
18f26132-0702-414e-947d-f19cc30bb8d0.one liner: A signal is a notification to a process that an event occurred. Signals are sometimes described as software interrupts. Signals are analogous to hardware interrupts in that they interrupt the normal flow of execution of a program; in most cases, it is not possible to predict exactly when a signal will arrive. They are defined in the C standards and extended in POSIX, but many other programming languages/systems provide access to them as well.

6243f763-8974-4fbc-b5f4-b244b5c0e724.name: Random
6243f763-8974-4fbc-b5f4-b244b5c0e724.one liner: This tag is for questions pertaining to random numbers and their generators, whether pseudo-random or truly random.

e303efda-acc7-4e17-aeea-b44db6eae147.name: Member
e303efda-acc7-4e17-aeea-b44db6eae147.one liner: A member is an element of an object in the object-oriented programming paradigm.

387c5015-1e61-42c0-ad57-2b8a2f118d1d.name: Exploit
387c5015-1e61-42c0-ad57-2b8a2f118d1d.one liner: An exploit is a piece of software, a chunk of data, or sequence of commands that takes advantage of a bug, glitch, or vulnerability in order to cause unintended or unanticipated behavior to occur.  This frequently includes such things as gaining control of a computer system, allowing privilege escalation, or a denial of service attack.

da896c57-bfeb-4dc6-b0f2-11decc6a8a86.name: Code Quality
da896c57-bfeb-4dc6-b0f2-11decc6a8a86.one liner: Code quality is a measure of how well a set of code balances qualities of maintainability, performance, and style.

916c0aea-118a-445d-9263-ac648137b229.name: Go
916c0aea-118a-445d-9263-ac648137b229.one liner: Go, also called golang, is an open source programming language initially developed at Google. It is a statically-typed language with syntax loosely derived from C, adding automatic memory management, type safety, some dynamic-typing capabilities, additional built-in types such as variable-length arrays and key-value maps, and a large standard library.

8588145e-8868-45ab-8c54-e5fe2b9e8828.name: Mocking
8588145e-8868-45ab-8c54-e5fe2b9e8828.one liner: Mocking and faking are ways to isolate code or components to ensure that unit tests run against the testable unit of code only without actually utilizing other components or dependencies of an application. Mocking differs from faking in that a mock can be inspected to assert the results of a test.

f8861971-0e40-4715-8205-7741c11aea86.name: Marker
f8861971-0e40-4715-8205-7741c11aea86.one liner: Google Map Marker (using in making Google Maps)

6387b5d3-7b06-4129-99a4-da5a37c34338.name: Matlab
6387b5d3-7b06-4129-99a4-da5a37c34338.one liner: MATLAB is a high-level language and interactive programming environment for numerical computation and visualization developed by MathWorks.

2062758d-d3e1-4d60-89be-cc5678da1947.name: Urllib
2062758d-d3e1-4d60-89be-cc5678da1947.one liner:
Python module providing a high-level interface for fetching data across the World Wide Web,
predecessor to urllib2. In Python 3, `urllib2` and `urllib` have been reorganized and merged into `urllib`.

9d1fae72-5b8b-4f2a-9ba4-821f0030a027.name: Scale
9d1fae72-5b8b-4f2a-9ba4-821f0030a027.one liner: The scale tag is mostly used for questions that relate to proportional resizing of images or UI elements.

ea427474-33e0-47d9-8c14-b803c471fad8.name: Ethernet
ea427474-33e0-47d9-8c14-b803c471fad8.one liner: Ethernet is a set of networking technologies widely used to interconnect computers.

42a20544-4ddc-4a1d-97e8-ca950dc9c137.title: Learning Website Development with Django
