d36022df-acf1-48f1-a882-2a5e48a13193.name: Curl
d36022df-acf1-48f1-a882-2a5e48a13193.one liner: cURL is a computer software project providing a library and command-line tool for transferring data using various protocols such as HTTP, FTP and Telnet. The cURL project produces two products, libcurl and cURL. It was first released in 1997.

68a1fe9c-9d1c-45b5-a164-5bc78898378d.name: Wine
68a1fe9c-9d1c-45b5-a164-5bc78898378d.one liner: Wine lets you run Windows software on other operating systems. With Wine, you can install and run these applications just like you would in Windows.

6d75a10c-05d7-4094-a90d-efad6de1dc99.name: Forwarding
6d75a10c-05d7-4094-a90d-efad6de1dc99.one liner:
Port forwarding or port mapping is a name given to the combined technique of

*    translating the address or port number of a packet to a new destination
*    possibly accepting such packet(s) in a packet filter (firewall)
*    forwarding the packet according to the routing table.

5b154977-98a5-4c58-ad92-7e75115f6492.name: Redundancy
5b154977-98a5-4c58-ad92-7e75115f6492.one liner: Redundancy is the duplication of critical components or functions of a system with the intention of increasing reliability of the system, usually in the case of a backup or fail-safe.

fb6b26b7-853d-4ec3-a82f-dfde7c7e23db.name: Editor
fb6b26b7-853d-4ec3-a82f-dfde7c7e23db.one liner: This tag relates to text editors, source code editors and programs specifically designed for modifying plain text files used in computer programming.

72396cff-9edc-4fb1-9204-4c815850cefc.name: Wsgi
72396cff-9edc-4fb1-9204-4c815850cefc.one liner: WSGI is a python standard Web Server Gateway Interface

3256c743-65e6-4acf-9897-29dba0d23ba1.name: Switching
3256c743-65e6-4acf-9897-29dba0d23ba1.one liner: A switch is a telecommunication device that receives a message from any device connected to it and then transmits the message only to the device for which the message was meant. This makes the switch a more intelligent device than a hub (which receives a message and then transmits it to all the other devices on its network). The network switch plays an integral part in most modern Ethernet local area networks (LANs)

0ea0988f-c54b-4aa2-a2d3-92815a0a6451.name: Linkedin
0ea0988f-c54b-4aa2-a2d3-92815a0a6451.one liner:
A tool used for finding business/networking connections, such as for suggesting job candidates.  Used for questions regarding LinkedIn's APIs.

Do not ask questions about LinkedIn's terms of service, problems with registering for a service with them, or what APIs they will be offering in the future. They are not appropriate for asking on StackOverflow, *even if* LinkedIn appeared to direct you here.

63340f1d-be61-4960-8acb-1a1c9765c00d.one liner: An area of memory (RAM or disk based) for which to perform operations.

0f43a1ef-3a04-429b-90c5-9f57550757f2.one liner: In computing, a skin is a custom graphical appearance preset package achieved by the use of a graphical user interface (GUI) that can be applied to specific computer software, operating system, and websites to suit the purpose, topic, or tastes of different users. The process of writing or applying such a skin is known as skinning.

1ed46c24-f242-40d9-92e3-476720526141.one liner: Collision detection is the problem of determining if geometric objects intersect. It is an important topic in computer graphics, in CAD/CAM, in dynamical simulation, and in computer games.

37cf2418-6fd8-48e1-b557-c0cbc4df74a6.one liner: In user interfaces, click refers to the depressing of a mouse button or similar input device.

237b567e-a096-41f8-880d-dea6e4596489.one liner: The templates tag is used in multiple contexts: generic programming (especially C++), and data/document generation using template engines.

9d80f312-4c1e-4aec-8fa7-fc18d893c6c5.one liner: jQuery is a popular cross-browser JavaScript library that facilitates DOM (Document Object Model - HTML Structure) traversal, event handling, animations, and AJAX interactions by minimizing the discrepancies across browsers and providing an easy-to-use API.

0191a8c0-f5ff-4bb3-ad22-a43edf187e0d.one liner: In computer networking, a port is an application-specific or process-specific software construct serving as a communications endpoint.

e4ef3084-2f72-44f7-a787-90f70417cc40.one liner: An object is any entity that can be manipulated by commands in a programming language. An object can be a value, a variable, a function, or a complex data-structure. In object-oriented programming, an object refers to an instance of a class.

0fe4c800-4d52-4ee8-bc78-a2a19d04b96f.one liner: Processing is an open source programming language and environment for people who want to create images, animations, and interactions.

317fa6b6-8f55-4831-99fe-f9ce78dcc695.one liner: Access modifier is an OOP concept. It determines what level of access or visibility a particular property/method/class has.

18262e34-2d68-41f7-9e9b-0e8a5f1efb2e.one liner: Thumbnails are reduced-size versions of pictures, used to help in recognizing and organizing them, serving the same role for images as a normal text index does for words.

6fa46669-221d-4581-868f-5dd0fb7b244c.one liner: Jinja2 is a fast template engine for Python. It has full Unicode support, auto-escaping, inheritance, macros, and many other features.

3a2b48c9-7a28-4f6e-84b3-44d972e01e76.one liner: x86-64 is a 64 bit extension to the Intel x86 architecture

058754ae-e7c6-4004-ba57-dd7f96ec2d05.one liner: A report contains summarized information from a data source, usually in an end-user-friendly format, such as PDF or Excel, although proprietary reporting tools (usually with built-in design tools) also exist.

17707654-0468-4e38-a9e4-83a8799108d1.one liner: Screen-scraping, also known as web-scraping or data-scraping is a software technique use to collect and parse information from user interfaces. be2d959d-9932-4b6d-aa3a-f56d138201ad.one liner: In computer programming, a trait is a collection of methods, used as a "simple conceptual model for structuring object oriented programs"

d7d8c245-8b84-4bbb-843e-516fe5bfc3a0.one liner: Research is creative work undertaken on a systematic basis in order to increase the stock of knowledge, including knowledge of computer science, electrical science and communication science to devise new applications.

ea38bc24-d426-474d-ac62-f1df3c08e09d.one liner: Ranking is the sorted order of an element in a list of elements. Usually a high ranking means the element is good in terms of certain metric.

5ded2ffc-fb9a-4b86-982e-83bdcefefc0e.one liner: The depth of a node in a tree is the length of the path to its root. The depth of an image is the number of bits used to indicate the color of a single pixel.

8917e8fd-4c50-4c31-8193-23fa60dd1017.one liner: A measure of the amount of work a computer is performing. CPU load is closely related too, but not exactly the same as CPU utilization.

6b67adfa-f594-40c6-b575-39a0d484f0ca.name: With Statement
6b67adfa-f594-40c6-b575-39a0d484f0ca.one liner: A number of languages have With statements. The Python with statement creates a new context, with associated context manager. When the context (a code block) is exited again, the context manager is notified. Please use "common-table-expression" for the SQL WITH statement

a3b00ffd-bc18-4739-bee7-2a126dea68e1.one liner: Keywords are special words used as identifiers by a language. They are reserved words accepted by a compiler or interpreter, and thus should not (or cannot) be used as a variable or function name.

2a075312-a7e3-498a-bce0-1df5c54f3179.one liner: It may refer to text formatting, content format, file format, document file format, etc.

f03ebaa6-d426-4a0b-b48f-0e4460f6d451.one liner: Adapter is a software design pattern that makes several interfaces compatible through a common interface or class.

5c3982f4-6387-4c18-be95-f28eb3668939.one liner: A form is essentially a container that can be used to hold any amount of any subset of several types of data. HTML forms are used to pass data to a server. VB and C# forms are the windows used to interact with the user.

82b8f26a-d112-4ed3-a82d-db1bdd96ad44.one liner: Anything related to function interpolation, i.e. the mathematical techniques for estimating the (unknown) value of a function in a point on the basis of a set of known values in other (usually nearby) points. For interpolation of strings, see [tag:string-interpolation].

e6e44573-9d19-4a37-abf6-73cec23daa00.name: Openshift

719d77ad-d1b6-44bb-a9e2-518c54f95e16.one liner: One of the common design patterns in enterprise software development which allows one to maintain a list of objects affected by a business transaction and coordinates the writing out of changes and the resolution of concurrency problems.

05592a86-ebfa-49a3-b167-4ea1c6b714ca.name: Shapes
05592a86-ebfa-49a3-b167-4ea1c6b714ca.one liner: Questions related to drawing or defining shapes.

a81476e3-5be1-4c65-939c-f40eeab9ec12.name: Werkzeug
a81476e3-5be1-4c65-939c-f40eeab9ec12.one liner: Werkzeug is a WSGI utility library for Python. It's widely used and BSD licensed.

5ca7bd94-915d-4a3d-baa8-c8a85e9a83fb.name: Resources
5ca7bd94-915d-4a3d-baa8-c8a85e9a83fb.one liner: Assets (like memory, disk space, CPU power or alike) necessary for effective operation or physical files (like images, configuration files or other) to provide some externalized enrichment to an application.

014af5c8-6d7f-42c2-8e5d-8e0b87bb56a7.name: Automated Tests
014af5c8-6d7f-42c2-8e5d-8e0b87bb56a7.one liner: Test automation is the use of software to control the execution of tests, the comparison of actual outcomes to predicted outcomes, the setting up of test preconditions, and other test control and test reporting functions. Commonly, test automation involves automating a manual process already in place that uses a formalized testing process (wikipedia.org).

1233384e-b37d-444e-9977-dd4a3447a5d2.name: Manifest
1233384e-b37d-444e-9977-dd4a3447a5d2.one liner: A manifest is a file containing metadata about an application, data file or assembly. Generally an ambiguous tag, try and use a more specific one.

db4fe1e2-1f5d-4923-b115-a95ee1b79b29.one liner: Fluid is a an XML-based templating system for TYPO3. With Fluid, all the code for the view logic moves to the template - e.g. loops, if/else switches and similar.

81f4b19a-271d-4355-b880-6fe0eded3320.name: Desktop
81f4b19a-271d-4355-b880-6fe0eded3320.one liner: Desktop is an interface metaphor which is a set of unifying concepts used by graphical user interfaces to help users more easily interact with the computer.

6523958e-ec92-4482-b881-9c1609dbce27.name: Src
6523958e-ec92-4482-b881-9c1609dbce27.one liner: SRC is a common attribute in HTML used to identify the location of a resource which relates to an element.

947e0e9b-fd32-4f21-ae23-e18c06c254af.name: Points
947e0e9b-fd32-4f21-ae23-e18c06c254af.one liner: a scoring system for games or algorithms. geometric items should use [tag:coordinates] and [tag:point]

1ce8cf94-57b5-425c-9450-dc82273ff8a6.one liner: Multimedia refers to content that uses a combination of different content forms.

7c06fb71-a7b6-4b24-8174-84f425fd4345.one liner: Scrapy is a fast open-source high-level screen scraping and web crawling framework written in Python, used to crawl websites and extract structured data from their pages. It can be used for a wide range of purposes, from data mining to monitoring and automated testing.

6697172e-56ee-45f0-8462-6eca6eacd1b1.name: Gridfs
6697172e-56ee-45f0-8462-6eca6eacd1b1.one liner: GridFS is a specification for storing large files in MongoDB.  All of the mongodb.org supported drivers implement the GridFS spec.

ef144a6d-43ac-4433-a5f1-7ca9d7a71e80.one liner: Object-oriented programming is a programming paradigm using "objects": data structures consisting of data fields and methods together with their interactions.

574e8ced-792d-4d00-a428-465d0f2fed63.one liner: An attribute of visual perception in which a source appears to be radiating or reflecting light.

fd9e3983-99e0-4424-9903-20981c8578d8.one liner: An industry-led organization which aims to certify and improve interoperability of natural interaction devices

560bc7f6-6c58-4f09-8ccb-84b0400fc601.one liner: Process, analyze, and display geospatial data using Python libraries and related tools

6cd1dd6a-727f-421b-abc6-6e41558952b2.one liner: The Repeater control is used to display a repeated list of items that are bound to the control.

3996cfc4-b6b1-4da1-9440-3ee6c04f2328.one liner: For issues relating to the creation and rendering of polygons in graphical user interfaces.

96e084f9-35e1-4ab8-a434-98a5506626af.one liner: **DO NOT USE THIS TAG.  *Code reviews are off-topic on Stack Overflow, please use codereview.stackexchange.com to request a code review of otherwise working code.*** Code review is systematic examination (often as peer review) of computer source code. It is intended to find and fix mistakes overlooked in the initial development phase, improving both the overall quality of software and the developers' skills.

3cfcd62d-51b6-4495-bfd1-ec46c3733d4a.name: Portlet
3cfcd62d-51b6-4495-bfd1-ec46c3733d4a.one liner: Java-technology-based web component, managed by a portlet container that processes requests and generates dynamic content.

a4862955-b126-4ded-827f-87de4ebd6a54.one liner: J is a high-level, general-purpose, high-performance array programming language.

2ada41d5-3c4d-49d2-b10d-3403f39bedb7.one liner: Knife is a powerful command-line interface (CLI) that comes with Chef.

20f46d85-dec9-4dde-b240-8988125a2e5e.one liner: Bitcoin is a peer-to-peer digital currency with no central authority. It was created in Jan. 2009 by Satoshi Nakamoto. Transactions are managed entirely by the network.

11966db4-35d2-40ae-b541-94976cc0393c.one liner:
Qt is a cross-platform application development framework widely used for the development of application software that can be run on various software and hardware platforms with little or no change in the underlying codebase, while having the power and speed of native applications.
Qt is available with both commercial and open source licenses.

188b3e3b-1cbb-4e26-9709-41a1d5c7d765.one liner: Refers generally to the process of moving data from an external source into one's platform, program, or data set.

a39d93a6-1ea7-40e4-8b27-a354e8931b23.title: Redis
a39d93a6-1ea7-40e4-8b27-a354e8931b23.one liner: An open source NoSQL database with high scalability and compatibility with multiple platforms

1bbd13b3-bef9-405d-bd2c-cd6535084611.one liner:
free is a function to deallocate memory obtained from malloc and other functions in C.
Do not use this tag to refer to free software. Asking for software recommendation is off-topic on Stack Overflow. If you are asking about a free piece of software, you may mention that in the question body.

da2c1efa-327e-47b4-9b53-9391b2471ee7.name: Sympy
da2c1efa-327e-47b4-9b53-9391b2471ee7.one liner: SymPy is an open source Python library for symbolic mathematics.

1ea91602-e2f1-4f7b-85e5-93e486a18137.one liner: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for technical computing, with syntax that is familiar to users of other technical computing environments.

2d1caf29-cd41-4ba6-a8a5-d6bfba7fdf55.name: Test-Driven Development with Django

c8be23dc-62e5-415f-b5c1-6cc0ca4b9f9f.one liner:
PostgreSQL is an open-source, object-relational database management system (ORDBMS) available for all major platforms including Linux, UNIX, Windows and OS X.  
Please mention your exact PostgreSQL version when asking questions.

9a1b51f9-5fcd-404a-8c15-e1ecd8307963.name: Beautifulsoup
9a1b51f9-5fcd-404a-8c15-e1ecd8307963.one liner: Beautiful Soup is a Python package for parsing HTML/XML. The latest version of this package is version 4, imported as bs4.

ca31f3a0-dfc5-4cd9-8787-635a56740073.name: Nltk
ca31f3a0-dfc5-4cd9-8787-635a56740073.one liner: The Natural Language Toolkit is a Python library for computational linguistics.

07ab69ee-7556-46bc-9bff-037be931837f.name: Pydev
07ab69ee-7556-46bc-9bff-037be931837f.one liner: PyDev is an Eclipse plugin for Python development.

1b0192c6-0702-4115-92fd-5db091aad57f.name: Code Formatting
1b0192c6-0702-4115-92fd-5db091aad57f.one liner: Code formatting is the way to format the source code of programs,using spaces and tabs, improving legibility of source code.

e87cb716-e88e-4c77-867b-d6f55d681dd1.name: View
e87cb716-e88e-4c77-867b-d6f55d681dd1.one liner: This tag is for questions about database view or UI / architectural view. See also the following tags: views, sql-view, android-view, uiview.

5b315bfe-f743-478b-aec7-76bc8a9d4b2f.name: Plone
5b315bfe-f743-478b-aec7-76bc8a9d4b2f.one liner: Plone is a content management system (CMS) written in Python. Its strengths are in intranets, websites and document management. It has support for multilingual content and versioning.

5394a7a8-4c50-4069-866d-b5cbe7ec5b35.name: Sql
5394a7a8-4c50-4069-866d-b5cbe7ec5b35.one liner: Structured Query Language (SQL) is a language for querying databases. Questions should include code examples, table structure, sample data, [SQL Fiddle](http://sqlfiddle.com) and a tag for the DBMS implementation (e.g. MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MS SQL Server, IBM DB2) being used. If your question relates to a specific DBMS (uses specific extensions/features), use that DBMS's tag instead. Answers to questions tagged with SQL should use ANSI SQL.

63688979-7d4e-4f8f-966f-2a25d36e7cd1.name: Kivy Blueprints
63688979-7d4e-4f8f-966f-2a25d36e7cd1.title: Kivy Blueprints
63688979-7d4e-4f8f-966f-2a25d36e7cd1.one liner: Build your very own app-store-ready, multi-touch games and applications with Kivy!

9051a520-2154-4538-90dc-2ae3bec16101.name: Kernel
9051a520-2154-4538-90dc-2ae3bec16101.one liner:
This tag is for general questions regarding code that runs in the context of an operating system kernel (kernelspace, as opposed to userspace), including writing custom kernels.  Questions about specific kernels should use a relevant tag (eg. [linux-kernel], [windows-kernel], [xnu]).

This tag is not about other uses of the word "kernel" - for example, questions about CUDA kernels should use the [cuda] or [cuda-kernel] tags.

7b03faae-525a-4b72-8f76-9ba0b893f401.name: Digit
7b03faae-525a-4b72-8f76-9ba0b893f401.one liner: Anything related to numerical digits, i.e. the symbols used to write the representation of a number in a number system, such as decimal, hexadecimal, octal or binary systems.

6f86db99-53a4-48a6-bb10-e4b920c11221.name: Verification
6f86db99-53a4-48a6-bb10-e4b920c11221.one liner: Verification checks whether a product complies with specifications and further fixed conditions.

501d0152-68f7-4c1c-bc07-f2612f06fd24.name: Reliability
501d0152-68f7-4c1c-bc07-f2612f06fd24.one liner: Reliability is the ability of a system or component to perform its required functions under stated conditions for a specified period of time.

18f77157-eade-4d47-88a6-a2ca6a84b242.name: What is Juju?
18f77157-eade-4d47-88a6-a2ca6a84b242.title: What is Juju?
18f77157-eade-4d47-88a6-a2ca6a84b242.one liner: The Blog will provide basic overview of Juju and a simple Wordpress deployment.

17548aa5-832a-4a83-80dd-b281df448822.name: Execution
17548aa5-832a-4a83-80dd-b281df448822.one liner: Refers to the act of running a process.

a0fcb646-cf5a-4de3-a199-fc7f2dd3cf3f.one liner: Samba is the standard Windows interoperability suite of programs for Linux and Unix.

6f19b17a-a76b-457d-902c-f8f40172a043.one liner: Open Sound Control (OSC) is a protocol for communication among computers, sound synthesizers, and other multimedia devices that is optimized for modern networking technology.

6fcb5442-fa25-46d9-9c88-e98a6468d9d1.name: Flow
6fcb5442-fa25-46d9-9c88-e98a6468d9d1.one liner: This is a meta tag and should not be used.  See the wiki for more information.

a6c09749-934f-4353-9b5a-68fa67f5bdc9.name: Esri
a6c09749-934f-4353-9b5a-68fa67f5bdc9.one liner: ESRI (Environmental Systems Research Institute) is a GIS (geographical information systems) development company. ESRI produces GIS software

ffefde2b-3633-4013-8168-fccd14d37883.one liner: Volume, or loudness Loudness is the characteristic of a sound that is primarily a psychological correlate of physical strength (amplitude). More formally, it is defined as "that attribute of auditory sensation in terms of which sounds can be ordered on a scale extending from quiet to loud".

032acf86-6b7d-4cd9-a526-10ba5941d170.name: Children
032acf86-6b7d-4cd9-a526-10ba5941d170.one liner: Children is the set of all nodes within a hierarchical data structure which have a node above them.

487d56a7-6e48-4585-9d32-6c259769b68c.name: Intervals
487d56a7-6e48-4585-9d32-6c259769b68c.one liner: Intervals are used to measure “distance” between values.

0f6e605d-e100-4050-a6ee-1c73f16e6440.name: Printers
0f6e605d-e100-4050-a6ee-1c73f16e6440.one liner: A Printer is a peripheral which produces a text or graphics of documents stored in electronic form, usually on physical print media such as paper or transparencies.

4f34932e-30c3-4770-83f3-849b7d1d7bf8.name: Django Design Patterns and Best Practices
4f34932e-30c3-4770-83f3-849b7d1d7bf8.title: Django Design Patterns and Best Practices
4f34932e-30c3-4770-83f3-849b7d1d7bf8.one liner: Easily build maintainable websites with powerful and relevant Django design patterns

7d4ab1e8-c823-43eb-8fc8-d4efa159ccd1.one liner: tshark is the command line version of wireshark; a free and open-source packet analyzer.

f3d1e0b8-0e84-4145-add4-8d407dcfdc06.name: Direction
f3d1e0b8-0e84-4145-add4-8d407dcfdc06.one liner: The movement or orientation of UI elements in a specific direction. This is limited to the user interface. Some example uses are player movements in games or principal element rotation/animation in UI. Use [directions] for maps navigation.

65402f85-7c08-4c30-a4c3-c2ab77103f61.name: Ls
65402f85-7c08-4c30-a4c3-c2ab77103f61.one liner: A utility in Unix-like systems such as Linux used for listing files and directories.

4f257068-3b47-48f8-adf7-384ab5f499d3.name: Facets
4f257068-3b47-48f8-adf7-384ab5f499d3.one liner: Facets define characteristics and requirements for Java EE projects and are used as part of the runtime configuration. When you add a facet to a project, that project is configured to perform a certain task, fulfill certain requirements, or have certain characteristics. For example, the EAR facet sets up a project to function as an enterprise application by adding a deployment descriptor and setting up the project's classpath.

27d89de7-be1a-4455-8b17-56473ca98b09.name: Model

b005cfdc-fe1e-4108-9b7f-510fc098de28.one liner: A client is an application or system that accesses a service made available by a server.

6f18c3e1-9b85-4db1-ab46-846bbb0fecc9.name: Irc
6f18c3e1-9b85-4db1-ab46-846bbb0fecc9.one liner:
IRC - Stands for Internet Relay Chat is an internet based chat protocol.
Main idea is to have users connect to a server network, where they can then send messages to each other through channels or direct chat. 
Today there's quite a few different networks, usually each with a main thematic.
Stack Overflow got its own channel on the FreeNode network. You can read more about that on the full tag wiki page.

6d175327-0be8-4446-96d7-b9500bf10482.name: Kivy
6d175327-0be8-4446-96d7-b9500bf10482.one liner: Kivy is an open source Python library for rapid development of applications equipped with novel user interfaces, such as multi-touch apps.

446f6946-1b4c-4f11-bc91-9f032e2d4eaa.one liner: Pong (marketed as PONG) is one of the earliest arcade video games. Pong is seen today as the "Hello World" to 2d game development.

cdfa8c86-a95a-4b39-9823-4a4a6c11a51b.one liner: "bytecode" is a blanket term for opcodes that are consumed by a virtual machine. For example, the JVM runs bytecode stored in .class files and the CPython interpreter runs bytecode stored in .pyc files.

fff2225b-0674-4b7d-8c8a-52caace58e43.one liner: Short for Fast Fourier Transform, any of a set of algorithms for quickly computing the Discrete Fourier Transform.

b06c3eb7-cbf7-4ff6-bc1c-a3d613c30b58.one liner: A request is a message sent by a source to another object.

6c50b292-6d3a-4890-b1b6-ed12b8f0f15b.one liner: The ADAPTIVE Communication Environment (ACE), a C++ network programming toolkit. For the ACE database available since MS Access 2007, use an ms-access tag and the ms-jet-ace tag. For the ACE editor, use the [tag:ace-editor] tag.

996ad5b9-d0ce-40df-bfb7-8b7cb92f188d.one liner: A screenshot, screen capture, or screen dump is an image taken by the computer to record the visible items displayed on the monitor or another visual output device

d1bc73a8-802b-4a8b-a39a-3402b1745a56.one liner: Lighttpd is a lightweight and high-performance event-driven web server.

8d71e373-0ad5-44b4-ae21-742bed64b55b.one liner: Google Cloud Platform provides cloud computing services that let you build applications and websites, store data, and analyze data on Google's infrastructure.

0c114265-658e-43b6-a5d0-9a90754efff1.one liner: ArcPy is a Python Site-Package developed by Esri for use with its ArcGIS platform at version 10.x and above. It offers a high-level implementation of Esri's ArcObjects programming library.

72848585-eb2a-4354-ba61-4ba39204ed36.one liner: An access control list (ACL), with respect to a computer file system, is a list of permissions attached to an object.

7889e8ef-c8de-4961-940d-d43efdd53ae6.one liner: The interface to a program that consists entirely of text, as opposed to (although not necessarily mutually exclusive to) a GUI, or Graphical User Interface.

52e76f0f-de75-4fbf-a907-83f9bbd87f04.name: Numerical
52e76f0f-de75-4fbf-a907-83f9bbd87f04.one liner: This tag is for questions concerning problems using numbers which either cannot be exactly solved, or where the exact solution may be much more difficult to acquire than by using numerical methods.

76679359-ecb7-424f-a816-19fefb46f186.one liner: programming tool to track and analyse the performance of a software program

ae7c18b6-02c2-4322-b453-ed6fbf6e3ba5.name: Amazon S3 Cookbook

0b15b6c5-323d-4123-99fe-891ea164cf04.name: Replication
0b15b6c5-323d-4123-99fe-891ea164cf04.one liner: The use of redundant resources to improve reliability, fault-tolerance, or performance.

46336968-f5e7-4753-adc1-e08bfd6267b3.name: Affinity
46336968-f5e7-4753-adc1-e08bfd6267b3.one liner: Anything related to processor affinity, also known as CPU pinning. The processor affinity is a propriety of a process or a thread in an OS on multi-processor or multi-core systems that influences the OS' scheduling algorithm, binding the execution of that process (or thread) to a specific processor (or core). DO NOT use this tag as a synonym for [affinetransform] tag.

e9ff14c5-8894-4874-a6e0-99d026eda4b1.name: Logging
e9ff14c5-8894-4874-a6e0-99d026eda4b1.one liner: Computer data logging is the process of recording events in a computer program, usually with a certain scope, in order to provide an audit trail that can be used to understand the activity of the system and to diagnose problems.

b7df0817-7762-462d-b205-0ef2841c1fcf.name: Temperature
b7df0817-7762-462d-b205-0ef2841c1fcf.one liner: A simple definition of temperature is that it is a measure of heat dissipation, This tag can include programming related questions like temperature conversion, temperature detection through device sensors etc.

5991a903-6f4a-4543-a1ec-fca5a6ea569f.name: Modeling
5991a903-6f4a-4543-a1ec-fca5a6ea569f.one liner: Modeling is the constructing and manipulating abstract (mathematical and/or graphical) representations of economic, engineering, manufacturing, social, and other types of situations and natural phenomenon, simulated with the help of a computer system.

14f82864-5381-4ac4-840f-9461c4a29501.name: Cvs
14f82864-5381-4ac4-840f-9461c4a29501.one liner: CVS - Concurrent Versions System - is an open-source version control system

60f9cc03-5b63-4c6b-b4d5-d0ec13c11c83.one liner: Apache ZooKeeper is a distributed service that provides configuration information storage, naming, synchronization, coordination, and group services.

7ed4cc8e-b696-4fd3-add5-8d8b59804bbf.name: Python Data Visualization Cookbook
7ed4cc8e-b696-4fd3-add5-8d8b59804bbf.title: Python Data Visualization Cookbook
7ed4cc8e-b696-4fd3-add5-8d8b59804bbf.one liner: As a developer with knowledge of Python you are already in a great position to start using data visualization. This superb cookbook shows you how in plain language and practical recipes, culminating with 3D animations.

83fbad69-a80c-461b-97e5-8951a724410d.name: Install
83fbad69-a80c-461b-97e5-8951a724410d.one liner: Installation (or setup) of a program (including drivers, plugins, etc.) is the act of putting the program onto a computer system so that it can be executed.

5047e149-c857-4655-8957-bbec26944d6b.name: Core Data
5047e149-c857-4655-8957-bbec26944d6b.one liner: Core Data is Apple's object modeling and persistence framework for OS X and iOS. Xcode provides an object model editor for specifying entities, attributes, and relationships. The Core Data framework provides generalized and automated solutions to common tasks associated with object life-cycle and object graph management, including persistence.

6500e07d-f2f1-4b70-b944-5cbcf495cbea.name: Webmin
6500e07d-f2f1-4b70-b944-5cbcf495cbea.one liner: A web-based interface for system administration for Unix. Setup user accounts, DNS, file sharing and the program is freeware.

a9011a13-6f92-42aa-a2a5-7ff8cd2eeaf2.one liner: POST is one of the HTTP protocol methods; it is used when the client needs to send data to the server, such as when uploading a file, or submitting a completed form.

b74c6fe0-19cb-4055-a700-15a08a8369f7.name: Speech
b74c6fe0-19cb-4055-a700-15a08a8369f7.one liner: Speech is the vocalized form of human communication.

cb4d205b-78ff-4030-ac52-f7c6fe43b7da.one liner: This tag relates to any of various nested entities or operations in programming.

c852512e-ce3f-473a-8193-0ffb326885df.one liner: DO NOT USE: this tag is ambiguous and is in the process of being cleaned up and deleted.

6485f102-bdd3-4bd1-875a-962554c80778.one liner: For questions about scientific computing involving weather analysis and/or simulations. Any weather questions on this site should be programming-related.

22ac6954-2122-4a6d-a0db-f9d81ff49e79.one liner: To convert some encoded data (e.g. bytes, electrical signals) to some representation ready for further processing (e.g. string, object, picture)

a255cf89-baaa-491d-b322-8d473809554a.one liner: Keystone is the identity service used by OpenStack for authentication.

04c7405e-56d2-4b26-a863-b71356be4600.one liner: A form (window, box, etc.) presented to a user, usually for the purpose of capturing input or to make a decision.

5e5de56d-faf8-4e3d-ab63-2b34ab19c3e6.one liner: Heartbeat (as of version 3.x) is a cluster messaging layer, often combined with pacemaker as the cluster resource manager.

1f8800c0-ebbf-4c3e-87cc-ac6dacf6ad65.name: Rounding
1f8800c0-ebbf-4c3e-87cc-ac6dacf6ad65.one liner: Rounding a numerical value means replacing it by another value that is approximately equal but has a shorter, simpler, or more explicit representation.

8b89c819-0ef5-4bd4-be0e-641395c6f58b.name: Tizen
8b89c819-0ef5-4bd4-be0e-641395c6f58b.one liner: Tizen is an open source, standards-based software platform supported by leading mobile operators, device manufacturers, and silicon suppliers for multiple device categories (smartphones, tablets, netbooks ...). With HTML5's robust capabilities and cross platform flexibility, it is rapidly becoming the preferred development environment for mobile apps and services.

b9991761-480f-46fa-ad9a-91e70a016403.name: Capture
b9991761-480f-46fa-ad9a-91e70a016403.one liner: capture is the process of converting a set of pixels on a screen into a bitmap image stored in memory

6567deab-a2c9-4c21-bdbf-ca799e2f3c40.name: Neural Network
6567deab-a2c9-4c21-bdbf-ca799e2f3c40.one liner: Network structure inspired by simplified models of biological neurons (brain cells).  Neural networks are trained to "learn" by supervised and unsupervised techniques, and can be used to solve optimization problems, approximation problems, classify patterns, and combinations thereof.

7ffda009-9ac0-43ce-82b9-8bc86da0b3aa.name: Elasticsearch
7ffda009-9ac0-43ce-82b9-8bc86da0b3aa.one liner: Elasticsearch is an Open Source (Apache 2), Distributed, RESTful, Search Engine built on top of Lucene.

082a6166-ed17-4351-8eca-6dc70b1aeddc.name: Matrix
082a6166-ed17-4351-8eca-6dc70b1aeddc.one liner: In mathematics, a matrix (plural matrices) is a rectangular array of numbers, symbols, or expressions, arranged in rows and columns. The individual items in a matrix are called its elements or entries.

f54d3612-c10b-440e-a859-b4f087397669.name: Process
f54d3612-c10b-440e-a859-b4f087397669.one liner: This tag is about operating system processes. It may also refer to a specific construct on a given platform, e.g., the System.Diagnostics.Process class for .NET

eb710f09-dd87-40b3-bc94-a73714fd53c3.title: Practical Maya Programming with Python
eb710f09-dd87-40b3-bc94-a73714fd53c3.one liner: Unleash the power of Python in Maya and unlock your creativity

3c0df6aa-471d-4b48-ba73-0de8ac591221.name: Version Control
3c0df6aa-471d-4b48-ba73-0de8ac591221.one liner: Version control is the management of changes to documents, programs, and other information stored as computer files. Use this tag to mark general questions about usage and applicability of version control, VCS comparison. For most commands and techniques specific to each particular VCS there are specific tags, which should be preferred.

627fefe8-719d-49f1-bf65-6793f6bc399d.name: Backbone.Js
627fefe8-719d-49f1-bf65-6793f6bc399d.one liner: Backbone.js is a JavaScript library that provides structure to RESTful web applications.

c74fac12-7526-4bec-afab-da8c2952e78f.name: Unit Testing
c74fac12-7526-4bec-afab-da8c2952e78f.one liner: Unit testing is a method by which individual units of source code, sets of one or more computer program modules together with associated control data, usage procedures, and operating procedures, are tested to determine if they are fit for use.

acb936d6-82ad-473c-9fa7-b11d52b15dd2.name: Version
acb936d6-82ad-473c-9fa7-b11d52b15dd2.one liner: Version defines an unique state of a computer software or a file.

b0751045-af7a-4f63-802c-7fcd478943c4.name: Synchronized
b0751045-af7a-4f63-802c-7fcd478943c4.one liner: A block or method is said to be 'synchronized' if entry to it is controlled by the Java `synchronized` keyword. This causes access to it to be restricted to a single thread at a time: when concurrent accesses occur, they are sequentialized in an unspecified order.

a133c2a5-612e-4cd0-831c-d9c8553362cd.name: Fingerprint
a133c2a5-612e-4cd0-831c-d9c8553362cd.one liner: Biometric modality that matches images of finger tips.

0896e165-4ecf-4898-8cf6-c7a1e14637b5.name: Store
0896e165-4ecf-4898-8cf6-c7a1e14637b5.one liner: A store is a data repository of a set of integrated objects. These objects are modeled using classes defined in database schemas. Data store includes not only data repositories like databases, it is a more general concept that includes also flat files that can store data.

d1c9cfb8-b7eb-4baf-a90f-7365ddbbebab.name: Wireless
d1c9cfb8-b7eb-4baf-a90f-7365ddbbebab.one liner: Wireless refers to the technology allowing transfer of information between two points that are not physically connected.

94cf43f7-4440-4ac3-9f30-a75685415114.name: Which
94cf43f7-4440-4ac3-9f30-a75685415114.one liner: The selection of a set of data from another set.

65b6835d-eb5c-4b19-8f2b-20f8a7d6a084.name: Pre
65b6835d-eb5c-4b19-8f2b-20f8a7d6a084.one liner: The <pre> element in HTML represents preformatted text. Text within this element is typically displayed in a non-proportional font exactly as it is laid out in the file. Whitespaces inside this element are displayed as typed. It is usually used for showing computer code or output.

f0d7e17d-daed-45d0-a304-dba4cf2f110c.name: Paas
f0d7e17d-daed-45d0-a304-dba4cf2f110c.one liner: paas is short for Platform-as-a-service, a category of cloud-centric services.

59989210-50cd-4a9b-867a-eb0f12190d62.name: Rust Essentials
59989210-50cd-4a9b-867a-eb0f12190d62.title: Rust Essentials
59989210-50cd-4a9b-867a-eb0f12190d62.one liner: Discover how to use Rust to write fast, secure, and concurrent systems and applications

bb75b44f-463d-4b30-8825-5357fbc3a8df.name: Learning Dart - Second Edition
bb75b44f-463d-4b30-8825-5357fbc3a8df.title: Learning Dart - Second Edition
bb75b44f-463d-4b30-8825-5357fbc3a8df.one liner: Learn to develop high performance applications with Dart 1.10

dce5f29b-138d-4f42-9be2-6d72923d77e2.name: Spring
dce5f29b-138d-4f42-9be2-6d72923d77e2.one liner: The Spring Framework is an open source framework for application development on the Java platform. At its core is rich support for component based architectures, and it currently has over a dozen highly integrated modules.

d03c56b3-458f-45b8-8db4-04eb6b8738ce.name: Blobstore
d03c56b3-458f-45b8-8db4-04eb6b8738ce.one liner: A storage API used for binary data storage, eg. Google App Engine blobstore service.

d3e0cda7-1031-4817-a63c-8cde4a1e5038.name: Music
d3e0cda7-1031-4817-a63c-8cde4a1e5038.one liner: In programming, music refers to sound that follows properties distinct from speech or noise, or the symbolic representation, manipulation, and representation (display or audio) of musical objects, or for the metadata of these objects. Related tags, such as [audio] or media] refer more generally to all sound that could be stored, streamed, or manipulated. Tags for specific music representations such as [midi] or instruments such as [guitar] also exist.

fbf9f40a-7ef5-40e6-8765-16659c7251ad.name: Microcontroller
fbf9f40a-7ef5-40e6-8765-16659c7251ad.one liner: This tag is related to questions that have something to do with a microcontroller.  A microcontroller is a simple or small processor often with its program and execution memory on the same chip with input/output pins for controlling other hardware.  Please specify the microcontroller and compiler or tools related to your question.

85b6d35f-cc21-45ab-9258-8c0cbdf29155.name: Django Project Blueprints
85b6d35f-cc21-45ab-9258-8c0cbdf29155.title: Django Project Blueprints
85b6d35f-cc21-45ab-9258-8c0cbdf29155.one liner: Master a wide range of web development techniques with Django and take your projects beyond the basics

c306a155-8609-4d75-91ba-65444baef8f3.name: scikit-learn Cookbook

c306a155-8609-4d75-91ba-65444baef8f3.one liner: Over 50 recipes to incorporate scikit-learn into every step of the data science pipeline, from feature extraction to model building and model evaluation

897ab832-82e8-4407-897d-ec29668795c0.name: Continuous Integration
897ab832-82e8-4407-897d-ec29668795c0.one liner: In software engineering, continuous integration (CI) implements the continuous building and automated testing of the full software product on a frequent schedule. At least once a day, often several times a day and sometimes as often as after every check in to the version control system.

4014b922-47ec-4287-86b8-45caa25601cb.name: Classification
4014b922-47ec-4287-86b8-45caa25601cb.one liner: In machine learning and statistics, classification is the problem of identifying which of a set of categories a new observation belongs to, on the basis of a training set of data containing observations whose category membership is known.

81629a20-50f3-4d4e-8078-e075fbe35277.name: Coordinate Systems
81629a20-50f3-4d4e-8078-e075fbe35277.one liner: Coordinate systems use one or more numbers, or coordinates, to uniquely determine the position of a point or geometry in space.

a81d779f-5acb-41d8-bdbc-41f7b242c050.name: Slice
a81d779f-5acb-41d8-bdbc-41f7b242c050.one liner:
A slice is a representation of a part of a sequence, usually defined by a reference to the underlying sequence, an index giving the starting position, a length or end position, and optionally a "stride" or "step" value.

Please use [tag:object-slicing] for the slicing problem in C++ and [tag:program-slicing] for the analysis technique.

5892c056-7747-4fc3-ad8a-153996fe79bd.name: Url
5892c056-7747-4fc3-ad8a-153996fe79bd.one liner: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) is a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that specifies where an identified resource is available and the mechanism for retrieving it.

0cdddf19-5a02-4041-87db-f1658078c463.name: Environment
0cdddf19-5a02-4041-87db-f1658078c463.one liner: The O/S in which a process is executed, especially settings that affect the process

2a73a7b9-38b0-4e82-88a3-261e85f34c94.name: Red5
2a73a7b9-38b0-4e82-88a3-261e85f34c94.one liner: Red5 is an open source media server written in Java as an alternative to Adobe's proprietary Flash Media Server(FMS).

8de936e2-1ba4-46e4-8d73-dd04058169a2.name: Pi
8de936e2-1ba4-46e4-8d73-dd04058169a2.one liner: π (pi) is a mathematical constant whose value is the ratio of any Euclidean plane circle's circumference to its diameter; this is the same value as the ratio of a circle's area to the square of its radius. It is approximately equal to 3.14159265 in decimal notation. For Raspberry Pi, please tag with "raspberry-pi".

8cebf4fd-ed23-4750-a293-a89e19773cb6.name: Category
8cebf4fd-ed23-4750-a293-a89e19773cb6.one liner: A category is a grouping of information.

60c2f036-8c2b-4b38-9e3e-bc55fd58339a.name: Symbols
60c2f036-8c2b-4b38-9e3e-bc55fd58339a.one liner: can refer to a letter or special character; a primitive data type in many programming languages; an item of the alphabet of a formal language.

a219e8a1-3fc5-470c-b83d-7c74d55090d9.name: Model View Controller
a219e8a1-3fc5-470c-b83d-7c74d55090d9.one liner: Model–View–Controller (MVC) is an architectural pattern used in software engineering. For Microsoft ASP.NET MVC, please use [asp.net-mvc] tag instead. For Spring MVC, please use [spring-mvc] tag instead.

2511b9e8-3c54-4556-b51f-5ff91299ec30.name: Primitive
2511b9e8-3c54-4556-b51f-5ff91299ec30.one liner: A  primitive type is a data type provided by a programming language as a basic building block.

489d4a0e-30c6-4c70-8165-7b2ea8726529.name: Inheritance
489d4a0e-30c6-4c70-8165-7b2ea8726529.one liner: Inheritance is the system in object oriented programming that allows objects to support operations defined by anterior types without having to provide their own definition. It is the major vector for polymorphism in object-oriented programming.

b73550c3-9664-453e-a19d-65d42f5bd528.name: Puppet
b73550c3-9664-453e-a19d-65d42f5bd528.title: Puppet
b73550c3-9664-453e-a19d-65d42f5bd528.one liner: An open-source server automation tool that allows you to automate your IT infrastructure

7c63cd0a-a61d-4298-b1a4-88b8647a4772.name: Np
7c63cd0a-a61d-4298-b1a4-88b8647a4772.one liner: NP ("nondeterministic polynomial") is a complexity class of decision problems that can be solved by a nondeterministic Turing machine in polynomial time.  Equivalently, it is the set of decision problems for which an answer can be verified in polynomial time by a deterministic Turing machine.

b29422fc-63a7-40c9-9634-11c029636762.name: Eventual Consistency
b29422fc-63a7-40c9-9634-11c029636762.one liner: Eventual consistency is a consistency model used in distributed computing that informally guarantees that, if no new updates are made to a given data item, eventually all accesses to that item will return the last updated value.

e7d92d6c-ac94-44e0-bdfe-9f128dd534e5.title: Redis Essentials
e7d92d6c-ac94-44e0-bdfe-9f128dd534e5.one liner: Harness the power of Redis to integrate and manage your projects efficiently

1b21ba8f-eab9-4a0a-951b-c06a40394302.one liner: Develop high-quality and maintainable Python applications using the principles of test-driven development

a933924b-2471-4873-86b5-26b2f942cb27.name: Mongodb
a933924b-2471-4873-86b5-26b2f942cb27.one liner: MongoDB is a scalable, high-performance, open source, document-oriented database.  It supports a large number of languages and application development platforms. Questions about server administration can be asked on http://dba.stackexchange.com.

96de28f5-f060-491e-a35b-84c747aa7b8c.name: Handsontable
96de28f5-f060-491e-a35b-84c747aa7b8c.one liner: Handsontable is a minimalist Excel-like data grid editor for HTML & JavaScript

52a251d6-8b05-47aa-91bf-0dd6fe967c97.name: Average
52a251d6-8b05-47aa-91bf-0dd6fe967c97.one liner: In mathematics, an average is a measure of the "middle" or "typical" value of a data set. Different types of averages include the arithmetic mean, the median, and the mode.

f9316078-601a-427c-8abf-c51fbdde344a.name: MongoDB Cookbook
f9316078-601a-427c-8abf-c51fbdde344a.title: MongoDB Cookbook
f9316078-601a-427c-8abf-c51fbdde344a.one liner: Over 80 practical recipes to design, deploy, and administer MongoDB

48fda229-ea55-46bb-889d-1a1295130763.name: Stemming
48fda229-ea55-46bb-889d-1a1295130763.one liner: The process for reducing inflected words to their stem.

d5bd527b-1cd3-4f82-8260-11d448f01658.name: Configuration
d5bd527b-1cd3-4f82-8260-11d448f01658.one liner: Configuration is the process of specifying the settings used for a system or application

fb6dd50c-b729-4325-aa0b-bdeb44f5d396.name: Endpoint
fb6dd50c-b729-4325-aa0b-bdeb44f5d396.one liner: This is a general tag used for all kinds of logic that reside in some receiving or sending scenario.

7e7074e9-9c89-4741-aea8-29d7b7b0bc6d.name: Public
7e7074e9-9c89-4741-aea8-29d7b7b0bc6d.one liner: `public` is an access-specifier in object-oriented languages; it indicates that all objects have access to the `public` field or method.

85c6f5ac-b364-404d-bdcb-0fc1693b1b67.name: Make
85c6f5ac-b364-404d-bdcb-0fc1693b1b67.one liner: The tool called make is a build manager which compares the last modification times of various files and performs user specified actions (commands) when the "target" files are found to be older than their dependencies. Canonically it is used to build programs, but it can be used to manage any process that depends on the modification dates of files

e5b4c69c-09b5-414f-ac74-779fdc829f68.title: Learning Heroku Postgres
e5b4c69c-09b5-414f-ac74-779fdc829f68.one liner: Efficiently design, implement, and manage a successful PostgreSQL database with Heroku

cc6ccabb-3840-44e0-88a7-df8116f278a2.title: Instant Data Intensive Apps with pandas How-to
cc6ccabb-3840-44e0-88a7-df8116f278a2.one liner: Manipulate, visualize, and analyze your data with pandas

f440c705-30fc-487d-86d5-0ff1a4da0528.name: Imap
f440c705-30fc-487d-86d5-0ff1a4da0528.one liner: Internet message application protocol (commonly known as IMAP) is one of the two most prevalent Internet standard protocols for e-mail retrieval, the other being the Post Office Protocol (POP).
