a1fff5db-1069-4b89-9a0c-166e0c39e463.name: Simplecv
a1fff5db-1069-4b89-9a0c-166e0c39e463.one liner: SimpleCV is an Open Source Framework for Machine Vision

5746faa2-12e5-410a-afd1-33f5c0bc71ac.name: Python High Performance Programming
5746faa2-12e5-410a-afd1-33f5c0bc71ac.title: Python High Performance Programming
5746faa2-12e5-410a-afd1-33f5c0bc71ac.one liner: If you have at least a basic knowledge of Python, this book will help you maximize the performance of your code and applications. Easy to follow tutorials will make you a hard act to follow in Python programming.

26165dc0-7328-48f5-9f83-b58885d60f1d.name: Relationship
26165dc0-7328-48f5-9f83-b58885d60f1d.one liner: Questions in this tag typically involve the association that a set of data has with other set(s) of data.

ea4e3693-d8c2-42ee-b9bb-6cf59ad88c1d.name: Self
ea4e3693-d8c2-42ee-b9bb-6cf59ad88c1d.one liner: A keyword used in instance methods to refer to the object on which they are working.

33f4e346-3169-4528-a8d7-52601100a235.name: Sudo
33f4e346-3169-4528-a8d7-52601100a235.one liner: The sudo command is an abbreviation for "substitute user do" (as in, do a command as if started by another user). Sudo is a program for Unix and Unix-like computer operating systems that allows a user to run programs with the security privileges of another user (normally the superuser, or root).

428c36ea-78d7-4ebf-a81d-a47804278966.name: Synchronization
428c36ea-78d7-4ebf-a81d-a47804278966.one liner: Synchronization refers to using controls to maintain a coherent representation, either a group of processes running the same program (process synchronization), or representations of data (data synchronization).

18db3996-211f-47ae-9ca5-748bef1030cc.name: Path
18db3996-211f-47ae-9ca5-748bef1030cc.one liner: A path, the general form of a file name or of a directory name, specifies a unique location in a file system.

95410aae-37dd-4c51-b635-bf74bcccb7c1.name: Restore
95410aae-37dd-4c51-b635-bf74bcccb7c1.one liner: Act of setting data back to a previous state.

432a179b-743e-4b98-844a-da2e0a75d672.name: Kali Linux Network Scanning Cookbook
432a179b-743e-4b98-844a-da2e0a75d672.title: Kali Linux Network Scanning Cookbook
432a179b-743e-4b98-844a-da2e0a75d672.one liner: Over 90 hands-on recipes explaining how to leverage custom scripts, and integrated tools in Kali Linux to effectively master network scanning

3327256c-0313-47d8-ab8c-f8dc6dc61f70.name: Functional Python Programming
3327256c-0313-47d8-ab8c-f8dc6dc61f70.title: Functional Python Programming
3327256c-0313-47d8-ab8c-f8dc6dc61f70.one liner: Create succinct and expressive implementations with functional programming in Python

90bad466-6202-4076-95c9-9b0fb090851c.name: Riak
90bad466-6202-4076-95c9-9b0fb090851c.one liner: Riak is a key/value data store written in Erlang. It implements principles from Amazon's Dynamo paper.

6b881d78-8e88-4dcb-b09b-ccafe8a7226c.name: Canonical Link
6b881d78-8e88-4dcb-b09b-ccafe8a7226c.one liner: is a keyword for the HTML attribute `rel` which allows specification of the preferred URL for web pages with duplicate content.

8ccb70bb-9481-4831-88c6-75f7e0102445.name: .Net
8ccb70bb-9481-4831-88c6-75f7e0102445.one liner: The .NET framework is a software framework designed mainly for the Microsoft Windows operating system. It includes an implementation of the Base Class Library, Common Language Runtime (commonly referred to as CLR) and Dynamic Language Runtime. It supports many programming languages, including C#, VB.NET, F# and C++/CLI.

e9968865-1a5d-4f4b-8441-9b387b4499a6.name: Spatial
e9968865-1a5d-4f4b-8441-9b387b4499a6.one liner: Spatial data types store geometric data, that is data related to an object's position in space.

28fe2ca4-70d4-4f63-a710-6b36045d4e7f.name: Vectorization
28fe2ca4-70d4-4f63-a710-6b36045d4e7f.one liner: Vectorization refers to a programming paradigm where functions operate on whole arrays in one go. This affords benefits in terms of function calls, memory access, parallelization and code expressiveness. Some programming languages, such as MATLAB, are optimised to give the best performance when vectorized.

32d7678d-e542-4941-9b59-76ad183f2b07.name: Cookbook
32d7678d-e542-4941-9b59-76ad183f2b07.one liner: A cookbook is the fundamental unit of configuration and policy distribution in Chef.

ab638b16-ecdf-4a1d-a7c5-5915731a90d9.name: Each
ab638b16-ecdf-4a1d-a7c5-5915731a90d9.one liner: An iterator function or language struct which can be used to iterate over arrays or lists.

29168ddb-03c8-4703-aa8b-f730b61b214b.name: I2C
29168ddb-03c8-4703-aa8b-f730b61b214b.one liner: I2C is a two-wire serial bus. It is used to interface with low-speed peripherals in embedded systems and computer motherboards.

cdacd24a-2203-4c14-938e-e9a7f6ab40a4.name: Product
cdacd24a-2203-4c14-938e-e9a7f6ab40a4.one liner: A product is a good that can be bought or sold. Use this tag to refer to products in an economic or commercial sense only. For the mathematical notion of product, use tag [multiplication] instead.

8d6e51ed-d478-42b4-be54-c71df08f8cbe.name: Video
8d6e51ed-d478-42b4-be54-c71df08f8cbe.one liner: Video is an electronic medium for the recording, copying, and broadcasting of moving visual images. Use more specific tags when relevant, such as [video-editing] for questions related to trimming and modifying videos, [video-encoding] for questions related to editing videos into any format, and [video-processing] for questions related to processing videos with filtering video frames.

f97a5dba-31c4-46bb-9a00-f930a94610bf.name: Sentry
f97a5dba-31c4-46bb-9a00-f930a94610bf.one liner: Sentry is an event logging platform primarily focused on capturing and aggregating exceptions.

06893461-7a25-4ece-910a-70d41e789782.name: Matplotlib
06893461-7a25-4ece-910a-70d41e789782.one liner: Matplotlib is a plotting library for Python which may be used interactively or embedded in stand-alone GUIs. Its compact "pyplot" interface is similar to the plotting functions of MATLAB®.

40f2882a-b8b0-4307-8740-5db50001f21f.name: Assets
40f2882a-b8b0-4307-8740-5db50001f21f.one liner:
1. Non-code files packed with an application (example, data or media files).

2. From a security point of view - any data or resource that should be (or can be) protected.

76163d0b-618d-4f44-a317-abb44bea73d3.name: Containers
76163d0b-618d-4f44-a317-abb44bea73d3.one liner: A container is a class, a data structure, or an abstract data type whose instances are collections of other objects.  Containers typically make use of generics or templates so that a wide variety of objects can be added.

d350071e-82e5-4431-9035-3bf7760b57a4.name: Instant Sikuli Test Automation
d350071e-82e5-4431-9035-3bf7760b57a4.title: Instant Sikuli Test Automation
d350071e-82e5-4431-9035-3bf7760b57a4.one liner: Discover automated application testing techniques for anything that is visible on the computer screen

8bd84cc0-ce13-4ad8-8cd1-a3c04068fe20.name: Smb
8bd84cc0-ce13-4ad8-8cd1-a3c04068fe20.one liner: Server Message Block, network-protocol for sharing files and printers implemented by Windows, Samba and others

b10d2b3a-49ff-4e80-b6c5-fe5ea88452d7.name: Atomicity
b10d2b3a-49ff-4e80-b6c5-fe5ea88452d7.one liner: In concurrent programming, an operation (or set of operations) is atomic, linearizable, indivisible or uninterruptible if it appears to the rest of the system to occur instantaneously. Atomicity is a guarantee of isolation from concurrent processes. Additionally, atomic operations commonly have a succeed-or-fail definition — they either successfully change the state of the system, or have no visible effect.

db3facc0-5f71-4008-a4ca-8c903d42dcc5.name: Getting Started with LevelDB
db3facc0-5f71-4008-a4ca-8c903d42dcc5.title: Getting Started with LevelDB
db3facc0-5f71-4008-a4ca-8c903d42dcc5.one liner: Learn how to build a high-performing app with an embedded database on iOS or OS X thanks to this superb, hands-on guide to LevelDB. Designed for beginners, but also a useful reference manual for the more experienced.

7095f1f2-0e03-410d-8dbb-5acb7cc43db8.name: Widget
7095f1f2-0e03-410d-8dbb-5acb7cc43db8.one liner: A widget is an element of a user interface (GUI widget) or a self-contained (usually small) software application (desktop widget).

c3997546-6d62-4b96-8baa-86b02b3d0116.name: Factors
c3997546-6d62-4b96-8baa-86b02b3d0116.one liner: A number a is a factor of a number b , if a divides b exactly.

ebc0e7ad-1a8c-46e6-b3c1-9717d5721fcf.name: Cassandra
ebc0e7ad-1a8c-46e6-b3c1-9717d5721fcf.one liner: Cassandra is a highly scalable, eventually consistent, distributed, structured row/column store.

bfadc018-60b5-43e2-9a42-eb97c41474f2.name: Upload
bfadc018-60b5-43e2-9a42-eb97c41474f2.one liner: Upload refers to the sending of data from a local system to a remote system such as a server or another client with the intent that the remote system should store a copy of the data being transferred, or the initiation of such a process

dbd0c5d8-29b3-4cb0-b0c3-dd9734e5679d.name: Tree
dbd0c5d8-29b3-4cb0-b0c3-dd9734e5679d.one liner: A tree is a widely-used data structure that emulates a hierarchical tree-like structure with a set of linked nodes.

4a4b20e5-efe8-41f7-882c-07297f0b2d26.name: Amazon Ec2
4a4b20e5-efe8-41f7-882c-07297f0b2d26.one liner: Amazon EC2 stands for "Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud". It is a part of Amazon Web Services (AWS) and allows users to rent virtual machine instances by the hour. You can create instances, launch and manage them through a central interface, through a web API or through a console.

c2245dfe-3fb9-48a1-bbca-e7ada38a7d35.name: Graphics
c2245dfe-3fb9-48a1-bbca-e7ada38a7d35.one liner: Graphics are visual presentations. Questions using this tag should also be tagged with the appropriate language and graphics subsystem in use. For more general graphics questions, consider Computer Graphics Stack Exchange (computergraphics.stackexchange.com).

61d216b3-2615-4a55-b9c4-4bc4d13cec2e.name: Seo
61d216b3-2615-4a55-b9c4-4bc4d13cec2e.one liner: IMPORTANT: Only programming-related SEO questions are acceptable on StackOverflow. Non-programming SEO questions should be asked on the network site Pro Webmasters at http://webmasters.stackexchange.com

7b1f04dd-e925-40c2-92fd-310f777691e1.name: Neo4j Cookbook
7b1f04dd-e925-40c2-92fd-310f777691e1.title: Neo4j Cookbook
7b1f04dd-e925-40c2-92fd-310f777691e1.one liner: Harness the power of Neo4j to perform complex data analysis over the course of 75 easy-to-follow recipes

5df56497-d8c6-4c31-9145-6882ee316ddd.name: Ddos
5df56497-d8c6-4c31-9145-6882ee316ddd.one liner: "A distributed denial of service attack (DDoS) occurs when multiple systems flood the bandwidth or resources of a targeted system, usually one or more web servers."

ee78e838-113c-4e80-9a25-0c27212d6bb1.name: Relational Database
ee78e838-113c-4e80-9a25-0c27212d6bb1.one liner: A relational database is a database consisting of relation variables (which are also called *relvars*, *R-tables* or just *tables*). The definition, manipulation and integrity rules of relational databases are based on relational operations equivalent to or similar to the Relational Algebra and Calculus. Relational database principles are the basis of a substantial part of data management theory and practice.

ae9b325b-431e-4dbf-81aa-ba183687e7f0.name: Session
ae9b325b-431e-4dbf-81aa-ba183687e7f0.one liner: A session refers to all the requests that a single client makes to a server. A session is specific to the user and for each user a new session is created to track all the request from that user.

e61f0827-c3df-4ca8-bd8f-9440c07b8068.name: Celery
e61f0827-c3df-4ca8-bd8f-9440c07b8068.one liner: Celery is a distributed task queue framework for Python, used for asynchronous and parallel execution.

6c9ed77e-0772-41af-a806-26abb31e37e8.name: Logistic Regression
6c9ed77e-0772-41af-a806-26abb31e37e8.one liner: Logistic regression is a statistical classification model used for making categorical predictions.

7dab9035-ed76-45e1-90e1-6387cf44d8ba.name: While Loop
7dab9035-ed76-45e1-90e1-6387cf44d8ba.one liner: A while loop is a control structure used in many programming languages to loop over a set of instructions as long as a particular condition is met.

ca527e6a-6c1b-4d7e-b1ce-49587e47f537.name: Lines
ca527e6a-6c1b-4d7e-b1ce-49587e47f537.one liner: This tag can refer to rows of characters in text output or input, or to the shortest distance between two points.

168352a7-a706-46e2-aaed-30803643fd99.name: Inject
168352a7-a706-46e2-aaed-30803643fd99.one liner: Design pattern to reduce coupling between components, by dynamically injecting into a software component dependencies that it needs to function.

cd98edb6-1547-40a3-8ee9-a652dde97100.name: Odoo Development Essentials
cd98edb6-1547-40a3-8ee9-a652dde97100.title: Odoo Development Essentials
cd98edb6-1547-40a3-8ee9-a652dde97100.one liner: Fast track your development skills to build powerful Odoo business applications

231c7d8b-d261-400b-b412-b0b2a1a364da.name: Destructor
231c7d8b-d261-400b-b412-b0b2a1a364da.one liner: A special method in object-oriented programming which is invoked when an object is destroyed

f7615441-d9f4-44a1-b553-e75cadc64af1.name: Mp3
f7615441-d9f4-44a1-b553-e75cadc64af1.one liner: MPEG-1 or MPEG-2 Audio Layer III,  more commonly referred to as MP3, is a patented digital audio encoding format using a form of lossy data compression. It is a common audio format for consumer audio storage, as well as a de facto standard of digital audio compression for the transfer and playback of music on digital audio players.

75cd953e-3456-4b2a-b8a5-6e7dbc9ad4b8.name: Message
75cd953e-3456-4b2a-b8a5-6e7dbc9ad4b8.one liner: Facebook messages, JavaScript messages, mobile messages (Android, iOS, windows-phone), etc.

e811641b-992e-4615-a1ff-3e2ddae893b0.name: Linear Regression
e811641b-992e-4615-a1ff-3e2ddae893b0.one liner: for issues related to linear regression modelling approach

7a5b6800-0e22-4e35-a72d-46428f5f2489.name: PySide GUI Application Development
7a5b6800-0e22-4e35-a72d-46428f5f2489.title: PySide GUI Application Development
7a5b6800-0e22-4e35-a72d-46428f5f2489.one liner: Newbies to GUI programming in Python will find this book indispensable. As well as the basic concepts, youll be taught PySide in detail through practical instructions and create your own applications with customized widgets and dialogs.

08f404b6-25f3-47e8-aea2-fe0f6c4812c9.name: Gestures
08f404b6-25f3-47e8-aea2-fe0f6c4812c9.one liner: The tag refers to a method of interaction with graphical user interface. Instead of simply choosing, user may draw a shape (so called gesture) over an item, which is recognized by the software and triggers specific reaction. Gestures are very popular, but not limited to touchscreen applications.

db8f4c6d-5a23-4725-9836-084b227f6fd3.name: Capitalize
db8f4c6d-5a23-4725-9836-084b227f6fd3.one liner: Capitalize is writing a word with its first letter as a capital letter (upper-case letter) and the remaining letters in lower case.

ce98278f-5078-47b1-b5ee-507801886b26.name: Project
ce98278f-5078-47b1-b5ee-507801886b26.one liner: Microsoft Project questions use the tag [ms-project].  In software development, a project is a collection of files and resources used in the development of an application or service.

ebcdf5ca-7631-4233-b117-53ab2d60bec6.name: Callback
ebcdf5ca-7631-4233-b117-53ab2d60bec6.one liner: A callback is a piece of code that is passed as an argument to other code, which is expected to call back (execute) the argument at some convenient time.

b3497636-ca23-48ea-8d6e-9aacc38366e5.name: Webapp2
b3497636-ca23-48ea-8d6e-9aacc38366e5.one liner: webapp2 is a lightweight Python web framework compatible with Google App Engine's webapp.

60848ec7-9c98-45a7-9992-9cfa04c0380a.name: Learning pandas
60848ec7-9c98-45a7-9992-9cfa04c0380a.title: Learning pandas
60848ec7-9c98-45a7-9992-9cfa04c0380a.one liner: Get to grips with pandasa versatile and high-performance Python library for data manipulation, analysis, and discovery

46097bd7-3fbe-4a55-aae8-3f55b7aeb2a3.name: Simulation
46097bd7-3fbe-4a55-aae8-3f55b7aeb2a3.one liner: Simulation is the imitation of some real thing, state of affairs, or process. The act of simulating something generally entails representing certain key characteristics or behaviours of a selected physical or abstract system.

289ef510-6062-4ad9-97fe-9ea5a82972d2.name: Bayesian
289ef510-6062-4ad9-97fe-9ea5a82972d2.one liner: Bayesian refers to methods in probability and statistics named after Thomas Bayes (ca. 1702–1761), in particular methods related to statistical inference

442c7367-fdb7-445f-b24a-c95731c34acd.name: Abstract
442c7367-fdb7-445f-b24a-c95731c34acd.one liner: abstract is a keyword shared by a multitude of object-oriented programming languages. Methods and classes can be marked abstract to indicate that they do not contain the full implementation of application logic and have to be extended. Abstract classes can not be instantiated and serve the purpose of providing a uniform interface for their subclasses, as well as the implementation of common methods that don't have to be reimplemented for each subclass.

8a4ae2e4-0327-44b9-9417-b3533997f6f9.name: Legacy
8a4ae2e4-0327-44b9-9417-b3533997f6f9.one liner: A legacy system is an old application, technology, mainframe, method, etc., still having an influence on an organization.

0bf19f45-07da-4d16-8473-167f8b0d0fd9.name: Groovy
0bf19f45-07da-4d16-8473-167f8b0d0fd9.one liner: Groovy is an object-oriented programming language for the Java platform. It is a dynamic language with features similar to those of Python, Ruby, Perl and Smalltalk. It can be used as a scripting language for the Java platform.

db5f05c5-73eb-46e1-8823-1afac8d92c18.name: Pivot
db5f05c5-73eb-46e1-8823-1afac8d92c18.one liner: The PIVOT syntax converts row data into columnar data, and vice versa for the UNPIVOT syntax.  Not all databases support the PIVOT syntax but the functionality can be implemented, often using decision logic (CASE statements, etc) and aggregate functions.

c67063bd-d02f-4f72-896c-549ea5cdeb9f.name: Logic
c67063bd-d02f-4f72-896c-549ea5cdeb9f.one liner: Logic is about reasoning. This tag is appropriate for such things as logic programming, programming problems involving a logical system, or basic questions about the logical systems used in programming.

f493c48d-ee2c-4dc7-9e2f-69a309f192db.name: Rss
f493c48d-ee2c-4dc7-9e2f-69a309f192db.one liner: Really Simple Syndication (RSS) is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format.

95b07456-a521-4f16-89f8-066e3d596c9d.name: Delimiter
95b07456-a521-4f16-89f8-066e3d596c9d.one liner: A delimiter is a sequence of one or more characters used to specify the boundary between separate, independent regions in plain text or other data streams.

34d588da-dee2-45b0-bff6-78cb305b9d97.name: Selenium Testing Tools Cookbook
34d588da-dee2-45b0-bff6-78cb305b9d97.title: Selenium Testing Tools Cookbook
34d588da-dee2-45b0-bff6-78cb305b9d97.one liner: Unlock the full potential of Selenium WebDriver to test your web applications in a wide range of situations. The countless recipes and code examples provided ease the learning curve and provide insights into virtually every eventuality.

a3542fd4-0698-4955-b93a-d4f3990d06f6.name: Buildout
a3542fd4-0698-4955-b93a-d4f3990d06f6.one liner: zc.buildout is a Python-based build system for creating, assembling and deploying applications from multiple parts, some of which may be non-Python-based. It lets you create a buildout configuration and reproduce the same software later on.

9013920b-12bc-4ff3-829e-2c9b484a8fff.name: Acceptance Testing
9013920b-12bc-4ff3-829e-2c9b484a8fff.one liner: Acceptance testing is a test conducted to determine if the requirements of a specification or contract are met

05ccf863-718d-45e7-acef-9e41412de2f2.name: Instant Minecraft: Pi Edition Coding How-to
05ccf863-718d-45e7-acef-9e41412de2f2.title: Instant Minecraft: Pi Edition Coding How-to
05ccf863-718d-45e7-acef-9e41412de2f2.one liner: Expand your Minecraft world by learning to code with Minecraft: Pi Edition

f6fa9b04-a30a-4f84-8137-ae9a0b864aa1.name: Atomic
f6fa9b04-a30a-4f84-8137-ae9a0b864aa1.one liner: An atomic operation is indivisible. This term is used to describe transactions in databases, low-level accesses in multithreaded programs, and file system operations, amongst others.

dabc53f9-6e2e-4d47-9dd8-f44dab9a7cf6.name: Orm
dabc53f9-6e2e-4d47-9dd8-f44dab9a7cf6.one liner: Object-relational mapping (ORM) is a technique for mapping between object-oriented systems and relational databases.

19d44154-09cc-4ae9-b101-a8761fd12ff1.name: Automation
19d44154-09cc-4ae9-b101-a8761fd12ff1.one liner: Automation is the process of having a computer do a repetitive task or a task that requires great precision or multiple steps, without requiring human intervention.

637e9f86-57f6-41f1-9fc8-18b3d4d703e2.name: Unlock
637e9f86-57f6-41f1-9fc8-18b3d4d703e2.one liner: When a device is locked, it needs to be "reactivated" in order to use it. This unlock is normally obtained by pressing a button and/or swiping a finger across the screen.

b8865028-a814-4046-8416-e48da07579c1.name: Semantics
b8865028-a814-4046-8416-e48da07579c1.one liner: The study of meaning as it applies to programming languages

762bf97e-6a00-40f4-a966-8adaa5841384.name: Performance
762bf97e-6a00-40f4-a966-8adaa5841384.one liner: For questions pertaining to the measurement or improvement of code and application efficiency.

33d12fa8-6b7e-41d5-b0f9-d711ae572aa0.name: Popover
33d12fa8-6b7e-41d5-b0f9-d711ae572aa0.one liner: A popover is a GUI element visually similar to a popup, except a popover is part of the page from which it is drawn, even though it might obscure part of it.

42c85957-0564-4df6-992f-9e412f39c9ea.name: Ml
42c85957-0564-4df6-992f-9e412f39c9ea.one liner: ML is a family of functional programming languages, including SML, OCaml, and F#.

19957d69-0623-4c4c-8da2-5fc30d4d3707.name: Windows
19957d69-0623-4c4c-8da2-5fc30d4d3707.one liner: Windows is a family of client, server, and mobile operating systems developed by Microsoft. Use this tag only if your question relates to using Windows APIs or Windows-specific behavior. Questions relating to using or troubleshooting Windows are off-topic.

4b4af775-4939-4083-a602-8051d9352d95.name: Mastering pandas
4b4af775-4939-4083-a602-8051d9352d95.title: Mastering pandas
4b4af775-4939-4083-a602-8051d9352d95.one liner: Master the features and capabilities of pandas, a data analysis toolkit for Python

60fada83-e483-4fcf-b85e-90f5bb1d07ec.name: Social
60fada83-e483-4fcf-b85e-90f5bb1d07ec.one liner: The term social refers to a characteristic of living organisms as applied to populations of humans and other animals.

58140b50-8d89-4a62-8378-dbfa6de131c8.name: Nosql
58140b50-8d89-4a62-8378-dbfa6de131c8.one liner: NoSQL (sometimes expanded to "not only SQL") is a broad class of database management systems that differ from the classic model of the relational database management system (RDBMS) in some significant ways.

2a7bd69e-47cd-4967-985e-2688b6de3605.name: Media
2a7bd69e-47cd-4967-985e-2688b6de3605.one liner: Media are the storage and transmission channels or tools used to store and deliver information or data.

67e9aff1-e4dd-4353-9790-8ca6ae7ba8c8.name: Programming ArcGIS 10.1 with Python Cookbook
67e9aff1-e4dd-4353-9790-8ca6ae7ba8c8.title: Programming ArcGIS 10.1 with Python Cookbook
67e9aff1-e4dd-4353-9790-8ca6ae7ba8c8.one liner: This book provides the recipes you need to use Python with AcrGIS for more effective geoprocessing. Shortcuts, scripts, tools, and customizations put you in the driving seat and can dramatically speed up your workflow.

6cac3ae1-753e-4cda-a7a2-46a9976b2bac.name: Sta
6cac3ae1-753e-4cda-a7a2-46a9976b2bac.one liner: Single-Threaded Apartment of the Component Object Model (COM), as opposed to MTA

d08d42e0-fa95-4948-9a82-e5c8fde3b7de.name: Cascade
d08d42e0-fa95-4948-9a82-e5c8fde3b7de.one liner: Cascade refers to a table-definition keyword in relational databases; it instructs the query engine to take a certain action (delete, update), when a primary key is modified, on tables linked by a foreign key.

83c9bb93-2dd3-4d10-9c99-341d55183479.name: PostgreSQL Cookbook
83c9bb93-2dd3-4d10-9c99-341d55183479.title: PostgreSQL Cookbook
83c9bb93-2dd3-4d10-9c99-341d55183479.one liner: Over 90 hands-on recipes to effectively manage, administer, and design solutions using PostgreSQL

acf277bc-ed5c-4c8c-865a-54d49948b875.name: Bullet
acf277bc-ed5c-4c8c-865a-54d49948b875.one liner: Bullet is an Open Source collision detection and rigid body dynamics library. The Library is free for commercial use and open source under the ZLib License. **Do not use this for bullet points.**

cfee00ca-b9f9-4047-882a-7d57c2370153.name: FreeCAD
cfee00ca-b9f9-4047-882a-7d57c2370153.title: FreeCAD
cfee00ca-b9f9-4047-882a-7d57c2370153.one liner: Solid Modeling with the power of Python with this book and ebook.

932eb6b0-bec0-4ad0-a1fd-4a740627a71b.name: Fill
932eb6b0-bec0-4ad0-a1fd-4a740627a71b.one liner: fill refers to the process of assigning and rendering a color or pattern to the set of coordinates within the outline of a shape.

f1f1e7c7-fb5b-450f-b2e0-fea64a144c2d.name: Database
f1f1e7c7-fb5b-450f-b2e0-fea64a144c2d.one liner: A database is an organized collection of data typically used to model certain situations. Use this tag if you have questions about designing a database. If it is about a particular database management system, (e.g., MySQL), please use that tag instead.

55dda3c2-713a-4a8e-9fc1-bf05bfc5ce08.name: Pickle
55dda3c2-713a-4a8e-9fc1-bf05bfc5ce08.one liner: Pickle (serialization in Java) is an object serialization module for Python.

59c39c73-44ae-4451-be3b-e235b74201cf.name: Difference
59c39c73-44ae-4451-be3b-e235b74201cf.one liner: This tag may refer to 1) the difference between two numbers (i.e. the difference between 5 and 10 is 5) or 2) the things that two or more particular objects do not share in common.

86d03aa6-7311-41e8-a60d-80dc84aaf121.name: Polymer
86d03aa6-7311-41e8-a60d-80dc84aaf121.one liner: Polymer is a new type of library for the web, built on top of Web Components, and designed to leverage the evolving web platform on modern browsers.

189c90e0-506b-461b-8214-f4e1ee532b80.name: Offline
189c90e0-506b-461b-8214-f4e1ee532b80.one liner: Refers to the status of being unable to connect to a network; in most situations, this is specifically referring to the Internet.

64e33bd0-c3c6-472e-8d46-faa6819ca013.name: Types
64e33bd0-c3c6-472e-8d46-faa6819ca013.one liner: Types, and type systems, are used to enforce levels of abstraction in programs.

e8543f81-ac7a-45f2-9f59-4dfbbcd98450.name: Python
e8543f81-ac7a-45f2-9f59-4dfbbcd98450.one liner: Python is a dynamic and strongly typed programming language that is designed to emphasize usability. Two similar but incompatible versions of Python are in widespread use (2 and 3). Please consider using [tag:python-2.7] or [tag:python-3.x] tags for version-specific questions about Python.

13e0fa6c-4d4f-499a-a839-2acd1a65a324.name: Microphone
13e0fa6c-4d4f-499a-a839-2acd1a65a324.one liner: A microphone is an acoustic-to-electric transducer or sensor that converts sound into an electrical signal.

ed0412f3-123d-4d18-8f4a-2a5c9ceb8d86.name: Debian
ed0412f3-123d-4d18-8f4a-2a5c9ceb8d86.one liner: Debian is a universal operating system composed of over 29000 free and open-source software packages. The primary form of Debian, Debian GNU/Linux, uses the Linux kernel and GNU OS tools.

e8bc56c1-36f4-47da-a559-1ed2dcce471f.name: Naming Conventions
e8bc56c1-36f4-47da-a559-1ed2dcce471f.one liner: Naming conventions refer to general rules governing names assigned to programming constructs such as variables and methods. These conventions facilitate readability, and thus improved maintainability of code by enforcing naming consistency across disparate modules.

755cacd0-b073-4e64-84a4-fc7abd490006.name: Cluster Computing
755cacd0-b073-4e64-84a4-fc7abd490006.one liner: A computer cluster is a set of connected systems that work together so that in many respects they can be viewed as a single system.

d7e24e86-af07-4bed-b267-e4fe5ae91042.name: Simulate
d7e24e86-af07-4bed-b267-e4fe5ae91042.one liner: For issues relating to simulating a system, action, function, or behavior.

b642fdc5-0529-4427-8ff3-5df03275a5e2.name: Shapely
b642fdc5-0529-4427-8ff3-5df03275a5e2.one liner: PostGIS-ish operations outside a database context for Pythoneers and Pythonistas.

7818f766-51ce-4040-a1c8-c20021b740c2.name: Tokenize
7818f766-51ce-4040-a1c8-c20021b740c2.one liner: Tokenizing is the act of splitting a string into discrete elements called tokens.

a038473e-6d8b-4675-954f-85e5028c7122.name: Shell
a038473e-6d8b-4675-954f-85e5028c7122.one liner: The term 'shell' refers to a general class of text-based command interpreters most often associated with the Unix & Linux operating systems.

8946c0ed-e03b-4bdf-a8d6-8b35b6f7bf98.name: Mastering Python for Finance
8946c0ed-e03b-4bdf-a8d6-8b35b6f7bf98.title: Mastering Python for Finance
8946c0ed-e03b-4bdf-a8d6-8b35b6f7bf98.one liner: Understand, design, and implement state-of-the-art mathematical and statistical applications used in finance with Python

d4a42169-4c99-4a74-828d-2052b1ef7069.name: Installation
d4a42169-4c99-4a74-828d-2052b1ef7069.one liner: The process of installation is the deployment of an application onto a device for future execution and use.

0fe99a02-8f7f-4a85-b655-c8d43c977fda.name: Selenium
0fe99a02-8f7f-4a85-b655-c8d43c977fda.one liner: Selenium is a popular open-source tool for automating web browsers. When using this tag, also include other tags for the specific components you are using, e.g. selenium-webdriver for the language bindings, selenium-ide, selenium-grid, etc.

1a5ffc88-2f2c-44ac-9cdc-e217e09b5d02.name: Events
1a5ffc88-2f2c-44ac-9cdc-e217e09b5d02.one liner: An event is a way for a class to provide notifications to listeners when a particular thing happens.

6b7014fd-5fad-42a1-b47c-785318ed0918.name: Casting
6b7014fd-5fad-42a1-b47c-785318ed0918.one liner: Casting is a process where an object type is explicitly converted into another type if the conversion is allowed.

693709ac-e6bd-43d5-820e-cff41af4ac49.name: Pouchdb
693709ac-e6bd-43d5-820e-cff41af4ac49.one liner: PouchDB is a client side database solution built on top of browser provided databases (IndexedDB and WebSQL). It's implemented in JavaScript and aims to be as much compatible with CouchDB as possible. It can also replicate to and from CouchDB, so is a good fit for offline applications with synchronisation capabilities. Official website: http://pouchdb.com/

379ef51d-fe92-40c8-9119-49af3faf5755.name: Real Time
379ef51d-fe92-40c8-9119-49af3faf5755.one liner: A task is real-time when the timeliness of the activities' completion is a functional requirement and correctness condition, rather than merely a performance metric.  A real-time system is one where some (though perhaps not all) of the tasks are real-time tasks.

34000b13-ac17-432b-9166-9f59922ddfa6.name: Jade
34000b13-ac17-432b-9166-9f59922ddfa6.one liner:
High performance templating engine heavily influenced by Haml

If you're looking for the Java Agent DEvelopment framework please use [tag:agents-jade] tag

e07a740c-8a80-41c0-8b3b-fb1b355dbc59.name: Duck Typing
e07a740c-8a80-41c0-8b3b-fb1b355dbc59.one liner: In Duck Typing, an object's methods and properties determine its valid semantics rather than its membership in a particular class or its interface.

5c42fd26-a913-41f0-a424-bd67a98d3aba.name: Twilio
5c42fd26-a913-41f0-a424-bd67a98d3aba.one liner: Twilio is an API company that provides web services and tools that developers can use to send and receive text/picture messages, make and receive phone calls, and embed VoIP calling into web and native mobile applications.

d0d8f3c2-3afc-4261-af9b-01b43e8997f3.name: Svg
d0d8f3c2-3afc-4261-af9b-01b43e8997f3.one liner: SVG (Scalable Vector Graphics), is an XML-based two-dimensional vector graphics format.

7c4ffbe8-f5da-4183-8cd2-95385d036aec.name: Heroku Toolbelt
7c4ffbe8-f5da-4183-8cd2-95385d036aec.one liner: Heroku command-line tooling for working with the Heroku platform, on OS X, Windows and Debian/Ubuntu.

ab08d37a-879d-42c5-b8db-1f25a74455fd.name: Analytics
ab08d37a-879d-42c5-b8db-1f25a74455fd.one liner: For questions related to analytics methods and tools.

c45fef3d-288c-4eb6-9790-e72360b6e19a.name: Gradient
c45fef3d-288c-4eb6-9790-e72360b6e19a.one liner: Specifies a range of position-dependent colors, usually used to fill a region.

efa9bdfc-4a70-4288-b7f1-764c4ebaa8b1.name: Sml
efa9bdfc-4a70-4288-b7f1-764c4ebaa8b1.one liner: Standard ML is a high-level functional language with type inference.

2c4f841e-fa81-45e0-94a4-d37f81e6d69a.name: Less
2c4f841e-fa81-45e0-94a4-d37f81e6d69a.one liner: Less is an open-source stylesheet preprocessor that extends CSS with dynamic behavior such as variables, mixins, operations and functions. It's also a unix command to display a file.

d9247860-d5dd-4f12-9457-f8b79fc9f334.name: Building Real-time Communication Applications Using Twilio [Video]
d9247860-d5dd-4f12-9457-f8b79fc9f334.title: Building Real-time Communication Applications Using Twilio [Video]
d9247860-d5dd-4f12-9457-f8b79fc9f334.one liner: Use Twilio to develop innovative Pusher-based apps with telephony integration

708aeafc-cf03-4ada-910e-397acbcde117.name: Silverlight
708aeafc-cf03-4ada-910e-397acbcde117.one liner: Silverlight is Microsoft's cross-browser, cross platform plug-in for media experiences and rich interactive applications.

e88d0080-d280-4e14-802a-2d6e4c3fc6bc.name: Main
e88d0080-d280-4e14-802a-2d6e4c3fc6bc.one liner: In many programming languages, the main function, subroutine, or method marks the entry point of the program.  It is generally the first-programmer-written function run when a program starts.

aaaf1fa6-85e3-4379-ac15-f4fdd2c2ef33.name: Benchmarking
aaaf1fa6-85e3-4379-ac15-f4fdd2c2ef33.one liner: Benchmarking is the process of comparing two or more systems or processes under controlled circumstances in order to have a quantitative measure with which to compare or rank them.  The benchmarking tag should be used for questions about how to perform benchmarking tasks or theory questions, not for lists of benchmarking results or requests for benchmarking data; those questions are off-topic for Stack Overflow.

8f72409c-aea6-4842-9b1d-988cdb1ea5db.name: Django 1.2 E-commerce
8f72409c-aea6-4842-9b1d-988cdb1ea5db.title: Django 1.2 E-commerce
8f72409c-aea6-4842-9b1d-988cdb1ea5db.one liner: Build powerful e-commerce applications using Django, a leading Python web framework

a966e5d4-a286-44e3-b7ea-b326089f866e.name: Redis
a966e5d4-a286-44e3-b7ea-b326089f866e.one liner: An open source BSD-licensed in-memory data structure store used as database, cache and message broker. Supports data structures such as strings, hashes, lists, sets, sorted sets with range queries, bitmaps, hyperloglogs and geospatial indexes with radius queries. Has built-in replication, Lua scripting, LRU eviction, transactions and different levels of on-disk persistence, high availability via Redis Sentinel and automatic partitioning with Redis Cluster.

3af300ad-67b1-467f-85cb-697d7fddc3c7.name: Rust
3af300ad-67b1-467f-85cb-697d7fddc3c7.one liner: Rust is a systems programming language focused on three goals: safety, speed, and concurrency. It maintains these goals without needing a garbage collector, making it a useful language for a number of use cases other languages aren't good at: embedding in other languages, programs with specific space and time requirements, and writing low-level code, like device drivers and operating systems.

e6873c62-caf5-4a47-a431-6548080a103f.name: Minecraft
e6873c62-caf5-4a47-a431-6548080a103f.one liner:
A voxel-based sandbox game coded in Java by Mojang where players place and destroy blocks to gain armor, weapons and tools in a randomly generated world.

Note: Minecraft questions are generally OFF-TOPIC on Stack Overflow.

fd43c6fb-eade-4d33-b5da-b63b7633bf1d.one liner: pandas is a library for Panel Data manipulation and analysis, e.g. multidimensional time series and cross-sectional data sets commonly found in statistics, experimental science results, econometrics, or finance.

4bb5a67d-0b3d-43b7-bd37-c08e34ca750b.name: Algebra
4bb5a67d-0b3d-43b7-bd37-c08e34ca750b.one liner: Algebra is the branch of mathematics concerning the study of the rules of operations and relations, and the constructions and concepts arising from them, including terms, polynomials, equations and algebraic structures.

fbe8d638-9382-47d5-b3b5-7e5e1b811efb.one liner: Algorithms which solves mathematical problems by means of numerical approximation (as opposed to symbolic computation).

895a8d62-5cd9-422a-ac93-0f26ecb1b002.one liner: A programming idiom is a way to overcome a programming language limitation and/or to write commonly-used code with a purpose that is separated from a literal meaning of the code. Also, an idiom is a preferred way to write code, when there is more than one obvious way to do it.

4ea7f869-19ec-4b4b-8033-499b295b1c98.name: Traffic
4ea7f869-19ec-4b4b-8033-499b295b1c98.one liner: Term used to refer to the amount or flow of data around a network or website

57772341-2f1d-4027-a01b-85d98fb04df5.one liner: Standards are officially published or well agreed upon formats, procedures, or protocols. They allow individuals or organizations to collaborate by setting ground rules or boundaries. Standards often come with a set of preconditions or assumptions, which allow collaborators to take those conditions or assumptions as ground truth.

28d11d4e-3bbf-412b-924e-a800e5e21a2d.name: Angularjs
28d11d4e-3bbf-412b-924e-a800e5e21a2d.one liner: AngularJS is an open-source JavaScript framework. Its goal is to augment browser-based applications with Model–View–Whatever(MV*) capability and reduce the amount of JavaScript needed to make web applications functional. These types of apps are also frequently known as Single-Page Applications.

78ab5be3-9700-44c1-a189-f859f71609f0.one liner: A postback is a technique in web development in which a page sends an HTTP POST back to the same form on the server.

letters, followed by "n") is the process of planning and implementing products and services
so that they can easily be adapted to specific local languages and cultures, a process called localization. The internationalization process is sometimes called translation or localization enablement.

e8060d49-2bbd-4db9-86f8-c8257d2f0ef8.one liner: The singleton is a design pattern to ensure that exactly one application-wide instance of a particular class exists.

2f49ac4a-b862-47b0-a44e-9ac8582fd339.one liner: In computer programming, a switch, case, select or inspect statement is a type of selection control mechanism

7a4de0f4-7c68-48cd-8522-45e986ce7fe8.name: Csv
7a4de0f4-7c68-48cd-8522-45e986ce7fe8.one liner: Comma-Separated Values or Character-Separated Values (CSV) is a standard "flat file database" format for storing tabular data in plain text, consisting of an optional header row that lists the table fields delimited by commas or tabs or other delimiter character, followed by one or more rows (newline separated) representing the table records as delimited lists of the values. Newlines and separator characters can appear within (quoted) fields.

cf2bafed-d4bc-4159-8210-d5dbb87d1c3b.one liner: Analysis is the process of searching code, documents, or data to answer a particular question or predict a particular result.

1e20f213-43de-493e-a656-e10409a33d6a.one liner: CPU usage indicate how much of a workload is being handled by the CPU.

99e5991b-5e35-4999-85af-1540d88cb7cc.one liner: In programming, annotations are used to add information to a code element which cannot be expressed by the type system.

df968500-e299-42d2-ab76-176ce6aba96c.one liner: Trigonometry is a branch of mathematics that studies triangles and the relationships between their sides and the angles between sides

950b0994-8e99-4b4f-a2c1-31bfbd813379.name: Usb

f3811a0d-d6ae-40ec-ab97-1e3dbae06774.name: Voip
f3811a0d-d6ae-40ec-ab97-1e3dbae06774.one liner: Voice over Internet Protocol (Voice over IP, VoIP) is one of a family of internet technologies, communication protocols, and transmission technologies for delivery of voice communications and multimedia sessions over Internet Protocol (IP) networks, such as the Internet. VoIP protocols can be further subdivided into Signalling and Media Protocols. Signalling protocols are used to establish VoIP sessions while the Media Protocols carry actual voice traffic.

2149670b-3837-4644-9324-b0444b2446d2.name: Neo4J
2149670b-3837-4644-9324-b0444b2446d2.one liner: Neo4j is an open-source, transactional graph database well suited to connected data. You can use it for a variety of use-cases directly from all JVM languages or via other language drivers via the HTTP-APIs.

c39191cc-3af5-46df-a7df-15b4b3b1857f.name: Core
c39191cc-3af5-46df-a7df-15b4b3b1857f.one liner: A core dump file contains an image of a process's memory, usually produced during a crash

58e1381d-29d0-4f14-a2c6-f23a516c51c0.name: Flash
58e1381d-29d0-4f14-a2c6-f23a516c51c0.one liner: For questions on Adobe's cross-platform multimedia runtime used to embed animations, video, and interactive applications into web pages. For questions related to memory, use the tag [flash-memory].

e860e690-7deb-4af4-ad8a-e59add9622a1.name: Thrift
e860e690-7deb-4af4-ad8a-e59add9622a1.one liner: Thrift is a software framework for scalable cross-platform, cross-language services development available from Apache.

c44917e5-49cd-4fef-9074-757834ef6744.name: Spi
c44917e5-49cd-4fef-9074-757834ef6744.one liner: Serial Peripheral Interface (SPI) is a serial, synchronous bus commonly used in embedded systems. It is most often used for communication between a microcontroller and peripheral hardware such as memories, shift registers, sensors, displays etc, but can also be used for MCU to MCU communication.

bf9d6157-ece8-48c2-952c-214cdd046aa3.name: Override
bf9d6157-ece8-48c2-952c-214cdd046aa3.one liner: Method overriding, in object oriented programming, is a language feature that allows a subclass or child class to provide a specific implementation of a method that is already provided by one of its superclasses or parent classes.

c3730db2-109f-4555-a88f-dff7e9e9a88c.one liner: Persistence in computer programming refers to the capability of saving data outside the application memory.

50ffdb60-6d8c-476a-a68c-bf1278ce3ebf.name: Registration
50ffdb60-6d8c-476a-a68c-bf1278ce3ebf.one liner: Registration is a process through which a person or entity provides some necessary information about himself to the company or other entity he/it wants to be registered with.

83ab3fe1-5d40-496e-8c61-1e58ab0c2398.one liner: Data validation is the process of ensuring that a program operates on clean, correct and useful data.

0ccca434-04eb-478e-a8b3-aaeae5e6ecc1.one liner: Multimedia Message Service(MMS) is an extension of the Short Message Service(SMS) protocol which allows for multimedia to be passed in messages. Microsoft Media Server(MMS) is  Microsoft's proprietary network streaming protocol for Windows Media.

f1ba4e55-0bcb-4d83-95c7-33eb4af5b2a8.name: News
f1ba4e55-0bcb-4d83-95c7-33eb4af5b2a8.one liner:
News is the communication of selected information on current events. 
It is shared in various ways: among individuals and small groups (such as by word of mouth or newsletters); with wider audiences (such as by publishing, either in print or online, or broadcasting, such as on television or radio); or in ways that blend those traits (such as when social media sharing starts among individuals but goes viral).

59cee2dd-ecac-4b0c-9b7d-bb4d5c53fd2e.name: Distributed
59cee2dd-ecac-4b0c-9b7d-bb4d5c53fd2e.one liner: is for questions dealing with distributed systems, programs and programming.

fb0bbcbd-13fe-4a22-917d-3d7e445739a6.one liner: MQTT - a light on the wire protocol for publish/subscribe.  Clients and servers in various languages, C, Python, Erlang, C# and Java and Javascript.

a343dafb-250a-43e1-8c07-3ce570efe6d8.one liner: remote-server is a machine used for data processing which is accessed via a network

68ec4d98-c0f5-4dd6-bf30-0e20c916a601.name: Rgb
68ec4d98-c0f5-4dd6-bf30-0e20c916a601.one liner: RGB stands for Red-Green-Blue and specifies a color using three values, which represent the respective amount of red, green, and blue in the color.  RGB is the basis for the color model used by most color display devices nowadays.

42a240bd-efa3-4f12-a311-6c2f3cf395e9.name: Hook
42a240bd-efa3-4f12-a311-6c2f3cf395e9.one liner: "Hook" is a broad programming term that usually refers to replacing default behavior with a custom behavior or injecting a listener into a stream of activity.

f8ef1481-0934-4a04-be72-007029d7e6bb.one liner: A random variable X is called continuous if its set of possible values is uncountable, and the chance that it takes any particular value is zero (P(X=x)=0 for every real number x). A random variable is continuous if and only if its cumulative probability distribution function is a continuous function.

c99ba190-95f4-4606-9716-9f7c8eacdf6d.one liner: Computation is paramount to the discipline of computer science, and deals with the type and use of computing technology in information processing, in particular, in the context of an algorithm, or a protocol.

cfee9f67-7a24-4b3b-955c-b8de3c4fbca5.name: C
cfee9f67-7a24-4b3b-955c-b8de3c4fbca5.one liner: C is a general-purpose computer programming language used for operating systems, libraries, games and other high performance work. It is clearly distinct from C++. It was developed in 1972 by Dennis Ritchie for use with the Unix operating system.

5eb523ab-1e8d-46e9-a386-0094e46f5192.one liner: Voice Recognition means identification of the person talking and is frequently misapplied to mean "Speech Recognition" - identification of what is being said.

157a4a22-930e-40ed-841e-95c133722a50.one liner: WSS stands for Windows SharePoint Services, SharePoint Server 2007's "little" brother. It forms the basis for the full blown server product. As of SharePoint Server 2010 it is called SharePoint Server Foundation.

f2d4128c-8323-4218-9c65-29e17ce750c2.name: Administrator
f2d4128c-8323-4218-9c65-29e17ce750c2.one liner: An administrator account is a user account on an operating system which allow make changes that can affect other users (including, but not limited to, the creation and restriction of user accounts), change operating system options (including  security settings), install software and drivers, access all files.

63ba079e-0147-4171-8f36-dc4282a6fef0.one liner: Cygwin is a Unix-like environment and command-line interface for Microsoft Windows. Cygwin provides native integration of Windows-based applications, data, and other system resources with applications, software tools, and data of the Unix-like environment. Thus it is possible to launch Windows applications from the Cygwin environment, as well as to use Cygwin tools and applications within the Windows operating context.

522f93c5-15b0-4f22-8ba6-10e8b4ff3a6d.one liner: Plotly is a graphing and analytics platform.

37829064-d632-4388-8f4d-2ef29a16fb43.one liner: Deep Learning is an area of Machine Learning whose goal is to learn complicated functions that represent "deep architectures."

750758b9-9455-4824-9bba-23e939067553.one liner: Questions related to GStreamer(also known as Gst), a leading open source multimedia framework, powering everything from linux servers and linux desktop systems to a host of embedded devices.

c2a57bac-b17e-4a57-92ef-81713c4a26c3.one liner: A programming concept about finding results based on some kind of search. Typically used when talking about regular expressions.

7621a6ab-7041-4a22-a3e6-e2590c338f05.one liner: A string is a finite sequence of symbols, commonly used for text, though sometimes for arbitrary data.

6c1a3d39-e690-464d-8296-d0d40bd33acc.one liner: A record in programming is a data type with labels to access fields of the record.

19365231-2b12-46d5-b178-b35f99744825.one liner: Addition is a mathematical operation that represents combining collections of objects together into a larger collection. It is signified by the plus sign (+).

05339b33-690d-413b-91f6-2ff4dfde32ef.one liner: A prefix is a part of a word attached to a beginning of a word which modifies the meaning of that stem.

9eb80842-2913-423f-8138-b9927cbabde5.name: Gunicorn
9eb80842-2913-423f-8138-b9927cbabde5.one liner: Gunicorn 'Green Unicorn' is a Python WSGI HTTP Server for UNIX. It's a pre-fork worker model ported from Ruby's Unicorn project. The Gunicorn server is broadly compatible with various web frameworks, simply implemented, light on server resources, and fairly speedy.

54dc45d7-5234-4bf0-a883-92474383f459.name: Views
54dc45d7-5234-4bf0-a883-92474383f459.one liner: Views (db) refer to database constructs that allow a user to join several tables together or restrict access to certain data. Views (UI) refer to generic objects with a graphical interface.

094d1f86-9510-4e92-9e99-c570dfc0541d.name: Topology
094d1f86-9510-4e92-9e99-c570dfc0541d.one liner: Topology is the mathematical study of the properties that are preserved through deformations, twistings, and stretchings of objects. Tearing, however, is not allowed. A circle is topologically equivalent to an ellipse (into which it can be deformed by stretching) and a sphere is equivalent to an ellipsoid.

82921d6d-919e-4f64-91c4-eafa41075dbd.name: Inverse
82921d6d-919e-4f64-91c4-eafa41075dbd.one liner: In mathematics, a function y=f(x) tells us how to map input x to output y. Inverting a function (or an operator) is attempting to find a function f¯¹ that maps y to x, such that x=f¯¹(f(x)).

43f6fc2e-9e72-4abc-8f90-452a1295cad6.name: Apache Spark
43f6fc2e-9e72-4abc-8f90-452a1295cad6.one liner: Apache Spark is an open source cluster computing system that aims to make data analytics fast — both fast to run and fast to write, originally developed in the AMPLab at UC Berkeley.

7e0f95fe-8a23-4ec9-ad78-d5ed81e1960d.name: Phone
7e0f95fe-8a23-4ec9-ad78-d5ed81e1960d.one liner: Do not use this tag, but use a more specific tag instead, e.g.: [windows-phone-8], [android] or [ios].

9f01b50f-1ca9-46d1-a5e8-c180584015b1.name: Auto
9f01b50f-1ca9-46d1-a5e8-c180584015b1.one liner: The `auto` keyword was repurposed in C++11 for a deduced type.  When used to replace a type name in an initialized variable declaration, the variable is given the same type as the initializer.  When used as a return type, the return type is specified as a trailing return type, or deduced from the return-expression.

a2d69f18-ff82-4147-968a-ef342e53db1c.name: Missing Data
a2d69f18-ff82-4147-968a-ef342e53db1c.one liner: For questions relating to missing data problems, which can involve special data structures, algorithms, statistical methods, modeling techniques, visualization, among other considerations.

14ceaa2a-cb57-43b3-ba4f-ccd940114161.name: Tail
14ceaa2a-cb57-43b3-ba4f-ccd940114161.one liner: The tail is the part of a list that comes after the head. It's also a unix command that shows the last lines of a file.

b04b5d8a-47e5-444f-bd43-1dc66002b211.name: Handle
b04b5d8a-47e5-444f-bd43-1dc66002b211.one liner: Handle is an abstraction of a resource or a reference to an entity. It can have different implementations: a pointer, an index in a table etc.

01a8560c-398a-48f8-94b2-ba3f65c2c540.name: Fortran
01a8560c-398a-48f8-94b2-ba3f65c2c540.one liner: Fortran is a general-purpose, procedural, imperative programming language that is especially suited for numeric computation and scientific computing. Since 2003, standard Fortran also supports object-oriented programming.

ab97f587-773a-4047-8afe-e62cdf010f51.name: Dst
ab97f587-773a-4047-8afe-e62cdf010f51.one liner: DST is the tag for Daylight Saving Time issues.  DST starts when a time zone shifts its clocks forward (in the spring), and ends when the clocks shift back (in the fall).

c5e42504-eabb-447e-a86e-bad8526d7a82.name: Html
c5e42504-eabb-447e-a86e-bad8526d7a82.one liner: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the standard markup language used for structuring web pages and formatting content. HTML describes the structure of a website semantically along with cues for presentation, making it a markup language, rather than a programming language. The most recent revision to the HTML specification is HTML5.

e8dbe6ae-43f1-4f98-b05a-4dcb0a6cb541.name: Pip
e8dbe6ae-43f1-4f98-b05a-4dcb0a6cb541.one liner: pip is a replacement for easy_install, intended to be an improved Python package installer.

59e264ea-4c86-441e-8631-73aa1cfb1835.title: Learning Nagios 4
59e264ea-4c86-441e-8631-73aa1cfb1835.one liner: For system administrators who want a fast, easily understood introduction to Nagios 4, this is the perfect book. Get to grips with the latest version of this powerful monitoring tool and transform the stability of your whole system.

08e9a830-a1df-4fbd-8be7-33c1ecfe3eb3.name: Scientific Computing
08e9a830-a1df-4fbd-8be7-33c1ecfe3eb3.one liner: Use this tag for questions about using computers in science. Many of these questions also fit on scicomp.stackexchange.com.

8df5fcb9-69f3-423c-819e-5daea891e41e.name: Solaris
8df5fcb9-69f3-423c-819e-5daea891e41e.one liner: Solaris is a Unix operating system originally developed by Sun Microsystems. Oracle Solaris, as it is now known, has been owned by Oracle Corporation since Oracle's acquisition of Sun in January 2010. Solaris is known for its scalability, especially on SPARC systems, and for originating many innovative features such as DTrace, ZFS and Time Slider. Solaris supports SPARC-based and x86-based workstations and servers from Sun and other vendors.

94a699c0-2f63-42a0-8161-b18351ca0353.name: Cloud9 Ide
94a699c0-2f63-42a0-8161-b18351ca0353.one liner: Cloud9 is an open-source, online development environment that combines a live test server with built-in support of several languages.

7e6636e7-11e2-41ee-82f0-f72d21808d1b.name: Raspberry Pi Blueprints

7e6636e7-11e2-41ee-82f0-f72d21808d1b.one liner: Design and build your own hardware projects that interact with the real world using the Raspberry Pi

2e175918-067b-49fc-9bb8-d03f67ab6795.name: Folding
2e175918-067b-49fc-9bb8-d03f67ab6795.one liner: Code folding is a feature of some text editors and IDEs that allow some text to be temporarily hidden or "collapsed" in order to hide detail.

2c1ab0fa-88bc-4122-b101-de776e95aff5.name: Grep
2c1ab0fa-88bc-4122-b101-de776e95aff5.one liner: grep is a command-line text-search utility originally written for Unix.

c2cc32d6-38ed-4aed-8e21-4fa97447025a.name: Push Notification
c2cc32d6-38ed-4aed-8e21-4fa97447025a.one liner:
Push notifications are alerts, badges, or sounds which are pushed to a mobile device from a remote server.

Apple delivers push notifications via the Apple Push Notification Service (APNS). Android devices receive push notifications via the Google Cloud Messaging (GCM) service. In the past, Android devices used the Cloud to Device Messaging (C2DM) framework. Windows Phone apps receive push notifications via the Microsoft Push Notification Service (MPNS).

598b6fed-d052-4c81-be9b-9f4fbd46eeb1.name: Struct
598b6fed-d052-4c81-be9b-9f4fbd46eeb1.one liner: A keyword in the C family of languages for declaring a structured composite data type.

00f5372a-c980-44b8-99d3-878a3261e03e.name: User
00f5372a-c980-44b8-99d3-878a3261e03e.one liner: A user is an agent, either a human agent (end-user) or software agent, who uses a computer or network service.

094a9dad-e916-4641-a0f1-094bd1ae451a.one liner: D3.js is a small, open-source JavaScript data visualization library for manipulating HTML, SVG, and CSS documents based on data.

b43ab6fc-5078-4568-b761-21eb1b1e0f3b.name: Revision
b43ab6fc-5078-4568-b761-21eb1b1e0f3b.one liner:
Revision: A release of a piece of software which is not
a major release or a bugfix, but only introduces small
changes or new features.

a120d0eb-05c1-4ea6-90fd-bfe01f4e82b4.one liner: In several languages, the operator keyword is used to identify methods which will be used in operator overloading.

f02c2dad-e4df-4655-b3c2-ba1c681ca687.one liner: SQLAlchemy is a Python SQL toolkit and Object Relational Mapper that gives application developers the full power and flexibility of SQL.

bd054feb-2d13-49db-9f32-1f9c86052ff2.one liner: Inference is the act or process of deriving logical conclusions from premises known or assumed to be true. The conclusion drawn is also called an idiomatic. The laws of valid inference are studied in the field of logic.

bcd282a2-c760-4b4f-90bc-004b90450ba4.name: Rdbms
bcd282a2-c760-4b4f-90bc-004b90450ba4.one liner: A relational database management system (RDBMS) is a database management system (DBMS) in which data is stored in tables and the relationships among the data are also stored in tables.

0a8e2b41-1c1b-4dac-b1d6-98498de42b45.one liner: A scatter plot is a type of mathematical diagram using Cartesian coordinates to display values for two variables for a set of data.

f8e973ca-7384-4d5a-b3e8-8dde542f9ed7.one liner: Code-Readability is how easy it is to understand a piece of code. Whether it be reading someones code, or writing your own.

57ea397c-4588-4b19-a578-a70c6b78f6fc.one liner: web2py is a open-source full-stack web framework written in Python 2.x.

802e6dbd-fb04-4eef-a9f1-e914498d8d23.one liner: AIX (Advanced Interactive eXecutive, pronounced "a i ex") is a series of proprietary Unix operating systems developed and sold by IBM for several of its computer platforms.

31418ab2-0257-4a81-8e53-403bd51735d4.one liner: Decouple an abstraction from its implementation so that the two can vary independently.

92e8512e-2cc1-440c-8f77-7dc47f966b30.one liner: Embedded refers to embedded systems, which involves areas such as microcontroller/DSP firmware programming, real-time systems, electronic interfaces, hardware drivers, serial bus communication etc.

7d25be2d-a9a7-4f7e-9456-2cc974e0f5c6.name: Yaml
7d25be2d-a9a7-4f7e-9456-2cc974e0f5c6.one liner:
YAML is a data serialization format designed for human readability. YAML is a recursive acronym for "YAML Ain't Markup Language".
YAML is similar to JSON, and in fact, JSON is a subset of YAML 1.2; but YAML has some more advanced features and is easier to read. 
Use this tag for YAML specific questions only, not for questions about programs that happen to have their configuration in a YAML format (use just their specific tags e.g.: jekyll, travis-cl).

b5a5652a-8a11-4914-828c-96451f817d16.name: Opera
b5a5652a-8a11-4914-828c-96451f817d16.one liner: Opera is a series of web browsers developed by Opera Software ASA. The desktop versions up to 12.x used the Presto rendering engine, while newer versions (15+) use Blink, a fork of WebKit.

0528df12-68f3-4d59-af92-7e4fed0c4860.one liner: Config files configure the initial settings for some computer programs

A job is a process executing in the background, or scheduled for later execution.  

**DO NOT** use this tag for career, employment, or hiring practice questions, as these are off-topic!

5f9f3917-d43e-46a4-9d89-04b14668dc6c.one liner: Receiving data to a local system from a remote system, or to initiate such a data transfer.

Pay for what you use model with no minimum fees or startup costs.

7f110ade-7cda-4c38-85a6-9bcce92c4a78.one liner: Artificial intelligence (AI) is the branch of computer science and technology that studies the development of machines able to simulate aspects of human intelligence. Broadcasting can be performed as a high level operation in a program, for example broadcasting Message Passing Interface, or it may be a low level networking operation, for example broadcasting on Ethernet.

a5ad4709-8251-42b7-a722-6235564b4af4.one liner:
Autodesk Maya is a 3D modeling, animation and rendering tool used by many entertainment companies in film, TV and advertising.

63462660-8178-46ec-9d2f-4319201968a1.one liner: The concept of keeping software or hardware functional in a productive environment

f191e637-6b7c-4fbc-9746-4d964971bddf.one liner: Visual Studio is an integrated development environment (IDE) from Microsoft. Do not use this tag unless you have a specific question about Visual Studio -- not just a coding issue.

8c1c6301-7467-40d1-87cf-8060ec7a2b3d.one liner: super is a keyword or function used to access/invoke members and constructors of a superclass.

e7567e4d-0862-4c46-992f-67d3a046712e.one liner: IntelliSense is Microsoft's implementation of automatic [code-completion], best known for its use in the Microsoft Visual Studio integrated development environment.

8106492c-c033-470d-9738-4786e3049163.one liner: Rendering is the process of generating an image from a model (or models in what collectively could be called a scene file), by means of computer programs.

f61ab53f-f0be-4f14-8beb-f5a64368b4e5.one liner: Use this tag for general questions related to all aspects of the world wide web. For specific portions, use the specific tag for it, such as [uri], [websites], [html] and [http].

aa597a0f-ce4e-4137-8097-6d20160aaf48.one liner: tmux is a terminal multiplexer: it enables a number of terminals (or windows), each running a separate program, to be created, accessed, and controlled from a single screen. tmux may be detached from a screen and continue running in the background, then later reattached.

a577e386-8ac3-4bd6-9722-4f7ba75e75ec.one liner: A programming language is an artificial language designed to express computations that can be performed by a machine, particularly a computer.

5e3f36ad-038a-453c-ab44-b4dca7aa6268.one liner: Python Tools for Visual Studio turns Visual Studio into a Python IDE. It's a free & open source plug-in for Visual Studio, written and supported by Microsoft and community.

0c24aa2f-a32b-41e6-aaf8-187df0d9f1a9.one liner: Vert.x is an event driven application framework that runs on the JVM allowing the development of asynchronous web applications in Java, Javascript, CoffeeScript Ruby, Python, Clojure, Ceylon and Groovy.

65810c3c-113b-4720-90f1-fb46e9f37d1f.one liner: Programming language constructs designed to handle errors signaled by error codes, exceptions or other language specific means.

dfad7eb1-3412-4480-b071-6a32bed22f22.one liner: Extensible Markup Language (XML) is a flexible, structured document format that defines human- and machine-readable encoding rules.

67f1f9fe-37ae-4fc6-94c0-5c2cd0eab06d.one liner: A Processor incorporates the functions of a computer's central processing unit (CPU)

7fa68117-dea5-4bf0-a8a6-a75d83db677d.one liner: Arduino is an open-source electronics prototyping platform based on easy-to-use hardware and software. It's intended for anyone making interactive projects.

095e9003-2e7b-41ae-af97-72daffc7db44.one liner: A data structure is a way of organizing data in a fashion that allows particular properties of that data to be queried and/or updated efficiently.

d271cc44-ef6f-491d-bea1-1bbfc3b3563a.one liner: A mechanism for interacting with a computer operating system or software by typing commands to perform specific tasks

1aa95d3b-db41-4b23-8fee-19e22039cf42.name: Short
1aa95d3b-db41-4b23-8fee-19e22039cf42.one liner: A short integer is an integer number which may take less storage, while having a smaller range, than a standard integer on the same machine.

22b6f91d-a1a8-40e5-bbfc-11ea6c74106a.one liner: The system through which people interact with a computer is called the "UI", which stands for "User Interface." Note that there's a separate Stack Exchange site for User Interfaces, and Interaction- and User Experience design: http://ux.stackexchange.com.

fbd8919d-3955-4303-89ad-f95eee5ae564.one liner: A solution (.sln file) is a structure for organizing projects in Visual Studio. It groups one or more projects that work together to create an application.

IVRs can be used to handle requests automatically; or to gather preliminary information from the caller such as identification and reason for calling, before routing the call on to an appropriate agent.

7cbbaa3f-9052-4a09-b1ec-ba7bad5cde40.one liner: FastCGI is a protocol for interfacing interactive programs with a web server. FastCGI is a variation on the earlier Common Gateway Interface (CGI); FastCGI's main aim is to reduce the overhead associated with interfacing the web server and CGI programs, allowing a server to handle more web page requests at once.

384070d7-ede3-4162-aae7-013ad391a3c8.name: ArcGIS Blueprints

8ff6a2ec-679c-4c1d-8855-4686e89cd0d0.one liner: A sequence is an ordered list of objects (or events). Like a set, it contains members (also called elements or terms), and the number of terms (possibly infinite) is called the length of the sequence. Unlike a set, order matters, and exactly the same elements can appear multiple times at different positions in the sequence.

4ace4eb2-3cd6-4f95-83be-e97818222eb2.name: Toolchain
4ace4eb2-3cd6-4f95-83be-e97818222eb2.one liner: A toolchain is a collection of software tools that work together to build and manage programs.

5b88ef6e-5548-4327-a9b5-d1ae2e1df33a.one liner: A relation on sets S1, S2, ..., SN is any subset of S1 x S2 x ... x SN, where 'x' denotes the Cartesian product. In other words, a relation over N sets is any set of ordered N-tuples over the N sets.

cd00d65d-ba34-4ea0-ae2f-5b6c560cca67.one liner: Heroku Postgres is the SQL database service run by Heroku that is provisioned and managed as an add-on.

You may also consider asking your question on [*robotics* stack exchange](http://robotics.stackexchange.com/).

0fa43794-cbe1-442f-86fb-f6a85023e343.one liner:
A task is an abstraction that is used to work with concurrency, it can denote operation that should be executed concurrently with the rest of a program.
A task is a concurrent thread of execution in Ada and represents an asynchronous operation in .NET, also it corresponds to Threads in Java.

d392e9d0-90a6-4ac5-818d-091b282671a8.one liner:
An interface refers to the point of interaction between components. Interfaces are applicable at both the hardware and software level. 

In general, an interface exposes a contract without exposing the underlying implementation details. In Object Oriented Programming, interfaces define abstract types that expose behavior, but contain no logic. Implementation is defined by the class or type that implements the interface.

fe528500-4753-4b29-8926-73dd826fcc1e.one liner: A programming idiom is the usual way to code a task in a specific language. c9ebcce6-aaea-4e2b-bd54-8afc71f79241.one liner: A buffer is an area of memory set aside for temporary storage of data while it is being moved from one place to another. This is typically done to speed up processes with significant latency, such as writing to a disk, printer or other physical device. The output is ready to be sent to the device before the device is ready to accept it, so it is moved to the buffer so that the sending program does not have to continue waiting.

f59e1a3d-01f4-4159-a28c-b8e706acdc5f.name: Bounding Box
f59e1a3d-01f4-4159-a28c-b8e706acdc5f.one liner: A Bounding Box is the smallest box that encloses a geometry. There are two common classes of Bounding Boxes that are employed: Oriented Bounding Boxes (OBB), and an Axis-Aligned Bounding Boxes (AABB). Bounding boxes are commonly employed as a cheap way to approximate more complex geometries in a range of applications, including collision detection.

89e231c8-8b2d-49e9-8d21-9b5df76c48fb.one liner: A component in the Unified Modeling Language "represents a modular part of a system, that encapsulates its content and whose manifestation is replaceable within its environment. A component defines its behavior in terms of provided and required interfaces". The best example of component can be found in ActionScript- Flash,Flex sdks. There you have UI components like buttons, labels, DataGrids, charts those are reusable, distributable etc.

2bb98343-ffd1-489f-85bd-54557ef94a50.one liner: Elixir is an open-source, dynamic, compiled, general purpose functional programming language. It was designed to be fully compatible with the Erlang platform and is well suited to writing fault-tolerant, distributed applications with soft real-time guarantees and the ability for hot-code-swapping.

82675cf7-3a3d-4ff0-b908-323d8e1d1e31.name: System
82675cf7-3a3d-4ff0-b908-323d8e1d1e31.one liner: System may refer to a set of interdependent components; Low level infrastructure like the operating system (from a high language point of view) or an object or function for accessing the previous

07f9461d-c66d-4c83-896d-fc75e64b40c3.name: Odoo
07f9461d-c66d-4c83-896d-fc75e64b40c3.one liner: Odoo is a suite of open-source business apps written in Python and released under the AGPL license. It is used by 2 million users worldwide to manage companies of all different sizes. The main Odoo components are the server, 260 core modules (also called official modules) and around 4000 community modules.

c990758a-25fb-4130-9afc-4a13b343ba8c.name: Game Engine
c990758a-25fb-4130-9afc-4a13b343ba8c.one liner: A game engine is a software framework used in the development of video games. Otherwise use the engine-specific tag(s).

71cb558e-7d21-4503-93a3-0c7d4a72ca8b.name: Deep
71cb558e-7d21-4503-93a3-0c7d4a72ca8b.one liner: Anything related to so-called deep operations on recursive data structures, such as trees. A deep operation traverses the entire data structure, in contrast with "shallow" operations that only affect its "first level". For example, a deep-copy operation on a directory tree would copy the entire tree instead of copying only the content of the root directory.

7cf8e4fc-fec2-4d17-ae50-62d0efa39830.name: Mib
7cf8e4fc-fec2-4d17-ae50-62d0efa39830.one liner: A MIB is an acronym for Management Information Base in use with the SNMP Protocol.

This allows alternative implementations to be provided based on certain characteristics of the parameterized type that is being instantiated. Template specialization has two purposes: to allow certain forms of optimization, and to reduce code bloat.

13cc6312-a973-4fce-84db-3db28f1592c1.one liner: Middleware is computer software that provides services to software applications beyond those available from the operating system. It can be described as "software glue".

abd40a2b-233d-4052-b0b7-4dbf1a59b2af.one liner: LXC is an operating system-level virtualization method for running multiple isolated Linux systems (containers) on a single control host. It is sometimes referred to as “chroot on steroids”.

9cfebf8b-7df4-4f0f-933c-044b4f2bc0b8.name: Textures
9cfebf8b-7df4-4f0f-933c-044b4f2bc0b8.one liner: Textures are series of images used in computer graphics to associate locations on a visible surface with varying values. This association is typically done by mapping locations on the texture (usually two-dimensional, but other dimensions and types of textures exist) to locations on the rendered surface. Filtering is often used to smooth away aliasing when sampling values from the texture, usually involving multiple images within a texture called mipmaps.

ab31a3c2-6b0d-4ce4-8fad-5bc27c66ee69.name: Salt
ab31a3c2-6b0d-4ce4-8fad-5bc27c66ee69.one liner: Cryptography function that takes random bits and a string (typically a password) and uses a one-way hash to provide a new string that can be used for authentication without providing access to the original string. If a salt function uses enough random bits, the resulting string is generally considered cryptographically secure.

593688a0-2a84-4840-bfa1-e36ebe1fa334.name: Building
593688a0-2a84-4840-bfa1-e36ebe1fa334.one liner: Building is the process by which source code is converted into executable object code.

9779ee78-767f-45fa-b5d7-66666df671b7.name: Models
9779ee78-767f-45fa-b5d7-66666df671b7.one liner: A model is an abstract representation of a real-life object or process.  Models are a part of the popular MVC pattern, as well as a more general concept in the sciences for approximating behavior.

15458639-fe6e-4a68-88cd-845b78e0a125.name: Location
15458639-fe6e-4a68-88cd-845b78e0a125.one liner:
Location is a specific position in physical space, e.g. a point on the surface of the Earth described using latitude and longitude coordinates.
This tag should NOT be used for questions related to the position of a virtual element e.g. position of a pixel on a bitmap or position of a layout element on UI (use [position] tag in that cases).

af53fa03-13b6-49ce-aa7c-88c4dd0c9e88.name: Least Squares
af53fa03-13b6-49ce-aa7c-88c4dd0c9e88.one liner: Refers to a general estimation technique that selects the parameter value to minimize the squared difference between two quantities, such as the observed value of a variable, and the expected value of that observation conditioned on the parameter value.

65f738b5-5bf2-4e5c-8f56-b2e9848128f9.name: Timing
65f738b5-5bf2-4e5c-8f56-b2e9848128f9.one liner: timing is a numerical measurement of the how long it takes to execute an instruction or series of instructions

afe07d57-8921-4833-8c98-b4b3e3a8079d.name: Mastering Google App Engine
afe07d57-8921-4833-8c98-b4b3e3a8079d.title: Mastering Google App Engine

c17ee251-88ee-40c4-a5a7-70028d2399e5.name: Jackson
c17ee251-88ee-40c4-a5a7-70028d2399e5.one liner: Jackson is a Java library for handling tasks like reading and writing (parsing / generating) and data binding to/from Java objects. Although primarily used for JSON, Jackson also supports many other data formats such as Avro, CBOR, CSV, Smile, XML, and YAML.

1bbef07a-a3ea-446c-8d97-1616a24e2c2c.name: Mel
1bbef07a-a3ea-446c-8d97-1616a24e2c2c.one liner: MEL is the Maya Embedded Language used to automate processes in the 3D rendering software Maya.

f2dbe0a2-cb4c-4d40-b189-83064a6a95ca.one liner: What Firebug is for the client, Glimpse does for the server... in other words, a client side Glimpse into what's going on in your ASP.NET server.

5607581a-b9b2-4203-9ce4-cb00de263116.name: Shape
5607581a-b9b2-4203-9ce4-cb00de263116.one liner: Defines the boundaries of a visual respresentation.

56843d7b-20ca-4c34-acc2-9f8580b6bc4e.name: Release
56843d7b-20ca-4c34-acc2-9f8580b6bc4e.one liner: Refers to the act of finalizing a software building process for distribution to end-users. Do not use this tag if your question is about indicating that a chunk of memory can be reclaimed. Instead, use [memory-management].

b45b8bc9-cb0d-4896-ad42-02df19766d3d.name: Payment
b45b8bc9-cb0d-4896-ad42-02df19766d3d.one liner: The process of transferring money, normally in exchange for some product or service

5cb84d61-a3d0-4f28-a456-57f805fb578c.name: Statistics
5cb84d61-a3d0-4f28-a456-57f805fb578c.one liner: Consider whether your question would be better at http://stats.stackexchange.com. Statistics is the mathematical study of using probability to infer characteristics of a population from a limited number of samples or observations.

242f0366-855a-4324-8326-0ceeb89071c5.name: Connector
242f0366-855a-4324-8326-0ceeb89071c5.one liner: An API typically used to provide a bridge between a piece of code and some disparate entity. Examples of such entities include database applications and server-side processes.

af96ac77-0817-4668-8f0a-3a7fc35dd8f8.name: Hive
af96ac77-0817-4668-8f0a-3a7fc35dd8f8.one liner: Hive is a data warehouse system for Hadoop that facilitates easy data summarization, ad-hoc queries, and the analysis of large datasets stored in Hadoop compatible file systems. Hive provides a mechanism to project structure onto this data and query the data using a SQL-like language called HiveQL.

de9e8037-5c73-4aa7-946f-19daf1336e19.name: Svn
de9e8037-5c73-4aa7-946f-19daf1336e19.one liner: Subversion is a centralized open-source revision control system

6c7e3074-2405-428d-895c-0c9a5d019900.name: Design Patterns
6c7e3074-2405-428d-895c-0c9a5d019900.one liner: A design pattern is a general reusable solution to a commonly occurring problem in Software Design.

2d2ac470-169a-42f0-a376-a8ec370a5da9.name: Eclipse
2d2ac470-169a-42f0-a376-a8ec370a5da9.one liner: Eclipse is an open source IDE and platform for building applications. There is a wide variety of plugins for various programming languages and other development-oriented tools (such as modeling, database browsing, etc.). This tag should only be used for questions specifically about the Eclipse IDE or platform, not for generalized (Java, Android, etc.) programming topics.

ef036647-5f03-4dbf-a800-ffc635f55d05.name: Maybe
ef036647-5f03-4dbf-a800-ffc635f55d05.one liner: In Haskell, the Maybe type encapsulates an optional value.

127176c4-e95b-4be2-8d5f-4437b12de3ea.name: Feature Extraction
127176c4-e95b-4be2-8d5f-4437b12de3ea.one liner: In pattern recognition and in image processing, feature extraction is a special form of dimensionality reduction. Transforming the input data into the set of features is called feature extraction. If the features extracted are carefully chosen it is expected that the features set will extract the relevant information from the input data in order to perform the desired task using this reduced representation instead of the full size input.

dc5047f8-6439-45c4-81b3-4f48d7404cc0.name: Typescript
dc5047f8-6439-45c4-81b3-4f48d7404cc0.one liner: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript created by Microsoft that adds optional types, classes, interfaces and modules and compiles to plain JavaScript.

26370fa9-3752-4f8a-889e-5c11fd413f6d.name: Scalability
26370fa9-3752-4f8a-889e-5c11fd413f6d.one liner: Scalability is the ability of a system, network, or process, to handle growing amount of work in a capable manner or its ability to be enlarged to accommodate that growth.

d066fa42-ede0-4c75-8acc-5737a063eba2.name: Pycharm
d066fa42-ede0-4c75-8acc-5737a063eba2.one liner: PyCharm is an integrated development environment (IDE) for Python. It is developed by JetBrains for Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.

382af8a9-ecff-42f6-a1b9-0140aa70464e.title: Building Websites with Plone
382af8a9-ecff-42f6-a1b9-0140aa70464e.one liner: An in-depth and comprehensive guide to the Plone content management system.

43d9097e-27a2-46d6-a311-e5d0d394420d.name: Driver
43d9097e-27a2-46d6-a311-e5d0d394420d.one liner: Device driver or software driver is a computer program allowing higher-level computer programs to interact with a hardware device. This tag should only be used for questions related to driver development, as questions about finding or installing drivers are off-topic for StackOverflow.

556bccaf-4b65-4639-88e6-f459ac3c7435.name: Backtracking
556bccaf-4b65-4639-88e6-f459ac3c7435.one liner: Backtracking is a general algorithm for finding solutions to some computational problem, that incrementally builds candidates to the solutions.

6b919f32-6a43-43b8-beaf-5e4d25bd9d8d.one liner: RabbitMQ is an open source robust messaging software for applications based on the AMQP protocol.

fd54e40b-f35a-4b0a-b9b9-dacd6f4501b7.one liner: The Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) manages the activation and lifetime of the worker processes that contain applications that host WCF services. For Websphere AS, please use [websphere] tag.

b53870b3-5074-4efc-aedc-7bc34f7b680f.one liner: Abstraction is a computer science concept in which an implementation is separated from its interface.

2947dff2-d707-4caa-9a1d-868bdb25d848.one liner: If you want to master object-oriented Python programming this book is a must-have With 750 code samples and a relaxed tutorial, its a seamless route to learn.

a26c6532-11f7-4af3-becc-55f3d08b4987.one liner: try-catch is a syntactic construct for catching exceptions raised by a code section
