7de6c4b6-9c9d-4271-9c86-ce4158837520.title: Introduction to Hadoop with Google Cloud and Google Storage - part 2
7de6c4b6-9c9d-4271-9c86-ce4158837520.one liner: In this BLOG post we learned how to use the Google Cloud SDK to setup Hadoop via Windows and Cygwin.

5c71c995-3512-4583-97e5-22796883ea9c.one liner: THIS TAG IS AMBIGUOUS! Please tag your platform and/or language instead. A separation between words, glyphs, or areas of a screen.

39cf99fe-db18-4d73-b285-1f1b89716436.one liner: the aspects of database usage not directly related to the insertion and extraction of information, such as security, configuration and performance finetuning

43a9052d-fbf9-41af-ac11-40f93a02e4ac.name: Contrast
43a9052d-fbf9-41af-ac11-40f93a02e4ac.one liner: the difference in color and light between parts of an image

ee2608c6-e6d8-436f-bc94-8bc90d57d847.name: Fault
ee2608c6-e6d8-436f-bc94-8bc90d57d847.one liner: A fault is the immediate cause of a failure. It might be e.g. an incorrect statement in a method. The execution of the faulty method might result in a failure at execution time.

f3720cf3-d5c4-494d-9ae1-bcc817df092a.name: Command
f3720cf3-d5c4-494d-9ae1-bcc817df092a.one liner: A command is a directive to a computer program acting as an interpreter of some kind, in order to perform a specific task. Most commonly a command is a directive to some kind of command line interface, such as a shell.

d2f6dac9-a50a-4530-93af-b688abc68f2f.name: Android Actionbar
d2f6dac9-a50a-4530-93af-b688abc68f2f.one liner: The ActionBar is Android's window feature that identifies the application and user location, and provides user actions and navigation modes.

29e6f2be-1d5b-48cb-8826-ee6823716763.name: Doctest
29e6f2be-1d5b-48cb-8826-ee6823716763.one liner: The doctest module searches for pieces of text that look like interactive Python sessions, and then executes those sessions to verify that they work exactly as shown. The test cases and expected output can be copied from an interactive Python interpreter session. During regression testing doctest alerts about failed cases.

532e526c-5c6f-4e93-884c-7c0476a32c96.name: Next
532e526c-5c6f-4e93-884c-7c0476a32c96.one liner: Coming immediately after in a sequence; subsequent. Often refers to iterators, that provide next() and hasNext() methods.

9e6d6f51-87ac-4047-967d-05b23398811f.name: Rpc
9e6d6f51-87ac-4047-967d-05b23398811f.one liner: Remote Procedure Call (RPC) is an approach to interprocessor or distributed communication wherein a set of services or procedures are exposed to remote clients.  RPC is both a general concept for interprocessor communication and shorthand for Sun's original implementation (referred to as SunRPC to disambiguate.)

e6693828-36c9-4b1c-aade-671512f95163.name: Split
e6693828-36c9-4b1c-aade-671512f95163.one liner: Use this tag for questions about separating a item (e.g. a string) into parts, often by a delimiter.

cb82642f-d05c-41aa-bba9-d1f210523bcb.name: Strategy Pattern
cb82642f-d05c-41aa-bba9-d1f210523bcb.one liner: The strategy pattern (also known as the policy pattern) is a software design pattern, whereby an algorithm's behavior can be selected at runtime.

ec98e3c3-9792-4991-a5a1-1ea388b9a6cc.name: Production
ec98e3c3-9792-4991-a5a1-1ea388b9a6cc.one liner: "Production" is commonly referred to as the stage in software lifecycle where it's available to be used by the intended end user.

29202d68-7f3c-49bb-9d57-cebdcfd26599.one liner: Use this tag for questions about software libraries. This tag is NOT for questions about computer programs used in public lending libraries or other brick-and-mortar libraries.

0ef628d8-b179-4ddd-9899-f47f59f23af1.name: K-Means Clustering
0ef628d8-b179-4ddd-9899-f47f59f23af1.title: K-Means Clustering
0ef628d8-b179-4ddd-9899-f47f59f23af1.one liner: One of the most common clustering method is K-Means, which is a simple iterative method to partition the data into K - clusters.

d234dc5f-1130-4bf3-b69c-57497787e2a3.name: Server
d234dc5f-1130-4bf3-b69c-57497787e2a3.one liner: A server is a running instance of an application (Software) capable of accepting requests from the client and giving responses accordingly.

ca209bbb-8adc-4fb1-a4e3-6b095ba224be.name: Ghost Blog
ca209bbb-8adc-4fb1-a4e3-6b095ba224be.one liner: Ghost is a minimalistic open source blogging platform that is built with JavaScript (Node.js in particular) and that defaults to Markdown for drafting posts.

58b90465-1e4f-4bc8-af5b-3d3878980962.name: If Statement
58b90465-1e4f-4bc8-af5b-3d3878980962.one liner: An "if" statement is a control structure in many programming languages that changes the execution flow depending on a condition.

48048ea0-8a6f-4a39-925a-243031974e92.one liner: Bigtable is a distributed storage system (built by Google) for managing structured data that is designed to scale to a very large size: petabytes of data across thousands of commodity servers.

12d6b00d-36dc-44de-afe7-0056409d4a2e.name: Beagleboard
12d6b00d-36dc-44de-afe7-0056409d4a2e.one liner: The BeagleBoard is an ultra-low cost, high performance, low power ARM Cortex-A8 (OMAP3/DM37x/AM335x) based single board computer designed by BeagleBoard.org community members.

cbfba465-7b1d-4260-9eef-0b08bae0ffdf.name: Theory
cbfba465-7b1d-4260-9eef-0b08bae0ffdf.one liner: Programming-language-agnostic Questions that focus on the theoretical aspects rather than the actual implementations.

1e25126e-baee-43a7-9733-26eb7118f811.name: Recompile
1e25126e-baee-43a7-9733-26eb7118f811.one liner: The act of compiling something again.

cfe682fd-46d5-4936-b06c-e20e5613ed6d.name: Fabric
cfe682fd-46d5-4936-b06c-e20e5613ed6d.one liner: A Python library and command-line tool for streamlining the use of SSH for application deployment or systems administration tasks.

6e9f1593-056e-419d-9ecb-6a857d5cc2b3.name: Xss
6e9f1593-056e-419d-9ecb-6a857d5cc2b3.one liner: Cross-site scripting (XSS) is a type of computer security vulnerability typically found in web applications that enables malicious attackers to inject client-side script into web pages viewed by other users. An exploited cross-site scripting vulnerability can be used by attackers to bypass access controls such as the same origin policy.

2e69eaaf-7ad9-4d8b-a767-ca1a82b05a91.name: Amazon SimpleDB: LITE
2e69eaaf-7ad9-4d8b-a767-ca1a82b05a91.title: Amazon SimpleDB: LITE
2e69eaaf-7ad9-4d8b-a767-ca1a82b05a91.one liner: A book and eBook that addresses: what is SimpleDB, how does it compare to relational databases, and how to get started?

55963feb-73fd-415a-afe6-59c34cce829b.name: Nginx
55963feb-73fd-415a-afe6-59c34cce829b.one liner: Nginx ("engine x") is a lightweight, high-performance HTTP server, reverse proxy, TCP stream proxy and mail proxy, released under a BSD-like license.

e229dea2-b690-4ee5-ad55-ff74b7cdd6bb.name: Radial Gradients
e229dea2-b690-4ee5-ad55-ff74b7cdd6bb.one liner: A linear interpolation between two or more colors based on the distance from the center of a circle or ellipse. In radial gradients, the colors emerge from a single point and smoothly spread outward in a circular or elliptical shape unlike in linear gradients where it is from one end to another. Use this tag for any question pertaining to creation or usage of radial gradients.

6a561fd8-1979-4946-82ca-8ee6ced0f448.name: Hardware
6a561fd8-1979-4946-82ca-8ee6ced0f448.one liner: Programming questions related to the physical components of a computer.  Please specify the model of your hardware in your question.

1d91e525-8f14-45f5-a513-d123120040e5.name: BeagleBone Home Automation

1d91e525-8f14-45f5-a513-d123120040e5.one liner: The Internet of Things is now being taken up by tech corporations but this fantastic book brings you the DIY approach to home automation using BeagleBone. From dimming the lights to opening the garage door  its all here.

e86572ad-49e0-4403-9d62-4e24d0d6702c.name: Theano
e86572ad-49e0-4403-9d62-4e24d0d6702c.one liner: Theano is a numerical computation library for Python. In Theano, computations are expressed using a NumPy-like syntax and compiled to run efficiently on either CPU or GPU architectures.

13a44bc0-8c28-4100-be30-6156a3942aab.name: Git
13a44bc0-8c28-4100-be30-6156a3942aab.one liner: Git is an open-source distributed version control system (DVCS).

837e4d82-46b1-48bf-bd0d-e5f4b58c4ee2.name: FreeCAD: Open Source Design on the Bleeding Edge

837e4d82-46b1-48bf-bd0d-e5f4b58c4ee2.one liner: Are you looking for software for designing physical objects for 3D printing or physical construction? Computer-aided design (CAD) software is used extensively in engineering when designing objects that will be physically constructed.

5f796f49-70c4-400e-8214-301e014ff51b.name: Factory
5f796f49-70c4-400e-8214-301e014ff51b.one liner: an OOP pattern to implement an interface responsible for creating objects.

871263b5-2c65-4478-9ea7-a460a441ab2f.one liner: A battery is a portable electrical power source which is often used in mobile devices.

224aaa6a-210e-487e-912e-63418a7bebe1.name: Vba
224aaa6a-210e-487e-912e-63418a7bebe1.one liner: Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) is an event-driven, object-oriented programming language for writing macros, used for the entire Office suite as well as other applications. 56e6c0a2-c0cc-4af1-8ac4-8e090ec733ab.name: Code Reuse
56e6c0a2-c0cc-4af1-8ac4-8e090ec733ab.one liner: The use of existing software, or software knowledge, to build new software

9d7ea961-d082-4dc3-86f5-5ff2605de769.name: Colors
9d7ea961-d082-4dc3-86f5-5ff2605de769.one liner: Use this tag for questions about representing or manipulating colors in a programming language.

dae750cf-12a2-4cb4-9d1d-5eaafca9645f.one liner:
A Content Management System (CMS) is a platform used to build websites that are easily edited by multiple users.

NOTE:  Product recommendations are off-topic for Stack Overflow; if you are using this tag to ask for CMS recommendations, your question is off-topic!

e4c3d57e-cdcc-4301-98cc-0df899802dd5.name: Docker
e4c3d57e-cdcc-4301-98cc-0df899802dd5.one liner: Docker provides a high-level API to containerize unix processes and applications with some degree of isolation and repeatability across servers.

a75f73cc-3d29-4418-a784-457469b73ae6.one liner: Cypher is a graph query language for Neo4j. For ciphers as in encryption, see cipher.

f3128393-3863-4ab8-8c93-432ffbaae716.one liner: Cluster analysis is the process of grouping "similar" objects into groups known as "clusters", along with the analysis of these results.

ce65ff6d-21bf-4830-ab34-b89035b0d50c.one liner: Real-time, 3D and interactive mix of real and virtual components. A dedicated StackExchange proposal exists on this topic: http://area51.stackexchange.com/proposals/86452/augmented-reality

d2cbaddd-99e2-4dd5-aed5-6b67614f3a38.name: Stl
d2cbaddd-99e2-4dd5-aed5-6b67614f3a38.one liner:
The Standard Template Library, or STL, is a C++ library of generic containers, iterators, algorithms, and function objects.

When C++ was standardised, large parts of the STL were adopted into the Standard Library, and these parts in the Standard Library are also sometimes referred to collectively as "the STL".

da13207b-e40e-49c1-824b-5b5c5e9febc9.name: Emacs
da13207b-e40e-49c1-824b-5b5c5e9febc9.one liner: GNU Emacs is an extensible, customizable, self-documenting text editor. At its core is an interpreter for Emacs Lisp, a dialect of the Lisp programming language with extensions to support text editing.

0ba75a4a-d1b4-4e2a-bf3d-8e47f5b97d94.name: Controls
0ba75a4a-d1b4-4e2a-bf3d-8e47f5b97d94.one liner: Controls may be refer to Microsoft ActiveX controls which is a simple OLE object that supports the IUnknown interface.

e688ec7e-7c90-423e-bd4f-3ef90c527f46.name: Egg
e688ec7e-7c90-423e-bd4f-3ef90c527f46.one liner: A python egg is a file used for distributing python projects as bundles; it is usually compressed with the zip algorithm.  Egg files normally include some metadata; the file extension is ".egg".  The concept is very similar to a Java .jar file.

5c5449bb-33f8-4d7c-a384-e11c04b2e6fc.name: Triggers
5c5449bb-33f8-4d7c-a384-e11c04b2e6fc.one liner: Triggers are rules, that when evaluate to true perform one or more actions.

b060c03e-5654-4263-b485-22574bfb460b.name: Speech Recognition
b060c03e-5654-4263-b485-22574bfb460b.one liner: Speech recognition is the technology that is used to convert spoken words to text.

a21af295-46f3-460e-8db0-67d16090e639.name: Decoder
a21af295-46f3-460e-8db0-67d16090e639.one liner: A device or a software which purpose is to decode an encoded signal or stream.

7c634d00-4084-41c0-899e-7dc04d76dbd5.name: Adc
7c634d00-4084-41c0-899e-7dc04d76dbd5.one liner: An analog-to-digital converter (ADC) is a device that converts a continuous signal to a serie of digital numbers.

524334f9-4a47-46fa-9df0-a9abfc65102c.name: Oracle
524334f9-4a47-46fa-9df0-a9abfc65102c.one liner: Oracle Server is an Object-relational Database Management System (ORDBMS) created by Oracle Corporation. Do NOT use this tag for other products owned by Oracle, such as Java and MySQL.

3c6add00-bd31-49b0-aff4-4e13149b2d5e.name: Frameworks
3c6add00-bd31-49b0-aff4-4e13149b2d5e.one liner: A framework is an existing library or set of libraries to help you complete a common task faster and more easily. In most cases the tag for a specific framework should be used instead of this tag.

4e335d76-5d89-4b02-a99d-9627af1bdfa2.name: Dry
4e335d76-5d89-4b02-a99d-9627af1bdfa2.one liner: Don't Repeat Yourself, a software development philosophy which aims at reducing redundancy and code repetition. Questions regarding how to refactor code are better suited on codereview.stackexchange.com

8ccdbf57-d0bd-4657-ad63-c8e962b8bca4.name: Ipv6
8ccdbf57-d0bd-4657-ad63-c8e962b8bca4.one liner: The Internet Protocol is one of the fundamental protocols used for the Internet. IPv6 is the next generation Internet Protocol, as opposed to the currently common Internet Protocol known as IPv4.

7d62e7c5-d7f1-42ba-abc3-eda00c096145.name: Design
7d62e7c5-d7f1-42ba-abc3-eda00c096145.one liner: Design in programming is the act of making particular choices about how best to structure a program, to achieve goals of reliability, maintainability, correctness or ease of use.

783870f4-7b55-4ddc-ad87-f3ddb8a1e3ac.name: Unsafe
783870f4-7b55-4ddc-ad87-f3ddb8a1e3ac.one liner: In C# or Rust, the unsafe keyword marks code able to work directly with memory pointers, bypassing some of the language's safety checks.

1590e650-f268-4a91-8048-c0d07b0a89b1.name: Syntax
1590e650-f268-4a91-8048-c0d07b0a89b1.one liner: In computer science, the syntax of a programming language is the set of rules that define the combinations of symbols that are considered to be correctly structured programs in that language.

1ce0e424-8209-4a8c-ba0d-a8c4498a4a80.name: Coding Style
1ce0e424-8209-4a8c-ba0d-a8c4498a4a80.one liner: Refactoring, braces, indentation, Hungarian notation, and other stylistic issues relating to code.

723f0ff3-63ae-4d56-9c05-135abeabea90.name: Ll
723f0ff3-63ae-4d56-9c05-135abeabea90.one liner: LL(k) grammars are grammars that can be parsed from left-to-right, creating a leftmost derivation, using k tokens of lookahead.

2b4bb123-1930-44df-90dd-922ed40a91c6.name: Javabeans
2b4bb123-1930-44df-90dd-922ed40a91c6.one liner: A javabean is a custom class which often represents real-world data and encapsulates private properties by public getter and setter methods. For example, User, Product, Order, etc.

72c1f81a-1e52-43c5-a5e1-e9d376f92220.name: Sikuli
72c1f81a-1e52-43c5-a5e1-e9d376f92220.one liner: Sikuli is a tool available for Linux, Windows and Mac OS X which automates tasks using images/screenshot. You take a screenshot of what you want to click, right click, hover, drag and drop and so on and Sikuli performs those actions automatically. It can be used both for Desktop and Web Application.

7e912851-5b0e-4402-97ba-bd0aebcf4d56.name: Guide
7e912851-5b0e-4402-97ba-bd0aebcf4d56.one liner: Use this tag for questions about 'guide', used in the context of 'Matlab'. Do not use this tag for questions about install guides, user guides, etc (use tag 'documentation' for those questions instead).

561cd10e-7350-4a21-8e29-b9b797009b90.name: Routing
561cd10e-7350-4a21-8e29-b9b797009b90.one liner:
Routing is the process of selecting paths in a network along which to send network traffic.

For the process of associating URLs to content, use the tag url-routing instead.

d553f569-129e-42f0-8408-cee35ebf9e05.name: Proxy
d553f569-129e-42f0-8408-cee35ebf9e05.one liner: A proxy is a device or program that stands between two or more interconnected programs or devices.  Reasons for a proxy include one or more connected parties only wanting the other to access specific data.  A proxy provides a method for this.

bd26eae4-67bb-44fb-9d86-a5529b271564.name: Collaborative Filtering
bd26eae4-67bb-44fb-9d86-a5529b271564.one liner: For questions related to collaborative filtering and recommendation systems.

ae8d9a24-9368-4f57-b476-deabd9df49a5.name: Electronics
ae8d9a24-9368-4f57-b476-deabd9df49a5.one liner: The development of electronic devices is off-topic for Stack Overflow: consider asking these questions on Electronics.SE.  Use this tag for programmatic access to I/O and electronics from user space.

12d82f41-71d2-4be6-af37-319450d1f40e.name: Target
12d82f41-71d2-4be6-af37-319450d1f40e.one liner: In a makefile, targets are associated with a series of commands to execute when an action is requested.

220b5d12-a130-43c2-be70-6152a8191b3a.name: Mpeg
220b5d12-a130-43c2-be70-6152a8191b3a.one liner: MPEG - Class of Compression standards and related algorithms, tools and systems

83c16fad-c7ee-4b25-b367-9fde4b9375f4.name: Blender 2.5 Character Animation Cookbook
83c16fad-c7ee-4b25-b367-9fde4b9375f4.title: Blender 2.5 Character Animation Cookbook
83c16fad-c7ee-4b25-b367-9fde4b9375f4.one liner: With this highly focused book youll learn how to bring your characters to life using Blender, employing everything from realistic movement to refined eye control. Written in a user-friendly manner, its the only guide dedicated to this subject.

410c07f7-d814-4f6e-a6a8-c346cd40bfd4.name: Concept
410c07f7-d814-4f6e-a6a8-c346cd40bfd4.one liner: Concept programming is a programming paradigm focusing on how concepts, that live in the programmer's head, translate into representations that are found in the code space. This approach was introduced in 2001 by Christophe de Dinechin with the XL Programming Language.

8291e20b-b2ec-498d-8a45-39398585fd78.name: Collaboration
8291e20b-b2ec-498d-8a45-39398585fd78.one liner: Collaboration is combining the effort of people in real-time to get things done, either by working side-by-side or through tools such as web conferencing, instant messaging, IRC, etc.

79c2755d-0f60-4859-885d-8bdf12891758.name: Startup
79c2755d-0f60-4859-885d-8bdf12891758.one liner: Startup usually refers to the processes or events that occur at the start of a program, at the beginning of execution of a code block, or when a device is first booted.

55367331-a86d-4e1a-badb-c9eea5de9549.name: Hosts
55367331-a86d-4e1a-badb-c9eea5de9549.one liner: A `hosts` file is used to map hostnames to IP addresses on a TCP/IP-enabled computer.

b77dc90f-8875-4e67-8f10-3dbe320a3668.name: Reasoning
b77dc90f-8875-4e67-8f10-3dbe320a3668.one liner: Reasoning is the act of drawing conclusions, judgments, or inferences from facts or premises.

f233097f-2bcf-4c59-84fa-8df51d341df4.name: Dos
f233097f-2bcf-4c59-84fa-8df51d341df4.one liner: DOS is a family of operating systems for IBM PC compatibles of the 1980s and 1990s, including MS-DOS which was then displaced by Windows. Do NOT use this tag for questions concerning the Windows command line. For Windows batch files and command line, use the tags [windows], [batch-file] or [cmd]. For DoS as in denial of service, use [denial-of-service].

8546230a-092d-4503-9073-13c4ce7da0b7.name: Implementation
8546230a-092d-4503-9073-13c4ce7da0b7.one liner: This tag is in the process of removal (http://meta.stackoverflow.com/questions/251723/remove-implementation). Please don't use it.

36cdd919-fd2a-49fe-8c75-684e1a30622a.name: Playback
36cdd919-fd2a-49fe-8c75-684e1a30622a.one liner: Playing a sound or a video from an existing audio or video file or stream.

7118b462-25a7-497a-a904-359fb4685d73.name: Tor
7118b462-25a7-497a-a904-359fb4685d73.one liner: Tor is an open-source application used for internet anonymity and anti-censorship.

30cf0880-6927-4d02-ac22-a6114fac73b8.name: Dimension
30cf0880-6927-4d02-ac22-a6114fac73b8.one liner:
In physics and mathematics, the dimension of a space or object is informally defined as the minimum number of coordinates needed to specify any point within it.
In the dimensional modeling, a dimension is a table in a star schema of a data warehouse. It is collection of reference information about measurable event. Dimensions categorize and describe data facts and measures in way that support meaningful answers to business questions.

1caa0982-1a3a-4144-b3e4-5c1b5b5c4ee3.name: Online Learning: The New Classroom
1caa0982-1a3a-4144-b3e4-5c1b5b5c4ee3.title: Online Learning: The New Classroom
1caa0982-1a3a-4144-b3e4-5c1b5b5c4ee3.one liner: Mark-Anthony Torrocha from coding school Coding Campus explains how online learning can be the best option if you are looking for flexibility, although you need to have commitment to make it work well.

70816265-e703-4544-b5a7-c0058f75bbe4.name: Computer Vision
70816265-e703-4544-b5a7-c0058f75bbe4.one liner: Computer vision enables images, or sequences of images, to be processed by a computer using an algorithm. The aim of the algorithm is to extract information from the image. Sometimes this information produces an updated image or sometimes other measurements. An example of an updated image is to obtain the edges in the image --- called edge detection.

1a18ae0f-fa52-4244-9ff9-e02eb05c893c.name: Perl
1a18ae0f-fa52-4244-9ff9-e02eb05c893c.one liner: Perl is a high-level, general-purpose, dynamic programming language.

4c432939-fdb3-4f5e-840a-2ae0dd3a4ab3.name: Mvvm
4c432939-fdb3-4f5e-840a-2ae0dd3a4ab3.one liner: Model View ViewModel (MVVM) is an architectural design pattern for implementing user interfaces that separates the page (the View) from data (the Model) by way of its presentation logic (its ViewModel).

8a96b4b8-cfcc-477d-9191-aaff507e2cd7.name: New Languages: Brave New World
8a96b4b8-cfcc-477d-9191-aaff507e2cd7.title: New Languages: Brave New World
8a96b4b8-cfcc-477d-9191-aaff507e2cd7.one liner: The tech world has seen a number of languages emerge, grow, and become super popular, but equally it has seen its fair share of failures and things that make you ask yourself just why?

85b8f67b-1766-4038-8e8c-3a42faf2e137.name: Voronoi
85b8f67b-1766-4038-8e8c-3a42faf2e137.one liner: A Voronoi diagram is a subdivision of space.

213c2920-8fc9-44c4-ac1a-15a0cb94d45d.name: Accessibility
213c2920-8fc9-44c4-ac1a-15a0cb94d45d.one liner: Accessibility seeks to make an application usable by everyone, including people with disabilities such as visual, auditory, ambulatory, or cognitive impairment.

49400be8-53ec-48f9-adae-dbc5bb4743f4.name: Exception
49400be8-53ec-48f9-adae-dbc5bb4743f4.one liner: An exception is a rarely occurring (exceptional!) condition that requires deviation from the program's normal flow. Normally, an exception should not result in total failure, but instead be attended by an exception handler. Exception handling is a built-in construct in many programming languages. Usually, exceptions are handled by unwinding the stack, thus rolling back to a defined state outside the exception's scope, and then invoking a handler routine.

db265a2c-615e-4552-bfb4-dbcdbfefc35b.name: HP Vertica Essentials
db265a2c-615e-4552-bfb4-dbcdbfefc35b.title: HP Vertica Essentials
db265a2c-615e-4552-bfb4-dbcdbfefc35b.one liner: Learn to deploy, administer, and manage HP Vertica, one of the most robust MPP solutions around.

b8d7eb8c-5b6c-45ac-af12-e8cd8ceec150.name: Equation
b8d7eb8c-5b6c-45ac-af12-e8cd8ceec150.one liner: A statement that the values of two expressions are equal indicated by the sign = .

2804ed47-6ffa-44d0-8cbf-7a5b15ef81b4.name: Parsing
2804ed47-6ffa-44d0-8cbf-7a5b15ef81b4.one liner: Parsing refers to breaking an artifact into its constituent elements and capturing the relationship between those elements. This tag isn't for questions about the hosted service Parse.com (use [parse.com]) or parse errors in a particular programming language (use the appropriate language tag instead).

ee49fa44-4064-4220-a9ee-9d750a7f6dd4.name: Edge
ee49fa44-4064-4220-a9ee-9d750a7f6dd4.one liner: Edge detection in image progress etc, for Microsoft edge browser, please use the microsoft-edge tag.

6c585d50-bc3b-4e31-9b93-1673de83a8d5.name: Overhead
6c585d50-bc3b-4e31-9b93-1673de83a8d5.one liner: Overhead is any combination of excess or indirect computation time, memory, bandwidth, or other resources that are required to attain a particular goal.

d6fb4920-93f4-4e4f-b8fa-f5e54a133014.name: Chmod
d6fb4920-93f4-4e4f-b8fa-f5e54a133014.one liner: chmod is a linux/unix command. It stands for "change mode". This command is used change the permissions of directories and files.

873f8047-6eb2-481c-a7cd-985c40659286.name: Triangulation
873f8047-6eb2-481c-a7cd-985c40659286.one liner: Triangulation is either using angular measurements along a baseline to find the location of points, or splitting a polygon into triangles so that it can be rendered by a graphics library.

d3d2bb50-96c3-4f1d-b49e-3d0753d6da57.name: Output
d3d2bb50-96c3-4f1d-b49e-3d0753d6da57.one liner: The externally observable consequences of calling a program on some input

0dac0b83-ed2e-493a-b49c-8dda4377cd1c.name: Wifi
0dac0b83-ed2e-493a-b49c-8dda4377cd1c.one liner: Wi-Fi is a trademark of the Wi-Fi Alliance. A Wi-Fi enabled device such as a personal computer, video game console, smartphone, or digital audio player can connect to the Internet when within range of a wireless network connected to the Internet.

8ff34de2-bc72-4350-834c-e3c31c85c012.name: Learning Cython Programming
8ff34de2-bc72-4350-834c-e3c31c85c012.title: Learning Cython Programming
8ff34de2-bc72-4350-834c-e3c31c85c012.one liner: Developers who like C/C++ will love the added dynamism of Cython. This practical guide gives you everything you need to start programming with Cython and enhancing your existing applications. It could change your working life.

94a550c7-1d0b-42ad-b490-48c7dab4607a.name: Instant Flask Web Development
94a550c7-1d0b-42ad-b490-48c7dab4607a.title: Instant Flask Web Development
94a550c7-1d0b-42ad-b490-48c7dab4607a.one liner: Impatient for results? This is a fast, concise guide to the essentials of Flask with a totally practical approach that means youll be up and running on your first Flask app before you know it.

b4e32dda-eb06-412a-bd5b-008c8c0beb8b.name: Digits
b4e32dda-eb06-412a-bd5b-008c8c0beb8b.one liner: Questions dealing with getting, manipulating, or changing the digits of numbers

bb638033-ff3d-4e17-8174-39e132110f14.name: Building Machine Learning Systems with Python
bb638033-ff3d-4e17-8174-39e132110f14.title: Building Machine Learning Systems with Python
bb638033-ff3d-4e17-8174-39e132110f14.one liner: Expand your Python knowledge and learn all about machine-learning libraries in this user-friendly manual. ML is the next big breakthrough in technology and this book will give you the head-start you need.

dc15341f-87bf-41c5-ac9b-131cd7ac1adb.name: Args
dc15341f-87bf-41c5-ac9b-131cd7ac1adb.one liner: args contains the command-line arguments passed to the program upon invocation.

ad784ea2-529d-4990-8c48-c40cc961590f.name: Devices
ad784ea2-529d-4990-8c48-c40cc961590f.one liner: Electronic devices: computers, smartphones, tablets, electronic hardware and platforms.

75b64e58-0312-4205-b98d-f8764ee7e21a.name: Apache Pig
75b64e58-0312-4205-b98d-f8764ee7e21a.one liner: Apache Pig is a platform for analyzing large data sets that consists of a high-level language for expressing data analysis programs, coupled with infrastructure for evaluating these programs. The salient property of Pig programs is that their structure is amenable to substantial parallelization which enables them to handle very large data sets.

9ade4323-8461-445d-a188-f62c64868af9.name: Datastore
9ade4323-8461-445d-a188-f62c64868af9.one liner: A datastore is a generic term for a system which stores data. The term datastore includes RDBMS systems, NoSQL systems, memory based systems, flat files, spreadsheets to name just some examples. A given datastore may provide a rich toolset for storing and retrieving data (RDBMS), or it may provide no tools (flat files).

99d60e8c-3db7-44a7-9a03-d703327d87cc.name: PostgreSQL 9 Admin Cookbook
99d60e8c-3db7-44a7-9a03-d703327d87cc.title: PostgreSQL 9 Admin Cookbook
99d60e8c-3db7-44a7-9a03-d703327d87cc.one liner: By working through the recipes in this book, you can soon be running a more efficient database. Bring your PostreSQL know-how up to date in record time with a hands-on guide that covers all the vital techniques.

eb11b810-e965-459e-a67f-7414c3e64f5f.name: Mastering Flask
eb11b810-e965-459e-a67f-7414c3e64f5f.title: Mastering Flask
eb11b810-e965-459e-a67f-7414c3e64f5f.one liner: Gain expertise in Flask to create dynamic and powerful web applications

3d5945e0-2f53-49f6-9030-0443cf202dda.name: Like
3d5945e0-2f53-49f6-9030-0443cf202dda.one liner:
For topics related to the 'like' functionality in social networks such as Facebook, '+1' in Google+, etc.  
This tag is NOT for the SQL reserved keyword LIKE; you want the sql-like tag for that.

52bc5a99-7fd3-463f-b3b1-648a3c6c71ff.name: Leaflet
52bc5a99-7fd3-463f-b3b1-648a3c6c71ff.one liner: Leaflet is a modern, lightweight open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

215837ba-49b9-4c92-946b-8b395af59096.name: Implementing Samba 4
215837ba-49b9-4c92-946b-8b395af59096.title: Implementing Samba 4
215837ba-49b9-4c92-946b-8b395af59096.one liner: Exploit the real power of Samba 4 Server by leveraging the benefits of an Active Directory Domain Controller.

fe6bcfc1-053c-4ac5-a60c-b649e58bb90f.name: Ros
fe6bcfc1-053c-4ac5-a60c-b649e58bb90f.one liner: ROS (Robot Operating System) provides libraries and tools to help software developers create robotics applications. It provides hardware abstraction, device drivers, libraries, visualizers, message-passing, package management, and more.  You may also want to consider asking your question on *robotics* stack exchange.

ae17886a-a0e6-4836-b0a1-7bd50c91748d.name: Atoi
ae17886a-a0e6-4836-b0a1-7bd50c91748d.one liner: atoi() is the C runtime library function for converting the ASCII representation of a number to an integer.  This SO tag also applies to atol(), atoll(), and atoq() which perform the same conversion to types "long" and "long long".

b6612e9f-cb4f-4547-b06b-3b9f9803253a.name: Twisted
b6612e9f-cb4f-4547-b06b-3b9f9803253a.one liner: Twisted is an event-driven networking engine, written in Python and implementing many different protocols.

7cbb4660-a2c8-4f9b-81db-a5ac209c85c4.name: Hash
7cbb4660-a2c8-4f9b-81db-a5ac209c85c4.one liner:
A hash function is any well-defined procedure or mathematical function that converts a large amount of data into a small datum, usually a single integer.
For questions about the Twitter and Facebook # symbol, use hashtag. 
For questions about URLs and HTML anchors, use fragment-identifier.

62b07009-4c01-4edc-91bb-4d623944eb3f.name: Cad
62b07009-4c01-4edc-91bb-4d623944eb3f.one liner: Computer-aided design (CAD) is the use of computer technology for the process of design and design-documentation.

52aa7398-489e-454e-b009-1f221bfabf6f.name: Dexterity
52aa7398-489e-454e-b009-1f221bfabf6f.one liner: Dexterity is a content type framework for CMF applications, with particular emphasis on Plone. It can be viewed as an alternative to Archetypes that is more light-weight and modular

00e1a284-4d36-479c-a1f7-9be864e8ad85.name: Stretch
00e1a284-4d36-479c-a1f7-9be864e8ad85.one liner: This is a Tag for stretching images in code.

4642d6a7-1fd0-4f69-a7a7-6b82c4c1723e.name: Android
4642d6a7-1fd0-4f69-a7a7-6b82c4c1723e.one liner: Android is Google's OS for digital devices [Phone, Tablet, Auto, TV, Wear, Glass]. Please use Android-specific tags such as android-intent, not intent. For non-developer/programming questions, use http://android.stackexchange.com

3c08fb4d-e08d-4023-be9c-1068010ed793.name: Panda3D 1.7 Game Developer's Cookbook
3c08fb4d-e08d-4023-be9c-1068010ed793.title: Panda3D 1.7 Game Developer's Cookbook
3c08fb4d-e08d-4023-be9c-1068010ed793.one liner: Over 80 recipes for developing 3D games with Panda3D, a full-scale 3D game engine

4a649faa-f5b3-49f7-8aa3-8c8e3cd9ca1e.name: Turbogears
4a649faa-f5b3-49f7-8aa3-8c8e3cd9ca1e.one liner: TurboGears, another open source MVC-style Web application framework based on Python.

9f4abae5-8efd-4028-a333-abc67522e390.name: Pyunit
9f4abae5-8efd-4028-a333-abc67522e390.one liner: PyUnit is a unit testing framework for Python.

1fb38d0a-989c-4cad-b310-44c5cb74aae7.name: Measure
1fb38d0a-989c-4cad-b310-44c5cb74aae7.one liner: Measuring means to determine how big is a certain entity. In computing, it's often referred to calculating the size(s) of a screen.

e14d73de-80ab-4114-8cc5-b7c25777211f.name: Debugging
e14d73de-80ab-4114-8cc5-b7c25777211f.one liner: Debugging is a methodical process of finding and reducing the number of bugs, or defects, in a computer program.

985d6925-bcb9-4ff7-9ceb-cd4f983770e6.name: Hud
985d6925-bcb9-4ff7-9ceb-cd4f983770e6.one liner: HUD, which stands for Heads-Up Display usually refers to some particular informations (like player's health or ammunition count) displayed in the computer game directly on the screen.

5366ffbb-56af-4581-ae3d-32cda567d504.name: Pusher
5366ffbb-56af-4581-ae3d-32cda567d504.one liner: Pusher is a hosted API for quickly, easily and securely adding scalable realtime functionality to web and mobile apps.

b3f67865-7829-4904-bb8e-af7d9db7a744.name: Ios
b3f67865-7829-4904-bb8e-af7d9db7a744.one liner: iOS is a mobile operating system developed by Apple. It was originally named "iPhone OS", but was renamed to "iOS" in June, 2009. iOS currently runs on the iPhone, iPod touch, iPad and Apple TV (4th Generation).

38496ec5-2b30-4396-af92-75f3b4b04685.name: Home
38496ec5-2b30-4396-af92-75f3b4b04685.one liner: Home normally refers to: a web site, a starting folder or a button which brings the user back to the main page.

c7f48e7a-691b-4645-93f3-c8e3cb4e1730.name: The Rise of Data Science
c7f48e7a-691b-4645-93f3-c8e3cb4e1730.title: The Rise of Data Science
c7f48e7a-691b-4645-93f3-c8e3cb4e1730.one liner: The rise of big data and business intelligence has been one of the hottest topics to hit the tech world. Everybody whos anybody has heard of the term business intelligence, yet very few can actually articulate what this means

810e156e-7d02-42ab-9a32-7a4a0d97f540.name: Scipy
810e156e-7d02-42ab-9a32-7a4a0d97f540.one liner: SciPy is an open source library of algorithms and mathematical tools for the Python programming language.

6e808808-884e-4593-8c8c-d3361480f128.name: Mako
6e808808-884e-4593-8c8c-d3361480f128.one liner: Mako is a template library written in Python. It provides a familiar, non-XML syntax which compiles into Python modules for maximum performance. Conceptually, Mako is an embedded Python (i.e. Python Server Page) language.

5f2de166-e9e6-49e4-9646-5ac5e6d121d8.name: Avi
5f2de166-e9e6-49e4-9646-5ac5e6d121d8.one liner: This tag is for questions about playback of, creation of, and programmatic interaction with, Audio Video Interleave (*.avi) files. The AVI format was introduced by Microsoft in 1992 and has been widely adopted and modified since, but remains mostly supported on Microsoft devices

8b503c56-cda0-4fd8-80b0-5b3a1ba70b06.name: Clearinterval
8b503c56-cda0-4fd8-80b0-5b3a1ba70b06.one liner: The Javascript clearInterval() method clears a timer set with the setInterval() method.

076a3de6-578a-4787-99c5-ab01962ecbb3.name: Python Machine Learning
076a3de6-578a-4787-99c5-ab01962ecbb3.title: Python Machine Learning
076a3de6-578a-4787-99c5-ab01962ecbb3.one liner: Unlock deeper insights into Machine Leaning with this vital guide to cutting-edge predictive analytics

42cf95da-2c9c-466e-b676-665f32f1456d.name: Raspberry Pi Essentials
42cf95da-2c9c-466e-b676-665f32f1456d.title: Raspberry Pi Essentials
42cf95da-2c9c-466e-b676-665f32f1456d.one liner: Get up and running with the Raspberry Pi to develop captivating projects

aaf11e7d-7786-4099-beb3-436dfcd76c64.name: Background
aaf11e7d-7786-4099-beb3-436dfcd76c64.one liner: Background typically refers to the rendering behind a container element's contents - usually on a web page, Windows form or other UI presentation medium.

1a63e189-ec18-445c-9ee4-2c72753779e2.name: OpenCV with Python By Example
1a63e189-ec18-445c-9ee4-2c72753779e2.title: OpenCV with Python By Example
1a63e189-ec18-445c-9ee4-2c72753779e2.one liner: Build real-world computer vision applications and develop cool demos using OpenCV for Python

929ec66c-1675-43c8-aed3-68e45d480ed8.name: Continuous Deployment
929ec66c-1675-43c8-aed3-68e45d480ed8.one liner: A software engineering approach in which teams keep producing software in short cycles and ensure that the software can be released to production at any time.

1f426708-2c4c-4fd5-824f-bdf2e2765b7e.name: Numbers
1f426708-2c4c-4fd5-824f-bdf2e2765b7e.one liner: A number is a mathematical object used to count and measure.

86caf65a-c22e-403b-b262-ec51e21b5814.name: Usability
86caf65a-c22e-403b-b262-ec51e21b5814.one liner: the effectiveness, efficiency and satisfaction with which specified users achieve specified goals in particular environments. This covers ease of use and learnability of software applications, websites, processes, or anything a human interacts with.

a66b71d3-53af-4db1-98cf-c8ea01b1e4b8.name: Binary
a66b71d3-53af-4db1-98cf-c8ea01b1e4b8.one liner: Binary, the base-2 numeral system, represents numbers using two symbols: 0 and 1. For compiled computer programs, use the "executable" tag instead.

c61f39ae-b074-4389-bffb-244bd6c73812.name: Openal
c61f39ae-b074-4389-bffb-244bd6c73812.one liner: OpenAL (Open Audio Library) is a cross-platform audio API that allows for efficient rendering of environmental, 3D positional audio.

c8fba76e-adf1-4dde-b9aa-f7a861176b67.name: Zenoss Core Network and System Monitoring
c8fba76e-adf1-4dde-b9aa-f7a861176b67.title: Zenoss Core Network and System Monitoring
c8fba76e-adf1-4dde-b9aa-f7a861176b67.one liner: A step-by-step guide to configuring, using, and adapting this free Open Source network monitoring system - with a Foreword by Mark R. Hinkle, VP of Community Zenoss Inc.

2d52507b-a95f-4dd1-bd4a-f2328710a9a3.name: Transfer
2d52507b-a95f-4dd1-bd4a-f2328710a9a3.one liner: transfer is the process of moving data from one physical or virtual location to another

1d510307-50b6-452f-a095-546befeb66d7.name: Png
1d510307-50b6-452f-a095-546befeb66d7.one liner: PNG (Portable Network Graphics) is an image file format designed to store raster graphics. It is associated with ".png" file extension. Use this tag for questions involving this specific format.

f777153a-5b67-4394-82ea-bb960b0db305.name: Translate
f777153a-5b67-4394-82ea-bb960b0db305.one liner: To translate means to convert a program written in one language into a semantically equivalent program written in another, usually a lower level, language.

9c7e94d4-387a-409d-836f-1c5d7f50d699.name: Terminology
9c7e94d4-387a-409d-836f-1c5d7f50d699.one liner: Used when a question asks for clarification regarding programming terms.

cd165e79-f52d-4605-9c4a-40bc37728c84.name: Instruments
cd165e79-f52d-4605-9c4a-40bc37728c84.one liner: Instruments usually refers to the performance analysis developer tool provided by Apple for Mac and iOS development.

34e070a7-cfec-4724-807f-f606eced95af.name: Raspberry Pi Sensors
34e070a7-cfec-4724-807f-f606eced95af.title: Raspberry Pi Sensors
34e070a7-cfec-4724-807f-f606eced95af.one liner: Integrate sensors into your Raspberry Pi projects and let your powerful microcomputer interact with the physical world

49a57e6f-e43a-4890-a20e-6fe1601cf385.name: Splash
49a57e6f-e43a-4890-a20e-6fe1601cf385.one liner: Splash refers to a Splash Screen, which is a temporary window that appears while the application is loading.

c0b3f950-0f40-4faf-972e-72302294fa6f.name: Netcat
c0b3f950-0f40-4faf-972e-72302294fa6f.one liner: netcat is a command for performing read/write operations on TCP or UDP network connections.

a8cc6d0d-0d09-4c6f-bb9b-202c3d0f08cc.name: Diazo
a8cc6d0d-0d09-4c6f-bb9b-202c3d0f08cc.one liner: Diazo allows you to apply a theme contained in a static HTML web page to a dynamic website created using any server-side technology.

b180f923-46ff-4447-ab28-c524a93ea59f.name: Specifications
b180f923-46ff-4447-ab28-c524a93ea59f.one liner: A specification (also commonly referred to as "spec") is a description of a defined technology and the resources it offers.

d99e861d-46c9-4b89-b249-fefd9db3fe70.name: Wordpress
d99e861d-46c9-4b89-b249-fefd9db3fe70.one liner: WordPress is an open source content management system running on PHP and MySQL, and often used as a blog engine. WordPress questions about programming and administration are best asked on http://wordpress.stackexchange.com/

ef3c0fb4-a254-4f40-9a84-293cd3860872.name: Datetime
ef3c0fb4-a254-4f40-9a84-293cd3860872.one liner: A DateTime object in many programming languages describes a date and a time of day.  It can express either an instant in time or a position on a calendar, depending on the context in which it is used and the specific implementation.  This tag can be used for all date and time related issues.

cca82f7d-f596-4ca6-a7bc-31ec5007ef78.name: Urllib2
cca82f7d-f596-4ca6-a7bc-31ec5007ef78.one liner: urllib2 is a builtin python 2 module that defines functions and classes to help with URL actions. It is notably unsatisfactory and has been replaced in python 3 and by third-party libraries.

f455f5cb-d806-4686-9626-529f26fb0cdf.name: Optimization
f455f5cb-d806-4686-9626-529f26fb0cdf.one liner: Optimization is the act of improving a method or design. In programming, optimization usually takes the form of increasing the speed of an algorithm, or reducing the resources it requires.

326ad6ed-b1dc-41ba-a633-b24a2e11b0db.name: Transformation
326ad6ed-b1dc-41ba-a633-b24a2e11b0db.one liner: Generally means modifying the shape or appearance of objects while preserving the content. Common applications are transformations of vectors, quaternions, matrices or XML files.

a70e2228-cf46-43c1-9f1e-6ff5e212d711.name: Geoip
a70e2228-cf46-43c1-9f1e-6ff5e212d711.one liner: GeoIP is the process of analyzing an IP address and determining the geographical location of that end point.

36d1c814-fba4-4d98-acc4-575547722d1d.name: Indexing
36d1c814-fba4-4d98-acc4-575547722d1d.one liner: Indexing data structures is general technique to improve the speed of data lookups.

173bfb3a-4846-4ca8-9d6b-a14b4050c7b2.name: Hidden
173bfb3a-4846-4ca8-9d6b-a14b4050c7b2.one liner: Hidden could refer to a style value in CSS for the visibility property, a selector in jQuery, a possible value for the type attribute of an input or to an `HTML5` attribute.

ef9dde15-11b3-405b-9a62-8008be50af24.name: Execute
ef9dde15-11b3-405b-9a62-8008be50af24.one liner: In many dialects of SQL, the execute statement is used to invoke a stored procedure.

9fd55871-c754-403d-9b73-e3ec242dad5c.name: Finance
9fd55871-c754-403d-9b73-e3ec242dad5c.one liner: Finance relates to the management of assets over time under varying conditions, usually in order to make a profit.

f2947faf-ee3e-4dd2-abe9-ab008b1325b3.name: Html Lists
f2947faf-ee3e-4dd2-abe9-ab008b1325b3.one liner: Used for ordered and unordered lists and their list items in HTML, and also any list styles applied to them.

930179a1-318c-45ff-becf-564b55f7e27e.name: Pytables
930179a1-318c-45ff-becf-564b55f7e27e.one liner: A Python library for working with extremely large hierarchical datasets.

20c2e279-4c29-4c18-81d4-cdababa4b8d4.name: Arrays
20c2e279-4c29-4c18-81d4-cdababa4b8d4.one liner: An array is an ordered data structure consisting of a collection of elements (values or variables), each identified by one (single dimensional array or vector) or multiple indexes.

db84f31f-0795-4bf7-a5ff-f35292b3ff3d.name: Dictionary
db84f31f-0795-4bf7-a5ff-f35292b3ff3d.one liner: A dictionary in computer science is a data structure that maps keys to values such that given a key its corresponding value can be efficiently retrieved. For questions about Mapping Functions over collections of data, Please Use [map-function] tag; and for geography, [maps].

e2a7d271-0e4f-46cb-bd39-aae1d2828dd6.name: Facade
e2a7d271-0e4f-46cb-bd39-aae1d2828dd6.one liner: Facade design pattern as described by Gang of Four.

da943e7d-2b65-4042-a550-43700942b329.name: Image
da943e7d-2b65-4042-a550-43700942b329.one liner: The image tag is for questions related to the loading, formatting, saving, compression, and display of images in the context of source code. This tag should also be used for assistance using various image libraries.

dc806526-cc75-4b5d-829f-71bc58a9c8c1.name: Melt
dc806526-cc75-4b5d-829f-71bc58a9c8c1.one liner: In R, the "melt" function from the "reshape2" (and earlier, "reshape" package) converts data into a long form. Melt is also a web application framework written in PHP.

503a6f33-289c-4d33-8f4c-3b872b59b39c.name: State
503a6f33-289c-4d33-8f4c-3b872b59b39c.one liner: This pattern is used to represent the state of an object.

f4bd0f09-b8bf-47f3-a235-3878fb7432d4.name: Explicit
f4bd0f09-b8bf-47f3-a235-3878fb7432d4.one liner: In C++ specifies constructors and conversion operators that don't allow implicit conversions or copy-initialization. In C# declares a user-defined type conversion operator that must be invoked with a cast. For MS SQL Server for-xml-EXPLICIT mode use the [for-xml-explicit] tag

90851f01-3a9e-4cd4-a677-f8f270a0402d.name: Sdl
90851f01-3a9e-4cd4-a677-f8f270a0402d.one liner: SDL - Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform multimedia library designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, 3D hardware via OpenGL, and 2D video framebuffer. It is used by MPEG playback software, emulators, and many popular games, including the award winning Linux port of "Civilization: Call To Power."

5932a644-6718-44c9-882c-384d3dc6b3fd.name: Python Multimedia
5932a644-6718-44c9-882c-384d3dc6b3fd.title: Python Multimedia
5932a644-6718-44c9-882c-384d3dc6b3fd.one liner: Learn how to develop Multimedia applications using Python with this practical step-by-step guide

f736e51d-ad9d-4358-9d3d-890fecce97a7.name: Mutex
f736e51d-ad9d-4358-9d3d-890fecce97a7.one liner: A mutex ("mutual exclusion") is a mechanism to ensure integrity when the same data or resource is accessed (in particular, changed) concurrently from several threads.
